1a1(mdo sde): /pad+ma dkar po bzhugs so//
1b1(mdo sde): @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ sadad+harma puN Da rI ka nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po
1b2(mdo sde): dang po/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i
1b3(mdo sde): ri la bzhugs te/ dge slong khri nyis stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin
1b4(mdo sde): tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ /bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu
1b5(mdo sde): sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/ mngon par shes pas mngon par shes pa'i
2a1(mdo sde): nyan thos chen po sha stag la 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya dang / tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang / tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa ming chen dang / tshe dang ldan pa bzang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang
2a2(mdo sde): ldan pa ltang rgyas 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa chu klung 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa ga ya 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA'i bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa
2a3(mdo sde): na ma gru dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka pi na dang / tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag dang / tshe dang ldan pa pi lin nga'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa bak+ku la dang / tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang / tshe dang ldan pa b+ha ra dwa dza dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' dang /
2a4(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa mdzes dga' dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin dang / de dag dang nyan thos chen po gzhan dag dang / slob pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / gzhan yang slob pa dang mi
2a5(mdo sde): slob pa'i dge slong nyis stong dang / skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la sogs pa dge slong ma drug stong dang / sgra gcan zin gyi ma dge slong ma grags 'dzin 'khor dang bcas pa dang thabs cig go/ /byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang
2a6(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa/ gzungs thob pa/ spobs pa chen po la gnas pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba/ sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed
2b1(mdo sde): pa/ sangs rgyas brgya stong mang pos yang dag par bstod pa/ lus dang ngag dang sems byams pas yongs su bsgos pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'dzud pa la mkhas pa/ shes rab chen po/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs par khong du chud pa/ 'jig rten gyi
2b2(mdo sde): khams brgya stong mang por rnam par grags pa/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yang dag par sgrol ba sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
2b3(mdo sde): dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob dang / byang chub sems dpa' don thams cad ces bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu brtson dang / byang chub sems dpa' brtson pa mi gtong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin chen dang / byang chub sems dpa'
2b4(mdo sde): sman gyi rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sman yang dag 'phags dang / byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu sbyin dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od dang / byang chub
2b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' zla gang dang / byang chub sems dpa' gnon pa chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas gnon dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gsum gnon dang / byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag par rgyun tu brtson
2b6(mdo sde): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' skar ma'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
2b7(mdo sde): chen po seng ge dag dang yang thabs cig go/ /bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug la 'di lta ste/ bzang skyong dang / dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / ded dpon bzang po dang / mes byin dang / phug sbas dang / chus byin dang / dbang pos byin dang / bla ma'i blo
3a1(mdo sde): gros dang / khyad par blo gros dang / 'phel ba'i blo gros dang / mthong ba don yod dang / shin tu yang dag zhugs dang / rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa dang / dpe med blo gros dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / sa 'dzin dag dang yang thabs cig ste/ de dag la sogs
3a2(mdo sde): pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri dag dang yang thabs cig go/ /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / 'khor lha'i bu nyi khri 'di lta ste/ lha'i bu zla ba dang / lha'i bu nyi ma dang / kun du dri dang / rin chen 'od dang / lha'i bu snang 'od dang / de dag la sogs pa lha'i bu nyi khri dang yang thabs
3a3(mdo sde): cig go/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / 'khor lha'i bu sum khri 'di lta ste/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang /
3a4(mdo sde): 'khor lha'i bu sum khri dag dang yang thabs cig go/ /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / 'khor tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu khri nyis stong 'di lta ste/ tshangs pa gtsug phud can dang / tshangs pa skar ma'i 'od dang / de dag la sogs pa tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu khri nyis stong dang yang thabs cig go/ /klu'i rgyal
3a5(mdo sde): po brgyad 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' dang / rgya mtsho dang / nor rgyas kyi bu dang / 'jog po dang / gzi can dang / ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po ud pa la dang / 'khor klu bye ba brgya stong mang po dag dang yang thabs cig go/ /mi'am ci'i rgyal po bzhi 'di lta ste/
3a6(mdo sde): mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa dang / mi'am ci'i rgyal po chos chen dang / mi'am ci'i rgyal po chos bzang dang / mi'am ci'i rgyal po chos 'dzin dang / 'khor mi 'am ci bye ba brgya stong mang po dag dang yang thabs cig go/ /dri za'i ris kyi lha'i bu bzhi 'di lta ste/ dri za yid du 'ong ba dang /
3a7(mdo sde): yid 'ong dbyangs dang / 'jam snyan dang / dri za dbyangs snyan dang / 'khor dri za bye ba brgya stong mang po dag dang yang thabs cig go/ /lha ma yin gyi dbang po bzhi 'di lta ste/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs can dang / phrag rtsub dang / thags ris dang / lha ma
3b1(mdo sde): yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang / 'khor lha ma yin bye ba brgya stong mang po dag dang yang thabs cig go/ /nam mkha' lding gi dbang po bzhi 'di lta ste/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po gzi brjid chen po dang / lus chen dang / rdzogs chen dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po 'phrul
3b2(mdo sde): chen thob dang / 'khor nam mkha' lding bye ba brgya stong mang po dag dang yang thabs cig go/ /lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang yang thabs cig go/ /de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das 'khor bzhi po de dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/
3b3(mdo sde): bsti stang du byas/ btsun par byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas/ rjed par byas/ gsol ba byas te/ nges par bstan pa chen po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs mdo sde shin tu rgyas pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
3b4(mdo sde): yongs su bzung ba bshad par bzhed de chos kyi gdan de nyid la skyil mo krung bcas nas/ mtha' yas nges par bstan pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te sku mi g.yo zhing sems mi g.yo bar gyur nas bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs
3b5(mdo sde): ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog man dA ra dang / man dA ra chen po dang / many+dzu Sha ka dang / many+dzu Sha ka chen po rnams kyi me tog gi char chen po mngon par bab ste/ bcom ldan 'das dang 'khor bzhi po de dag la 'thor ro/ /thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang
3b6(mdo sde): rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur te/ 'gul kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg kun tu rab tu ldeg /'khrugs kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so/ /de'i tshe dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma
3b7(mdo sde): yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams dang / rgyal phran dang / stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba dang / gling bzhi'i 'khor los sgyur ba gang dag 'khor der 'dus nas 'khod par gyur pa 'khor dang bcas pa de dag
4a1(mdo sde): thams cad bcom ldan 'das la lta zhing 'khod de ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du gyur/ shin tu dga' bar gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer gcig byung nas/ de shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing khri brgyad stong du song ste/
4a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po yan chad srid pa'i rtse mo man chad 'od zer de'i 'od kyis shin tu khyab par snang ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi 'gro ba drug po de dag na sems can gang yod pa de dag thams cad ma lus par snang ngo / /sangs
4a3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs shing 'tsho gzhes pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag chos gang 'chad pa de dag thams cad kyang ma lus par grag go/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang /
4a4(mdo sde): dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / rnal 'byor can dang / rnal 'byor spyod pa gang dag 'bras bu thob pa dang / 'bras bu ma thob pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag nyan pa dang / dmigs pa
4a5(mdo sde): dang / mos pa rnam pa sna tshogs du ma'i rgyu'i thabs la mkhas pa dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba de dag thams cad kyang snang ngo / /sangs
4a6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams kyi ring bsrel gyi mchod rten rin po che las byas pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma
4a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas ltas cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa 'di 'dir ci'i rgyur 'gyur zhig gu / ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis ltas cho 'phrul chen po 'di lta bu 'di bstan te/ bcom ldan 'das kyang ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs shing rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po ngo mtshar rmad
4b1(mdo sde): du byung ba chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di lta bu 'di dag kyang snang bar gyur pa 'di'i don bdag gis su la dri 'di na don 'di'i lan ldon nus pa ni su yod snyam mo/ /de yang 'di snyam du 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa
4b2(mdo sde): ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dis sngon chad kyang sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ltas 'di lta bu byung ba rnams mthong zhing sngon chad chos chen po'i
4b3(mdo sde): 'bel ba'i gtam dag kyang myong bas na/ bdag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la de'i don dri'o snyam du sems so/ /dge slong dang dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor bzhi po de dag dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam
4b4(mdo sde): mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa mang po de dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi ltas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po'i snang ba 'di lta bu 'di mthong nas/ ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du gyur ltad mor gyur te/ 'di snyam du/ bcom ldan
4b5(mdo sde): 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po'i snang ba 'di lta bu 'di bstan pa bdag cag gis su la dri snyam du sems so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la 'khor bzhi po rnams kyi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa
4b6(mdo sde): sems kyis shes nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das kyis ltas ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba rdzu 'phrul gyi snang ba 'di lta bu 'di bstan te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing khri brgyad stong po 'di dag rnam par bkra ba/ mchog tu blta na sdug
4b7(mdo sde): pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa sngon du bzhud pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su 'dren par snang ba 'di'i rgyu gang rkyen gang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /'jam
5a1(mdo sde): dpal ci yi phyir na 'di lta bu/ /mi yi mgon pos 'od zer gcig pu 'di/ /zhal gyi smin mtshams kyi ni mdzod spu nas/ /shin tu snang ba'i 'od zer rab tu btang / /lha rnams dga' bas tsan dan phye ma dang / /lha yi spos rab yid du 'ong ba dang / /man dA ra dang many+dzu
5a2(mdo sde): Sha ka yi/ /me tog dag gi char chen rab tu phab/ /des ni sa 'di kun tu mdzes gyur cing / /'khor bzhi 'di dag dga' ba rab tu thob/ /zhing rnams 'di dag thams cad rnam drug tu/ /shin tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs su kun nas g.yos/ /'od zer de yis shar gyi phyogs logs kyi/ /
5a3(mdo sde): zhing ni stong phrag brgyad tshang ba rnams/ /skad cig gcig gis thams cad rab tu snang / /zhing rnams gser gyi kha dog bzhin du mdzes/ /mnar med yan chad srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar/ /zhing de dag na sems can ji snyed pa/ /'gro ba drug po de na yod pa rnams/ /gang dag der yang
5a4(mdo sde): shi 'pho skye ba rnams/ /de dag las kyi rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /'gro ba bde dang mi bde rnams kyang snang / /bzang po ngan pa de bzhin bar ma yang / /'di na 'dug kyang de dag thams cad mthong / /sangs rgyas seng ge mi yi dbang po rnams/ /chos nyid rab ston rnam par dbye ba mthong / /
5a5(mdo sde): sems can bye ba mang la rab ston pa/ /snyan pa'i sgra dang dbyangs su gsung ba dag /zab cing rgya che rmad du byung ba'i sgra/ /so so'i zhing rnams su yang rab tu 'byin/ /dpe dang gtan tshigs khrag khrig bye ba yis/ /sangs rgyas chos 'dir rab tu ston pa ni/ /sems can gang rnams
5a6(mdo sde): sdug bsngal gzir ba dag / skye dang rga bas yid skyo mi shes la/ /'di ni dge slong sdug bsngal tha ma zhes/ /de la rab zhi mya ngan 'das pa ston/ /mi rnams gang gis rgya che mthu thob cing / /sangs rgyas mthong bas de bzhin bsod nams ldan/ /de dag la ni chos tshul 'di
5a7(mdo sde): brjod cing / /rang rgyal theg pa yang ni ston pa mdzad/ /gzhan yang bde bar gshegs pa'i sras po gang / /bla na med pa'i ye shes tshol ba dag /bya ba sna tshogs rtag tu byed pa la/ /de dag la ni byang chub phyir bsngags gsung / /'di na 'dug bzhin de na 'di 'dra dang / /
5b1(mdo sde): khyad par gzhan yang stong phrag bye ba dag /shin tu mthong zhing thos te 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /de dag las ni phyogs tsam smos par bya/ /bdag mthong zhing rnams mang po de dag na'ang / /byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i bye ma snyed/ /gang rnams bye ba stong phrag mi nyung ba/ /brtson
5b2(mdo sde): 'grus rnam pa mang pos byang chub skyed/ /la la sbyin pa sbyin pa'ang de bzhin te/ /nor dang 'gron bu gser dang dngul rnams dang / /mu tig nor bu man shel byi ru dang / /bran pho bran mo rta dang shing rta lug /de bzhin rin chen dag gis brgyan pa'i khyogs/ /yongs su dga' ba'i yid
5b3(mdo sde): kyis sbyin pa gtong / /bdag cag gis kyang theg mchog thob shog ces/ /byang chub mchog 'dir yongs su sngo bar byed/ /sbyin pa 'di 'dra 'di dag byin byas na/ /khams gsum nang na theg mchog khyad par can/ /sangs rgyas theg pa bde gshegs gang bsngags pa/ /de ni bdag gis
5b4(mdo sde): myur du thob gyur cig / la la rta bzhi can gyi shing rta la/ /kha khyer bcas pa me tog rgyal mtshan brgyan/ /rin chen dag las byas pa'i ba dan can/ /la las de lta bu yang sbyin pa byin/ /de bzhin bu dang chung ma rnams kyang byin/ /la la phangs pa'i sha yang sbyin par byed/ /byang chub
5b5(mdo sde): dam pa 'di ni tshol ba'i phyir/ /lag pa dang ni rkang pa bslangs na byin/ /la la dag gis mgo dang la las mig /la la bdag gi lus mchog rab kyang gtong / /dang ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa rnams byin nas/ /de bzhin gshegs kyi ye shes don du gnyer/ /'jam dpal bdag
5b6(mdo sde): gis mthong ba la la na/ /rgyal srid skyid pa rnam par spang byas te/ /btsun mo'i 'khor dang de bzhin gling kun dang / /gnyen dang blon po thams cad rnam spangs nas/ /'jig rten rnam par 'dren gyi drung dong ste/ /zhi ba'i phyir ni chos rab mchog 'dri zhing / /ngur smrig gos rnams
5b7(mdo sde): rab tu gyon byed de/ /skra dang kha spu dag kyang 'dreg par byed/ /bdag mthong byang chub sems dpa' la la ni/ /dge slong gyur cing nags tshal gnas pa dag /dgon pa stong pa rnams su gnas 'cha' zhing / /la la lung nod kha ton byed la dga'/ /bdag mthong byang chub sems dpa'
6a1(mdo sde): la la dag / ri sul dag tu zhugs pa'i brtan pa rnams/ /sangs rgyas ye shes 'di la rnam par sgom/ /yongs su sems shing nye bar rtogs par byed/ /kha cig gis ni 'dod pa ma lus spangs/ /yongs bsgoms bdag nyid spyod yul rnam par dag /mngon
6a2(mdo sde): par shes pa lnga yang der thob nas/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i sras po dgon par gnas/ /brtan pa la la rkang gshibs der gnas te/ /'dren pa'i spyan sngar thal mo sbyar byas nas/ /dga' ba bskyed de rgyal dbang rgyal po la/ /tshigs su bcad pa stong gis mngon par bstod/ /
6a3(mdo sde): dran dang ldan zhing dul ba mi 'jigs pa/ /la la spyod pa phra ba shes pa dag /rkang gnyis gtso la chos kyang 'dri bar byed/ /thos nas de dag chos rnams 'dzin par 'gyur/ /yongs bsgoms bdag nyid rgyal dbang sras po rnams/ /la la dag gis de dang der mthong ba/ /dpe dang gtan
6a4(mdo sde): tshigs khrag khrig du ma yis/ /srog chags bye ba mang la chos rnams ston/ /mchog tu dga' skyes chos rnams rab ston cing / /byang chub sems dpa' mang po yang dag 'dzud/ /bdud rnams stobs dang bzhon par bcas bcom ste/ /chos kyi rnga 'di shin tu rdung bar byed/ /
6a5(mdo sde): la la bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa la/ /bde gshegs sras la lha mi gnod sbyin dang / /srin pos mchod kyang ngo mtshar mi 'dzin cing / /bsnyems med zhi zhing rab zhi spyod pa mthong / /phal cher nags gnas de bzhin gzhan dag kyang / /snang ba'i 'od ni lus las rab gtong
6a6(mdo sde): ste/ /sems can dmyal nas sems can rnams 'don cing / /de dag byang chub la yang yang dag 'dzud/ /rgyal ba'i sras po la la brtson 'grus gnas/ /kha cig gis kyang ma lus gnyid spangs nas/ 'chag pa byed cing nags tshal gnas pa dag /de dag brtson pas byang
6a7(mdo sde): chub mchog la zhugs/ /la la tshul khrims ma ral srung ba ni/ /rtag tu rnam dag nor bu rin chen bzhin/ /la la spyad pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de dag khrims kyis byang chub mchog la zhugs/ /rgyal sras la la bzod pa'i stobs can te/ /dge slong nga rgyal can dag
6b1(mdo sde): khro ba dang / /de bzhin gshe zhing sdig pa 'ang bzod par byed/ /bzod pas de dag byang chub mchog la zhugs/ /bdag mthong byang chub sems dpa' la la ni/ /rtsed mo dga' ba thams cad rnam spangs te/ /byis pa'i grogs po rnams kyang yongs spangs nas/ /'phags pa
6b2(mdo sde): rnams dang 'grogs dga' mnyam par gzhag / rnam par g.yeng ba'i sems ni rnam spangs nas/ /lo stong bye bar nags dang ri sul na/ /rtse gcig sems su bsam gtan byed pa rnams/ /de dag bsam gtan byang chub mchog la zhugs/ /dge 'dun slob bcas rgyal
6b3(mdo sde): ba mngon sum du/ /bza' dang bca' dang de bzhin zas dang skom/ /na ba'i sman ni mi nyung mang po dag /kha cig de ltar sbyin pa sbyin par byed/ /dge 'dun slob bcas rgyal ba mngon sum du/ /de dag gos brgya bye ba sbyin par byed/ /la la stong phrag bya ba brgya ri dang / /rin
6b4(mdo sde): thang med pa'i gos rnams rab tu 'bul/ /rin po che dang de bzhin tsan dan gyi/ /gtsug lag khang ni bye ba brgya byas nas/ /stan dang mal cha mang pos brgyan pa rnams/ /bde bar gshegs pa rnams la mngon sum 'bul/ /kun dga' ra ba yid 'ong gtsang ma rnams/ /
6b5(mdo sde): me tog 'bras bu sna tshogs ldan pa dag /skyes bu khyu mchog nyan thos btsas pa la/ /la la nyin par zhugs phyir rab tu 'bul/ /dga' ba skyes nas sna tshogs rnam mang po/ /de lta bu yi sbyin pa sbyin par byed/ /byin nas byang chub phyir yang brtson 'grus bskyed/ /sbyin
6b6(mdo sde): pas de dag byang chub mchog la zhugs/ /la la zhi ba'i chos kyang rab 'chad de/ /dpe dang gtan tshigs khrag khrig du ma yis/ /de dag srog chags bye ba stong la ston/ /de dag ye shes byang chub mchog la zhugs/ /byed pa med pa'i chos rab shes pa ni/ /gnyis
6b7(mdo sde): med rab zhugs nam mkha' mtshungs 'dra ba/ /ma chags bde bar gshegs pa'i sras po rnams/ /de dag shes rab byang chub mchog la zhugs/ /bdag gis gzhan yang mthong ba 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /bder gshegs mya ngan 'das pa'i bstan pa la/ /byang chub
7a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' brtan pa mang byung nas/ /rgyal ba'i ring bsrel dag la rim gro byed/ /mchod rten bye ba stong phrag mi nyung ba/ /ji ltar gang gA'i klung gi bye ma bzhin/ /gang gis bye ba'i zhing rnams rtag brgyan pa/ /rgyal sras de dag byed du 'jug pa mthong / /
7a2(mdo sde): rin chen sna bdun mchog gi rgyal mtshan gdugs/ /de na bye ba stong rnams bsgreng ba ni/ /'phang du dpag tshad lnga stong phyin pa ste/ /khor yug tu ni dpag tshad nyis stong yod/ /rnam rgyal ba dan bcas pa khor mor mdzes/ /dril dang dril bu g.yer kha rtag tu 'khrol/ /me tog dri dang
7a3(mdo sde): de bzhin sil snyan gyis/ /lha mi srin po gnod sbyin rnams kyis mchod/ /yongs 'dus shing gi me tog rgyas pa bzhin/ /de ltar phyogs bcu de dag mdzes byas te/ /rgyal ba'i ring bsrel dag la 'di 'dra 'dir/ /bde gshegs sras kyis mchod pa byed du btsud/ /rgyal bas 'od
7a4(mdo sde): zer gcig pu 'di btang bas/ /lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di dag rab rgyas pa/ /bdag dang srog chags bye ba mang po 'dis/ /'di na 'dug bzhin de dag thams cad mthong / /gang gis 'od zer gcig pu deng btang bas/ /zhing rnams stong phrag mang por ston pa de/ /kye ma skyes
7a5(mdo sde): bu khyu mchog de yi mthu/ /kye ma ye shes rgya che zag med do/ /rmad du byung ba tshad med 'di 'dra ba'i/ /ltas rnams mthong nas bdag cag ngo mtshar gyur/ /'di yi don rnams 'jam dbyangs rab ston te/ /sangs rgyas sras rnams the tshom gyur pa stsol/ /'khor bzhi 'di dag rab tu
7a6(mdo sde): dga' sems kyis/ /dpa' bo khyod dang bdag la mngon par lta/ /bde bar gshegs pas de ring ci yi phyir/ /snang ba 'di 'dra 'di ni rab tu btang / /bde gshegs sras po khyod kyis lung ston la/ /dga' ba skyed cing the tshom rnam par sol/ /'di ltar 'od zer rgya chen rab btang ba/ /
7a7(mdo sde): de dag ci 'dra'i don du 'gyur ba zhig /bde bar gshegs pa skyes bu dam pa yis/ /byang chub snying por chos mchog gang brnyes pa/ /de dag 'jig rten mgon po 'dir 'chad dam/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag lung ston tam/ /zhing rnams stong phrag du ma gang bstan pa/ /
7b1(mdo sde): sna tshogs rab tu bkra ba rin chen brgyan/ /mtha' yas spyan can sangs rgyas rnams snang ba/ /'di ni mi chud rgyur 'gyur gor ma chag /rgyal ba'i sras la byams pas kun dris nas/ /lha mi gnod sbyin srin po de dag dga'/ /'jam dbyangs 'dir ni ci zhig lung ston ces/ /'khor
7b2(mdo sde): rnams bzhi po de dag shin tu sdod/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de la smras pa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa chos chen po bsgrags
7b3(mdo sde): pa'i 'bel ba'i gtam mdzad par dgongs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi char chen po mngon par dbab pa dang / chos kyi rnga chen po rab tu brdung ba dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po rab tu bsgreng ba dang / chos kyi sgron ma chen po rab tu 'bar bar
7b4(mdo sde): mdzad pa dang / chos kyi dung chen po rab tu 'bud pa dang / chos kyi rnga bo che chen po rab tu brdung ba dang / chos bstan pa chen po mdzad par dgongs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu dag bdag ji ltar spobs pa dang / ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
7b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams kyi snga ltas 'di lta bu 'di bdag gis mthong ste/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang / 'od zer gyi snang ba 'di btang bas/ bdag ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa yang chos chen po bsgrag pa'i 'bel ba'i gtam mdzad par bzhed pa dang /
7b6(mdo sde): chos chen po bsgrags pa thos par mdzad pa bzhed pas 'di lta bu'i snga ltas 'di mdzad pa snyam byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bsgrag par bzhed pas snga
7b7(mdo sde): ltas cho 'phrul chen po 'od zer rab tu btang ba'i snang ba 'di lta bu 'di ston to/ /rigs kyi bu dag bdag gis dran pa 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa yangs pa dpag tu med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dpag gis mi lang ba tshad med pa de'i pha rol
8a1(mdo sde): gyi yang ches pha rol tu gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams
8a2(mdo sde): kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyi zla sgron ma zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ des chos bstan pa tshangs par spyod pa thog mar dge ba bar du dge ba tha mar dge ba don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa yongs su dag pa yongs su byang ba yang dag par
8a3(mdo sde): ston te 'di lta ste/ nyan thos rnams la ni skye ba dang rga ba dang / na ba dang 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa las shin tu bzla ba'i phyir/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa 'phags pa'i bden pa
8a4(mdo sde): bzhi dang ldan pa/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i chos ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las brtsams te/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi mthar
8a5(mdo sde): thug pa'i chos ston to/ /rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla sgron ma de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla sgron ma zhes bya ba zhig
8a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten du byung ste ma pham pa 'di ltar snga rol dang snga rol brjod pa'i tshul 'dis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla sgron ma zhes bya bar mtshan gcig pa rigs dang gdung gcig pa sha stag ste/ 'di ltar b+ha ra dwa dza'i rigs
8a7(mdo sde): su 'thun pa de bzhin gshegs pa nyi khri byung ngo / /ma pham pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa nyi khri po de dag thog ma'i de bzhin gshegs pa nas tha ma'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar du de dag gis chos bshad pa yang / tshangs par spyod pa thog mar dge ba bar du dge ba tha mar
8b1(mdo sde): dge ba don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa yongs su dag pa yongs su byang ba yang dag par ston te 'di lta ste/ nyan thos rnams la ni skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa
8b2(mdo sde): las shin tu bzla ba'i phyir/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang ldan pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i chos ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
8b3(mdo sde): las brtsams te/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi mthar thug pa'i chos ston to/ /ma pham pa 'di ltar yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla sgron ma de sngon gzhon nur gyur cing
8b4(mdo sde): khab na bzhugs pa las mngon par ma byung ba'i tshe sras brgyad yod par gyur te 'di lta ste/ rgyal bu gzhon nu blo gros zhes bya ba dang / bzang po'i blo gros dang / mtha' yas blo gros dang / dkon mchog blo gros dang / khyad par blo gros dang / the tshom kun bcom dang / dbyangs kyi blo
8b5(mdo sde): gros dang / rgyal bu gzhon nu chos kyi blo gros zhes bya ba yod do/ /ma pham pa bcom ldan 'das nyi zla sgron ma de'i sras rgyal bu gzhon nu brgyad po de dag rdzu 'phrul chen por gyur te/ de dag re re yang gling chen po bzhi la kun tu longs spyod par gyur cing de dag na rgyal po byed do/ /de dag gis
8b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de khab nas mngon par byung bar shes shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par thos nas/ rgyal po'i longs spyod thams cad spangs te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i rjes su rab tu byung nas thams cad kyang bla
8b7(mdo sde): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs te chos smra bar gyur to/ /rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag rtag tu tshangs par spyod cing sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur to/ /ma pham pa de'i tshe na yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
9a1(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla sgron ma des/ nges par bstan pa chen po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs mdo sde shin tu rgyas pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba bshad nas/
9a2(mdo sde): de'i tshe skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du chos kyi gdan chen po de nyid la skyil mo krung bcas te/ mtha' yas nges par bstan pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te sku mi g.yo zhing sems mi g.yo bar gyur nas bzhugs so/ /bcom
9a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das de snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po dang / many+dzu Sha ka dang / many+ju Sha ka chen po dang / lha'i me tog dag gi char chen po mngon par bab ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la mngon par 'thor ro/ /
9a4(mdo sde): thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur te/ 'gul kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg kun tu rab tu ldeg /'khrugs kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so/ /ma pham pa yang de'i tshe 'khor der dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang /
9a5(mdo sde): dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams dang / rgyal phran dang / stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba dang / gling bzhi'i 'khor los sgyur ba
9a6(mdo sde): rnams 'dus nas 'khod par gyur pa 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la lta zhing ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du gyur dga' bar gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla sgron ma de'i smin mtshams kyi bar gyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer
9a7(mdo sde): gcig byung nas de shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi khri byung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad 'od zer de'i 'od kyis shin tu khyab par snang bar gyur te/ ma pham pa 'di lta ste dper na/ da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di dag snang bar gyur pa bzhin no/ /ma
9b1(mdo sde): pham pa yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs 'bring na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag nyi shu 'khod pa dang / 'khor de na chos nyan pa de dag 'od zer chen po'i snang ba des 'jig rten snang bar byas pa mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du gyur te ltad mo cher byung ngo / /ma pham pa
9b2(mdo sde): de'i tshe na yang bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od mchog ces bya ba byung ste de'i slob ma brgyad brgya yod do/ /bcom ldan 'das de yang ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od mchog las brtsams te/ dam
9b3(mdo sde): pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par ston te/ bar gyi bskal pa drug cu tshang bar gdan gcig la bzhugs nas sku mi bskyod/ sems mi g.yo bar bshad do/ /'khor de dag thams cad kyang stan gcig la 'khod de/ lus mi bskyod sems mi g.yo
9b4(mdo sde): bar bar gyi bskal pa drug cur bcom ldan 'das de la chos nyan te/ 'khor de na sems can 'ga' yang lus ngal ba yang med/ sems skyo ba yang med do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla sgron mas bar
9b5(mdo sde): gyi bskal pa drug cu 'das kyi bar du/ dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs mdo sde shin tu rgyas pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba bshad nas/ skad cig de nyid la mya ngan las
9b6(mdo sde): 'da' zhes lha dang bcas bdud dang bcas tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i mdun du/ dge slong dag do mod nam gyi gung thun la de bzhin gshegs pa phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dbyings su yongs su mya
9b7(mdo sde): ngan las 'da'o zhes gsungs so/ /ma pham pa de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla sgron ma des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par
10a1(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan nas 'khor de dag thams cad la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi snying po 'di/ nga'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de bzhin
10a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med pa'i spyan zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/ /ma pham pa de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla sgron ma de'i nub mo nam gyi gung
10a3(mdo sde): thun la/ phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od mchog des blangs te bar gyi bskal pa brgyad cu'i bar du/ bcom
10a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa de'i bstan pa la yang dag par bstan to/ /ma pham pa de la bcom ldan 'das de'i sras blo gros la sogs pa brgyad po de dag byang chub sems dpa' 'od mchog de'i slob mar gyur te/ des de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
10a5(mdo sde): smin par byas so/ /de dag gis de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po mthong ste/ bkur sti byas nas de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de dag gi tha ma ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
10a6(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad yin no/ /slob ma brgyad brgya po de dag las gcig rnyed pa la rab tu gdu ba bkur sti la gdu ba shes kyi khe la gdu ba grags pa 'dod pas/ de la bstan pa'i tshig dang / yi ge mi zin mi chags te de'i ming yang grags
10a7(mdo sde): 'dod ces bya bar gyur to/ /des kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba des sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po mnyes par byas so/ /mnyes par byas nas bsti stang byas/ btsun par byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa dang / bkur ba dang / rim gro byas so/ /ma pham pa de'i tshe de'i
10b1(mdo sde): dus na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od mchog ces bya ba chos smra bar gyur pa de/ gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi 'am yid gnyis sam the tshom za bar gyur na de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kho bo de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' 'od mchog ces
10b2(mdo sde): bya ba chos smra bar gyur to/ /gang yang byang chub sems dpa' grags 'dod ces bya ba le lo can du gyur pa de ni/ ma pham pa khyod nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa' grags 'dod ces bya ba le lo can du gyur pa yin no/ /ma pham pa de ltar kho bos rnam grangs 'dis na bcom
10b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi snga ltas 'di lta bu'i 'od zer btang ba mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyang dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs mdo sde shin tu rgyas pa chen po de bshad par bzhed pa snyam byed do/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas don de nyid rgyas par ston cing de'i
10b4(mdo sde): tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /'das pa'i dus rnams rjes su dran pa ni/ /tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab bskal pa na/ /de tshe rgyal ba byung ba skye dgu'i mchog /mtshan ni nyi zla sgron ma zhes bya ba/ /skye dgu 'dren pa de ni chos ston te/ /sems can mtha' yas bye ba rnam
10b5(mdo sde): par 'dul/ /byang chub sems dpa' bsam yas bye ba stong / /mang po de dag ye shes yang dag 'dzud/ /rnam par 'dren pa gzhon nur gyur pa yi/ /de tshe de'i sras gyur brgyad po dag /thub chen rab tu byung ba de mthong nas/ /'dod spangs thams cad myur bar rab tu byung / /
10b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten mgon po de yi chos bshad pa/ /mtha' yas nges par bstan pa mdo sde mchog /de ming shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo zhes bya/ /srog chags stong phrag bye ba dag la ston/ /rnam par 'dren pa de yis bshad ma thag /de tshe skad cig skyil mo krung bcas nas/ /mtha' yas
10b7(mdo sde): nges bstan ting 'dzin dam pa la/ /thub mchog chos gdan bzhugs nas bsam gtan mdzad/ /lha yi me tog man dA ra ba 'bab/ /ma brdungs par ni rnga yi sgra yang 'byung / /lha dang gnod sbyin par snang gnas 'khod pa/ /rkang gnyis dam pa la ni mchod pa byed/ /zhing rnams
11a1(mdo sde): thams cad de ma thag tu g.yos/ /de na ngo mtshar rmad du byung bar gyur/ /smin mtshams nas ni shin tu mdzes pa yi/ /'dren pas 'od zer gcig po rab btang ba/ /shar gyi phyogs su 'od zer de song bas/ /zhing rnams stong phrag brgyad tshang ba dag /rab tu
11a2(mdo sde): snang bas 'jig rten thams cad mdzes/ /sems can rnams kyi shi 'pho skye ba ston/ /rnam par 'dren pa'i 'od zer de yi mthus/ /de ltar de na la la rin chen zhing / /de bzhin kha dog bai dUr+ya yi mdog /blta na sdug pa sna tshogs snang bar gyur/ /lha dang mi dang de bzhin gnod
11a3(mdo sde): sbyin klu/ /lha yi bu mo dri za mi 'am ci/ /gang rnams bde bar gshegs la mchod brtson pa/ /de dag 'jig rten khams na mchod byed snang / /sangs rgyas rang 'byung de dag nyid kyang snang / /gser gyi mchod sdong lta bur blta na sdug /bai dUr+ya yi dbus na gser gzugs bzhin/ /
11a4(mdo sde): 'khor gyi dbus na chos ni rab tu gsung / /de na nyan thos grangs yod ma yin te/ /bde gshegs nyan thos de snyed tshad med pa/ /so so'i zhing du rnam par 'dren pa yi/ /'od zer 'od kyis de dag thams cad ston/ /brtson 'grus ldan zhing tshul khrims ma nyams te/ /tshul khrims
11a5(mdo sde): skyon med nor bu rin chen 'dra/ /mi mgon sras dag ri yi sul dag na/ /gnas shing spyod pa de dag snang bar gyur/ /bdog pa thams cad ma lus yongs su gtong / /brtan pa bzod pa'i stobs can bsam gtan dga'/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i bye snyed mang / /'od
11a6(mdo sde): zer de yis thams cad rab tu snang / /bskyod pa med cing g.yo ba med par yang / /bzod nas bsam gtan dga' zhing mnyam par bzhag /de dag bsam gtan byang chub mchog zhugs pa/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs kyi sras rnams snang / /yang dag zhi ba zag pa
11a7(mdo sde): med pa'i gnas/ /shin tu shes nas yang dag rab ston te/ /'jig rten khams mang du ni chos kyang 'chad/ /de 'dra'i byed pa bder gshegs mthu yis byung / /nyi ma zla ba sgron ma de yi mthus/ /skyong ba'i 'khor bzhis de dag mthong nas su/ /de tshe thams cad dga'
11b1(mdo sde): bar gnas gyur te/ /'di ltar ci zhig ces ni phan tshun 'dri/ /gnod sbyin lha mis de mchod mi ring bar/ /'jig rten 'dren pa ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs/ /chos smra byang chub sems dpa' gang mkhas pa/ /'od mchog sras la de tshe 'di skad gsungs/ /mkhas pa khyod ni 'jig rten
11b2(mdo sde): mig dang lam/ /nga yi chos 'dzin shin tu yid brtan pas/ /ji ltar srog chags phan phyir ngas bshad pa/ /nga yi chos mdzod 'di la khyod mngon sum/ /byang chub sems dpa' mang po kun bkod de/ /dga' bar byas shing shin tu bsngags bstod nas/ /bar gyi bskal pa drug cu
11b3(mdo sde): tshang bar ni/ /de tshe rgyal ba de yis chos mchog bshad/ /gdan gcig steng bzhugs 'jig rten mgon po des/ /chos mchog dam pa dag ni gang bshad pa/ /de dag thams cad 'od mchog rgyal ba'i sras/ /chos smrar gyur pa de yis shin tu bzung / /rgyal ba des ni chos kyi mchog
11b4(mdo sde): bshad de/ /skye bo du ma rab tu dga' byas nas/ /de yi nyin par lhar bcas 'jig rten mdun/ /rnam par 'dren pa de ni 'di skad gsung / /nga yis chos kyi tshul 'di rab bstan te/ /chos kyi rang bzhin ci 'dra bshad zin gyis/ /dge slong do nub nam gyi gung thun la/ /nga ni mya ngan
11b5(mdo sde): 'da' ba'i dus la bab/ /nga yi bstan pa 'di la rab sbyor la/ /bag med ma yin dad pa snying por gyis/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'das par yang / /rgyal ba drang srong chen po rnyed par dka'/ /rkang gnyis dam pa shin tu myur ba ru/ /mya ngan las ni 'da' ba'i sgra thos nas/ /
11b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas sras rnams mang po mya ngan skyes/ /sdug bsngal rab dang shin tu ldan par gyur/ /srog chags bsam yas bye mang de dag la/ /mi yi dbang po rgyal pos dbugs phyung ba/ /mya ngan nga 'das dge slong ma 'jigs shig /nga yi 'og tu sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni/ /byang chub
11b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' dpal snying mkhas pa 'di/ /zag med ye shes 'di ni rtogs par rig /nga yi byang chub mchog rab 'thob 'gyur te/ /spyan dang yan lag dri med rgyal bar 'ong / /de tshe de yi nam gyi gung thun la/ /rgyu zad me dang 'dra bar mya ngan 'das/ /de yi sku gdung shin tu rgyas
12a1(mdo sde): gyur te/ /mchod rten bye ba khrag khrig mtha' yas so/ /de na dge slong de bzhin dge slong ma/ /gang rnams byang chub mchog la rab zhugs shing / /bde gshegs de yi bstan la mngon brtson pa/ /de dag mi nyung gang gA'i bye ma snyed/ /de tshe chos smrar gang gyur dge slong
12a2(mdo sde): ni/ /gang gis chos de bzung ba 'od mchog ste/ /bar gyi bskal pa brgyad cu tshang bar des/ /bskal pa de la chos mchog rab tu ston/ /de yi slob mar gyur pa brgyad brgya dag /de dag thams cad yongs su smin par byas/ /de dag sangs rgyas bye ba mang po mthong / /drang srong chen
12a3(mdo sde): po de dag bkur sti byas/ /de tshe spyad pa rjes su 'thun spyad nas/ /'jig rten mang po khams su sangs rgyas gyur/ /gcig 'og gcig tu de dag rjes bzhin du/ /byang chub mchog tu gcig gis gcig lung bstan/ /sangs rgyas de dag rim gyis byung ba yi/ /tha mar gyur pa
12a4(mdo sde): mar me mdzad pa ste/ /lha yi lha mchog drang srong mang po'i mchog /srog chags bye ba stong yang rnam par btul/ /gang sngon bde bar gshegs pa de yi sras/ /de yi tshe na 'od mchog chos smra ba'i/ /slob ma sred dang ldan zhing le lo can/ /shes kyi khe dang rnyed pa tshol ba dang / /shin tu
12a5(mdo sde): grags pa 'dod pa'i shas che zhing / /grong nas grong du rgyu bar gyur pa ste/ /de yi kha ton lung nos de bzhin kun/ /de yi tshe na bshad pa rnams mi zin/ /de yi ming yang 'di zhes bya bar gyur/ /grags pa 'dod ces phyogs su rnam par grags/ /de yang dge ba rnams kyi las de
12a6(mdo sde): dag / 'dren mar gyur pa mngon par 'dus byas pas/ /sangs rgyas stong phrag bye ba mnyes byas te/ /de dag mchod pa rgya cher byas par gyur/ /rjes su 'thun pa'i spyod pa rab spyad nas/ /sangs rgyas shAkya seng ge 'di yang mthong / /de ni 'dir yang tha mar byung ba ste/ /rjes bzhin
12a7(mdo sde): byang chub mchog kyang 'thob 'gyur ba/ /byams pa'i rigs su bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur/ /srog chags stong phrag bye ba rnam par 'dul/ /bder gshegs mya ngan 'das pa'i bstan pa la/ /de tshe le lo can du gang gyur pa/ /de na de 'drar gyur pa khyod nyid do/ /de tshe chos
12b1(mdo sde): smrar gyur pa kho bo ste/ /kho bos de dang de yi rgyu dang bzhis/ /ye shes grags pa de yi ltas byung ba/ /sngon tshe de na kho bos mthong gyur pa/ /de 'dra'i ltas 'di deng yang mthong bas na/ /nges par rgyal ba'i dbang po kun tu spyan/ /shAkya'i rgyal chen don dam gzigs pas kyang / /
12b2(mdo sde): de tshe kho bos rnam grangs mchog thos gang / /de dag nyid ni 'dis kyang bshad par dgongs/ /de yi ltas nyid de ring yongs rdzogs kyis/ /rnam par 'dren pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa/ /shAkya seng ge yang dag 'jog mdzad de/ /chos kyi dngos nyid phyag rgya ston par 'gyur/ /
12b3(mdo sde): thal mo sbyar te sems bzang brtson par gyis/ /'jig rten phan zhing thugs brtse ston gyur te/ /mtha' yas pa yi chos kyi char pa 'bab/ /gang dag byang chub phyir zhugs ngoms par mdzad/ /byang chub sems dpa' byang chub phyir zhugs pa/ /gang dag mkhas pa nyid las skyes
12b4(mdo sde): gyur pa/ /de dag rnams kyi som nyi gang yin dang / /yid gnyis the tshom gang yin de sel gyur/ /dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste dang po'o// //bam po gnyis pa/ de
12b5(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das dran pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs so/ /bzhengs nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri dwa ta'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis thugs su chud pa/
12b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni zab pa mthong bar dka' ba rtogs par dka' ba ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shes par dka'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ sangs
12b7(mdo sde): rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur mdzad mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod pa spyad spyad pa/ yun ring po nas rjes su zhugs pa/ brtson 'grus mdzad mdzad pa ste/ ngo mtshar
13a1(mdo sde): dang rmad du byung ba'i chos dang ldan zhing shes par dka' ba'i chos rnams mkhyen pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ldem por dgongs te bshad pa ni shes par dka'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang
13a2(mdo sde): gis rig pa'i chos rnams thabs mkhas pa dang / ye shes mthong ba dang / rgyu dang / gzhi dang / dmigs pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / rnam par rig byed sna tshogs rnams kyis yang dag par ston te/ thabs mkhas pa de dang de dag gis sems can de dang de la chags pa rnams rab
13a3(mdo sde): tu 'grel pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni thabs mkhas pa chen po dang / ye shes mthong ba dam pa'i pha rol tu byon pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
13a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams ni/ chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang / stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang ma 'dres pa dang dbang po dang stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rmad
13a5(mdo sde): du byung ba'i chos dang ldan te/ chos rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni ngo mtshar chen po brnyes pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu de tsam gyis bshad pa chog par gyis shig /shA ri'i bu de
13a6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni ngo mtshar mchog brnyes pa ste/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang mkhyen pa'i chos de yang de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la 'chad do/ /shA ri'i bu chos thams cad kyang
13a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ston to/ /chos thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen te chos de dag gang yin pa dang / chos de dag ji lta bu yin pa dang / chos de dag ci 'dra ba dang / chos de dag gi mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang / chos de dag gi ngo bo nyid ci yin pa dang /
13b1(mdo sde): chos de dag gang yin pa dang / ji lta bu yin pa dang ci 'dra ba dang / mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang ngo bo nyid ci yin pa yang mkhyen to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgyas par ston cing de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/ /
13b2(mdo sde): dpa' bo chen po dpag med pa/ /rnam 'dren sems can thams cad kyis/ /rnam pa kun tu shes mi nus/ /de dag stobs dang rnam thar dang / /'jigs med gang dag ci 'dra dang / /sangs rgyas chos rnams ci 'dra ba/ /sus kyang shes par mi nus so/ /sangs rgyas bye ba'i gan
13b3(mdo sde): dag na/ /zab cing shin tu phra ba dang / /rig dka' mthong bar dka' ba yi/ /spyod pa dag ni sngan chad bsnyen/ /bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su/ /spyod pa de dag spyad pa yi/ /'bras bu de ni ci 'dra ba/ /byang chub snying por ngas mthong ngo / /de ni 'jig rten rnam 'dren pa/ /gzhan dag dang
13b4(mdo sde): ni ngas kyang de/ /ci lta yin dang ci 'dra dang / /de yi mtshan nyid ci 'dra shes/ /de ni bstan du mi nus te/ /de ni brjod du yong med do/ /mos pa la ni gang gnas pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs par/ /gang la chos de bstan pa dang / /bstan pa dag kyang shes pa yi/ /de
13b5(mdo sde): 'dra'i sems can su yang ni/ /'jig rten dag na yod ma yin/ /gang dag 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i nyan thos pa/ /lhag par byas pa bde bar gshegs pas bsngags/ /zag zad tha ma'i lus 'dzin de dag gi/ /yul ni rgyal ba'i ye shes 'di la med/ /gal te 'jig rten de
13b6(mdo sde): dag thams cad du/ /shA ri'i bu dang 'dra bas gang gyur te/ /gcig tu 'dus par gyur nas rnam bsams kyang / /de dag bder gshegs ye shes shes mi nus/ /gal te khyod dang 'dra ba'i mkhas rnams kyis/ /phyogs rnams bcu car gang bar gyur pa dang / /gang yang
13b7(mdo sde): nga yi nyan thos 'di gzhan rnams/ /de dag gis kyang de bzhin gang gyur te/ /de dag thams cad gcig tu deng 'dus nas/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i ye shes rnam bsams kyang / /ji tsam tshad med ye shes ngas shes pa/ /thams cad 'dus pas shes par mi nus so/ /
14a1(mdo sde): zag pa med par gyur pa'i rang sangs rgyas/ /dbang po rno ba tha ma'i lus 'dzin pas/ /ji ltar smyig dang 'dam bu'i tshal bzhin du/ /phyogs bcu thams cad gang bar gyur pa dag /gcig tu 'dus nas rnam par bsams byas kyang / /nga yi chos kyi mchog gi
14a2(mdo sde): phyogs tsam yang / /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mtha' yas su/ /de yi yang dag don ni yong mi shes/ /byang chub sems dpa' theg par gsar zhugs pa/ /sangs rgyas bye ba mang la bya ba byas/ /shin tu nges don chos smra mang po rnams/ /de dag gis kyang phyogs bcu gang
14a3(mdo sde): gyur te/ /smyig dang 'dam bu bzhin du 'jig rten kun/ /bar mtshams med par rtag tu gang gyur la/ /gcig tu 'dus nas rnam par sems byed cing / /shes rab phra bas gzhan du mi sems par/ /bskal pa bye ba mang po dpag med pa/ /gang gA'i bye ma snyed du bsam byas
14a4(mdo sde): kyang / /chos gang bde bar gshegs pas mngon gzigs pa/ /'di la de dag rnams kyi yul med do/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang / /mi nyung gang gA'i bye ma snyed rnams kyis/ /gzhan du mi sems rnam par bsams byas kyang / /'di la de dag gi yang yul
14a5(mdo sde): med do/ /zab cing shin tu phra ba'i chos rtogs shing / /rtog pa med la thams cad zag med pa/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rgyal ba de dag dang / /ngas ni 'di na de dag ci 'dra shes/ /gzhan min gsung ba rgyal ba drang srong che/ /yun ring dus na mchog gi don 'chad kyis/ /bde
14a6(mdo sde): bar gshegs pas gang bstan de la ni/ /mos pa phun sum tshogs byos shA ri'i bu/ /nyan thos pa ni 'di dag thams cad dang / /rang sangs rgyas su mi gang zhugs pa dang / /mya ngan 'das la ngas ni gang bkod cing / /sdug bsngal rgyud las yang dag dkrol la bsgo/ /gang
14a7(mdo sde): phyir 'jig rten du ni chos mang bshad/ /de dang de la chags pa rab dgrol zhing / /theg pa gsum dag nye bar bstan pa ni/ /de dag nga yi thabs mkhas mchog yin no/ /de nas 'khor de na kun shes kauN+Di n+ya la sogs pa nyan thos chen po gang dag dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa
14b1(mdo sde): dbang dang ldan par gyur pa stong nyis brgya dang / gzhan yang gang dag nyan thos kyi theg pa la zhugs pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma dag dang / gang yang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la zhugs pa de dag thams cad 'di snyam du sems te/
14b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa cher bsngags pa dang / chos zab mo de yang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes gsung zhing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shes par dka'o zhes gsungs pa'i rgyu ni gang /
14b3(mdo sde): gzhi ni ci zhig /'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par grol ba gcig go/ /zhes bka' stsal to/ /bdag cag rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams rnyed par 'gyur zhing mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa yin mod kyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa de'i don bdag cag
14b4(mdo sde): gis ma rig go snyam mo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'khor bzhi po de dag som nyi dang the tshom za bar rig ste sems kyi rnam par rtogs pa sems kyis shes nas/ bdag nyid kyang chos la the tshom za bar gyur te de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom
14b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa mkhyen pa'i chos bstan pa yang dang yang bsngags pa mdzad pa dang / chos zab mo ngas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bgyi ba dang / ldem por dgongs te bshad pa
14b6(mdo sde): yang shes par dka'o zhes yang dang yang gsungs pa'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu sngon chad ma thos te/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor bzhi po 'di dag kyang the tshom dang som nyi 'tshal na/ /de bzhin
14b7(mdo sde): gshegs pas ci la dgongs te de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos zab mo yang dang yang gsung ba mdzad pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par bshad du gsol/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /stobs dang rnam thar bsam
15a1(mdo sde): gtan dag / dpag tu med pa ngas thob ces/ /ring nas mi yi nyi ma yis/ /deng gdong bka' mchid 'di 'dra mdzad/ /khyod la zhu ba ma mchis par/ /byang chub snying po'ang brjod pa mdzad/ /khyod la su yang mi zhu bar/ /ldem por dgongs te bshad pa brjod/ /
15a2(mdo sde): ma zhus par ni gsung mdzad de/ /nyid kyi spyod pa bsngags pa mdzad/ /ye shes brnyes pa brjod mdzad cing / /zab mo dag kyang rab bshad pas/ /dbang ldan gyur cing zag med pa/ /mya ngan 'das par gang bzhugs rnams/ /rgyal ba ci zhig gsung snyam ste/ /de ring 'di dag
15a3(mdo sde): the tshom 'gyur/ /rang rgyal byang chub gang 'tshal ba/ /dge slong de bzhin dge slong ma/ /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / /lto 'phye che dang dri za dag /the tshom 'tshal zhing rnam sems te/ /de dag phan tshun gtam mchi zhing / /rkang gnyis mchog la rab blta na/ /thub pa chen po
15a4(mdo sde): lung bstan gsol/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams/ /'di na ji snyed mchis pa kun/ /de yi nang na bdag mchog ces/ /drang srong mchog gis bstan lags na/ /mi yi gtso bo nyid kyi gnas/ /'di la bdag kyang the tshom 'tshal/ /mya ngan 'das mthar bdag phyin
15a5(mdo sde): tam/ /'on te bdag la spyod bstan tam/ /rnga mchog dbyangs kyis rab tu gsung phyung ste/ /chos 'di ji lta lags pa bshad du gsol/ /rgyal sras thugs sras mchis pa 'di dag rnams/ /thal mo sbyar bar bgyis nas rgyal la lta/ /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin srin por
15a6(mdo sde): bcas/ /bye ba stong phrag gang gA'i bye ma snyed/ /byang chub mchog 'di 'tshal ba gang lags pa/ /brgyad khri tshang bar gang mchis de dag dang / /sa bdag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gang / /bye ba stong gi zhing nas lhags pa dag /spyod pa ji ltar yongs su rdzogs bgyi
15a7(mdo sde): zhes/ /thams cad thal mo sbyar te gus par mchis/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu don 'di bshad pas ci zhig bya/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu don 'di bshad na lha dang
15b1(mdo sde): bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di dngangs par 'gyur ro/ /yang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la lan gnyis su gsol ba btab pa/ don 'di nyid bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
15b2(mdo sde): 'das 'khor 'di na srog chags brgya phrag mang po/ srog chags stong phrag mang po/ srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po sngon gyi sangs rgyas mthong ba shes rab dang ldan pa gang dag /bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa la dad
15b3(mdo sde): pa dang yid ches pa dang 'dzin par 'gyur ba mchis so/ /de nas de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsol to/ /srog chags stong rnams 'khor na mchis pa dag /dad dga' bde bar gshegs la gus pa ste/ /khyod kyis chos bstan de dag 'tshal bar
15b4(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /mi dbang rgyal po gsal bar bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la lan gnyis su yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu don 'di bshad pas ci zhig bya/ shA ri'i bu don 'di bshad na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten
15b5(mdo sde): 'di dngangs par 'gyur te/ /dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du gyur pa rnams g.yang sa chen por lhung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /nga yi chos 'di bshad pas chog /ye shes 'di phra brtag mi nus/ /
15b6(mdo sde): byis pa mang 'khod nga rgyal can/ /nga yis chos bshad mi shes spong / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du yang gsol ba btab pa don 'di nyid/ bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/ bcom
15b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'khor 'di na bdag dang 'dra ba brgya phrag mang du mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das srog chags brgya phrag mang po srog chags stong phrag mang po srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dag bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi srid pa
16a1(mdo sde): dag na yongs su smin par mdzad pa gzhan dag kyang mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa la dad par 'gyur yid ches par 'gyur 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /de yang de dag gi yun ring po'i don dang sman pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus
16a2(mdo sde): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog gis chos bshad gsol/ /khyod la sras kyi thu bo bdag gsol pa/ /'di na srog chags bye ba stong mchis pa/ /de dag khyod kyis chos bshad 'di dad 'gyur/ /sngon gyi srid pa rnams su khyod kyis
16a3(mdo sde): gang / /yun ring rtag tu sems can smin mdzad pa/ /de kun thal mo sbyar te 'di na mchis/ /de dag chos 'di la ni dad par 'gyur/ /bdag 'dra brgya phrag bcu gnyis 'di dag dang / /gang dag byang chub mchog tu zhugs pa dag /de la gzigs nas bde gshegs rab bshad de/ /
16a4(mdo sde): de dag dga' ba mchog kyang bskyed du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus lan gsum gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la lan gsum gyi bar
16a5(mdo sde): du gsol ba 'debs na/ shA ri'i bu de ltar gsol ba 'debs pa la khyod la ji skad byas/ shA ri'i bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal ma thag tu/ 'khor de nas dge slong dang
16a6(mdo sde): dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma lhag pa'i nga rgyal can lnga stong stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'khor de nas dong ngo / /'di ltar lhag pa'i nga rgyal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba ma thob par ni thob par 'du shes/ khong du ma
16a7(mdo sde): ma chud par ni khong du chud par 'du shes pa de dag rang gi skyon shes te/ 'khor de nas dong ba la bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu nga'i 'khor shin te
16b1(mdo sde): ma med par gyur te/ shA ri'i bu snying po ma yin pa med par gyur la dad pa'i snying po la gnas te lhag pa'i nga rgyal can de dag dong ba yang legs so/ /shA ri'i bu de lta bas na de'i don bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas/ shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar
16b2(mdo sde): nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni brgya la res 'ga' zhig 'di lta bu'i chos bstan pa gsung ngo / /'di lta ste dper na/ u dum bA ra'i tshal la me tog ni brgya la res 'ga' 'byung ngo / /shA ri'i bu de bzhin du
16b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa yang brgya la res 'ga' zhig chos bstan pa 'di lta bu gsung ngo / /shA ri'i bu nga la yid ches par gyis shig nga ni bden par smra ba'o/ /nga ni yang dag par smra ba'o/ /nga ni gzhan ma yin par smra ba'o/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ldem por dgongs te
16b4(mdo sde): bshad pa'i don khong du chud par dka'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu ngas nges pa'i tshig dang bstan pa dang brjod pa dang dpe sna tshogs dang thabs la mkhas pa rnam pa brgya stong dag gis chos rab tu bshad pa ni brtag tu med cing rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir te/ shA ri'i
16b5(mdo sde): bu chos de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen par bya ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu bya ba gcig dang byed pa gcig dang bya ba chen po dang byed pa chen po'i phyir/ /bya ba gang dang byed pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
16b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten du 'byung ba'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba gcig po dang byed pa gcig po dang bya ba chen po dang byed pa chen po dang bya ba gang dang byed pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung
16b7(mdo sde): ba gang zhe na/ de ni sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba yang dag par 'dzin du gzud pa'i rgyu'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung ngo / /sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs
17a1(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes mthong ba yang dag par bstan pa'i rgyu'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung ngo / /sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba la zhugs pa'i rgyu'i phyir/
17a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung ngo / /sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba khong du chud par bya ba'i rgyu'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig
17a3(mdo sde): rten du 'byung ngo / /sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i lam du gzud pa'i rgyu'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ shA ri'i bu de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba gcig po dang byed pa
17a4(mdo sde): gcig po dang bya ba chen po dang byed pa chen po dang 'jig rten du 'byung ba'i dgongs pa gcig pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas bya ba gcig po dang byed pa gcig po dang bya ba chen po dang byed pa chen po de de bzhin gshegs pas mdzad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i
17a5(mdo sde): bu nga ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu nga ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba yang dag par ston pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu nga ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba la 'jug par byed pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu nga ni de
17a6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba khong du chud par byed pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu nga ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i lam la 'dzud pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu nga yang theg pa gcig las brtsams te sems can rnams la chos ston pa 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
17a7(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar thug pa ste/ theg pa gnyis sam gsum zhes bya ba gang yang med do/ /shA ri'i bu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad na yang chos nyid ni 'di'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
17b1(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa'i dus na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med pa rnams su byung ste/ sems can mos pa tha dad pa dang khams dang bsam pa tha dad pa rnams kyi bsam pa mkhyen nas skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye
17b2(mdo sde): bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir sna tshogs mngon par bsgrub pa bstan pa dang rgyu dang gzhi dang dpe dang dmigs pa dang nges pa'i tshig dang thabs la mkhas pa rnam pa sna
17b3(mdo sde): tshogs kyis chos bstan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang / shA ri'i bu theg pa gcig las brtsams nas sems can rnams la chos bstan te de yang 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar thug pa ste/ gang 'di sems
17b4(mdo sde): can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid yang dag par 'dzin du 'dzud pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid ston pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid la 'jug par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid khong du
17b5(mdo sde): chud par byed pa/ sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid kyi lam du 'jug par byed pa'i chos ston te/ shA ri'i bu 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag las sems can gang dag gis chos de thos
17b6(mdo sde): pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to/ /shA ri'i bu ma 'ongs pa'i dus na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med pa rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag
17b7(mdo sde): 'byung ba/ sems can mos pa tha dad pa dang bsam pa dang khams tha dad pa rnams kyi bsam pa mkhyen nas/ skye bo mang po la phan pa dang skye bo mang po la bde ba dang 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang skye bo phal po che dang lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir sna tshogs
18a1(mdo sde): mngon par bsgrub pa bstan pa dang rgyu dang gzhi dang dpe dang dmigs pa dang nges pa'i tshig dang thabs mkhas pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis chos ston par 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang / shA ri'i bu theg pa gcig las brtsams nas
18a2(mdo sde): sems can rnams la chos ston par 'gyur te/ de yang 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar thug pa ste/ gang 'di sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
18a3(mdo sde): ye shes mthong ba nyid ston pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid la 'jug par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid khong du chud par byed pa/ sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid kyi lam du 'jug par byed pa'i
18a4(mdo sde): chos ston par 'gyur te/ /shA ri'i bu ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag las sems can gang dag chos nyan pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu
18a5(mdo sde): da ltar byung ba'i dus na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa/ sems can mos pa tha dad pa dang khams dang bsam pa tha
18a6(mdo sde): dad pa rnams kyi bsam pa mkhyen nas/ skye bo mang po la phan pa dang skye bo mang po la bde ba dang 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang skye bo phal po che dang lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir sna tshogs mngon par bsgrub pa bstan pa dang rgyu dang gzhi dang dpe dang dmigs
18a7(mdo sde): pa dang nges pa'i tshig dang / thabs mkhas pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang / shA ri'i bu theg pa gcig las brtsams nas sems can rnams la chos ston te/ de yang 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
18b1(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar thug pa ste/ gang 'di sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid ston pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid la 'jug
18b2(mdo sde): par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid khong du chud par byed pa/ sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid kyi lam du 'jug par byed pa'i chos ston te/ shA ri'i bu da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
18b3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag las/ sems can gang dag chos nyan pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nga yang
18b4(mdo sde): sems can mos pa tha dad pa dang khams dang bsam pa tha dad pa rnams kyi bsam pa mkhyen nas/ skye bo mang po la phan pa dang skye bo mang po la bde ba dang 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang skye bo phal po che dang lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/ sna
18b5(mdo sde): tshogs mngon par bsgrub pa bstan pa dang rgyu dang gzhi dang dpe dang dmigs pa dang nges pa'i tshig dang thabs mkhas pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis chos ston to/ /shA ri'i bu nga yang theg pa gcig las brtsams nas sems can rnams la chos ston te/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
18b6(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar thug pa ste/ gang 'di'i sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid ston pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid la 'jug par
18b7(mdo sde): byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid khong du chud par byed pa/ sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid kyi lam du 'jug par byed pa'i chos ston te/ shA ri'i bu sems can gang dag da ltar nga la 'di ltar chos nyan pa de dag thams cad
19a1(mdo sde): kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ 'di ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang na yang theg pa gnyis su gdags pa yang med na gsum du lta ga la yod/ 'on kyang de
19a2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam bskal pa'i snyigs ma las byung ngam sems can gyi snyigs ma'am/ nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma'am/ lta ba'i snyigs ma'am/ tshe'i snyigs ma las byung na/ shA ri'i bu 'di lta bur bskal pa dang
19a3(mdo sde): 'khrul pa'i snyigs ma dang dri ma mang po dang brkam pa'i sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba de'i tshe/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams thabs mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi theg pa gcig po de las theg pa gsum du bshad de
19a4(mdo sde): bstan to/ /shA ri'i bu de ltar gang nyan thos sam dgra bcom pa'am rang sangs rgyas rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa la mi nyan mi 'jug khong du chud par mi byed pa de dag ni/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos
19a5(mdo sde): ma yin par rig par bya'o/ /dgra bcom pa yang ma yin rang sangs rgyas kyang ma yin par rig par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu yang dge slong ngam dge slong ma la la dgra bcom par khas 'che zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam yongs su mi 'dzin te/
19a6(mdo sde): nga ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bcad pa'o zhes zer zhing nga'i lus 'di tha ma mya ngan las 'da' ba'o zhes zer ba ni/ shA ri'i bu de lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu dge slong dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du
19a7(mdo sde): gyur te/ chos 'di thos nas dad par mi 'gyur ba'i go skabs med cing gnas ma yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ni ma gtogs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe/ mdo sde
19b1(mdo sde): 'di lta bu 'di 'dzin pa 'am 'chang ba'i nyan thos mi 'byung ste/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzhan las chos 'di la the tshom med par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu nga la dad par gyis shig yid ches par gyis shig rtogs par gyis
19b2(mdo sde): shig shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la du smra ba med de/ shA ri'i bu theg pa 'di ni gcig tu zad de 'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das don de nyid rgyas par ston cing de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /nga rgyal can gyi
19b3(mdo sde): dge slong dang / /dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang / /dge bsnyen ma rnams ma dad pa/ /lnga stong las ni mi nyung ba/ /bslab pa zhig ral ldan pa rnams/ /nyes pa 'di dag mthong gyur nas/ /skyon rnams yongs su sbed pa'i phyir/ /byis pa'i blo can de dag dong / /gang gis
19b4(mdo sde): chos 'di nyan par 'gyur ba yi/ /de dag la ni dge ba de med de/ /'khor gyi snyigs ma nyid du mkhyen nas su/ /'jig rten mgon po ngas kyang bstsal ba yin/ /nga yi 'khor ni legs par 'khod/ /shun pa med cing dag pa ste/ /snying po ma yin kun med gyur/ /'di dag
19b5(mdo sde): snying po rab tu gnas/ /skyes bu dam pa skyob pa sangs rgyas dag /thabs la mkhas pa brgya phrag du ma yis/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos ni ci gsung ba/ /ci 'dra nga la nyon cig shA ri'i bu/ /de dag spyod pa bsam pa ci 'dra'ang mkhyen/ /srog chags bye ba mos pa
19b6(mdo sde): tha dad pa/ /de dag sngan chad dge ba ci byas dang / /las rnams sna tshogs dag ni mkhyen nas su/ /nges pa'i tshig dang gzhi rnams sna tshogs kyis/ /srog chags de dag khong du chud par byed/ /ngas ni rgyu dang dpe yang brgya dag gis/ /sems can de lta de ltar mgu bar byas/ /
19b7(mdo sde): mdo sde de bzhin tshigs su bcad pa'ang bshad/ /de lta byung dang skyes rabs rmad byung dang / /gleng gzhi de bzhin gtan la dbab pa dang / /dbyangs bsnyad dpe brgya sna tshogs rnams kyis bshad/ /mi mkhas gang dag dman la mngon dga' zhing / /sangs rgyas bye ba mang
20a1(mdo sde): la spyod ma spyad/ /'khor bar chags shing shin tu sdug bsngal ba/ /de la mya ngan 'da' ba nye bar bstan/ /sangs rgyas ye shes rab tu rtogs bya'i phyir/ /da ltar rang byung ba ni thabs mdzad de/ /khyed cag sangs rgyas su yang 'grub bo zhes/ /de rnams la ni
20a2(mdo sde): re shig mi gsung ngo / /ci'i phyir zhe na skyob pa dus la bzhes/ /dal ba gzigs te de nas gdod 'chad do/ /dal ba de ni brgya la deng thob pas/ /de phyir yang dag nges pa 'dir bshad do/ /nga yi bstan pa yan lag dgu po yang / /sems can dag gi mthu dang stobs las
20a3(mdo sde): bshad/ /'di ltar thabs kyis mchog sbyin ye shes la/ /rab tu gzud pa'i phyir ni ngas bshad do/ /gang dag rtag tu rnam par dag gyur pa/ /gsal gtsang rab tu des pa sangs rgyas sras/ /sangs rgyas bye ba mang la lhag byas pa/ /de dag la ni rab rgyas mdo rnams
20a4(mdo sde): bshad/ /'di ltar de dag bsam pa rdzogs pa dang / /rnam par dag pa'i tshul dang ldan gyur pa/ /de dag la ni ma 'ongs dus na yang / /phan zhing brtse ba'i sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes gsung / /thos nas 'gro mchog sangs rgyas 'gyur snyam ste/ /thams cad shin tu dga'
20a5(mdo sde): bas khyab par 'gyur/ /de dag spyod pa rnams kyang ngas shes nas/ /shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde rab tu bshad/ /'di ltar 'dren pa'i nyan thos de dag las/ /gang dag nga yis bstan pa 'di thos pa/ /tshigs bcad gcig tsam thos sam bzung yang rung / /thams cad
20a6(mdo sde): the tshom med par byang chub 'gyur/ /theg pa tha dad par ni gang ston pa/ /skyes mchog rnams kyi thabs mkhas ma gtogs par/ /theg pa gcig ste gnyis su yod ma yin/ /'jig rten na ni nam yang gsum du med/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes bstan pa'i
20a7(mdo sde): phyir/ /'jig rten du yang 'jig rten mgon po byung / /bya ba gcig ste gnyis su yod ma yin/ /sangs rgyas theg pa dman pas mi 'dren to/ /rang 'byung bdag nyid ci la gnas pa dang / /sangs rgyas ji lta bu dang ci 'dra ba/ /stobs dang bsam gtan rnam
20b1(mdo sde): thar dbang po rnams/ /de dag nyid la sems can rab tu 'jog /byang chub rdul med dam pa thob nas su/ /theg pa dman la sems can gcig bkod na/ /'di ni nga yi legs pa ma yin te/ /ser sna'i nyes pa'ang nga la yod par 'gyur/ /nga la ser sna dag ni cung zad med/ /
20b2(mdo sde): nga la phrag dog med cing 'dod chags med/ /sdig pa'i chos rnams thams cad ngas bshad de/ /de phyir 'gro ba rtogs pas nga sangs rgyas/ /ji ltar mtshan rnams kyis ni nga brgyan te/ /'jig rten 'di dag thams cad rab snang byed/ /srog chags brgya phrag du mas mdun
20b3(mdo sde): bltas shing / /chos kyi rang bzhin phyag rgya 'di bshad do/ /nga ni 'di snyam sems te shA ri'i bu/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi gzugs ldan zhing / /bdag 'od rang byung 'jig rten rig par yang / /de ltar ci nas sems can kun 'gyur snyam/ /ji ltar mthong zhing ji ltar
20b4(mdo sde): bsams pa dang / /nga yis sngan chad ji ltar brnags pa de/ /nga yi smon lam de dag yongs rdzogs te/ /byang chub sangs rgyas nas ni ma bstan to/ /sems can rnams la byang chub 'dun skyed ces/ /ngas ni de skad smras na shA ri'i bu/ /mi shes sems can rnams ni
20b5(mdo sde): 'dir myos te/ /nga yi legs bshad 'dzin par gzhar mi 'gyur/ /de dag 'di 'dra'i tshul du ngas shes te/ /tshe rabs snga mar spyod pa rnams ma spyad/ /'dod pa'i yon tan rnams la chags shing zhen/ /sred pas brgyal zhing gti mug myos pa rnams/ /de dag 'dod
20b6(mdo sde): rgyus ngan 'gror rab tu ltung / /'gro ba drug tu kun tu nyon mongs te/ /dur khrod de dag phyi phyir 'phel bar byed/ /bsod nams chung bas sdug bsngal kun gyis gzir/ /lta ba'i thibs por rtag tu rnam par chags/ /yod dang med dang de bzhin yod med pa/ /ltar
20b7(mdo sde): gyur drug cu gnyis la brten nas su/ /dngos po med la yongs su 'dzin cing gnas/ /sbyang bar dka' zhing log byed nga rgyal can/ /byis pa thos nyung yon po g.yo byed rnams/ /tshe rabs bye ba phrag stong nam du yang / /de dag sangs rgyas sgra 'di mi thos so/ /nga yi
21a1(mdo sde): thabs kyis de la shA ri'i bu/ /sdug bsngal mthar phyung shig ces de skad rmas/ /sems can sdug bsngal gzir ba mthong bas na/ /de dag mya ngan 'das pa nye bar bstan/ /'di ltar ngas ni chos rnams 'di dag kun/ /gdod nas rab zhi mya ngan rtag
21a2(mdo sde): 'das bshad/ /sangs rgyas sras de spyod pa kun rdzogs nas/ /phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe la rgyal bar 'gyur/ /theg pa gsum du gang rnams bstan pa ni/ /nga yi thabs mkhas tshul ni de 'dra ste/ /theg pa gcig ste de bzhin tshul yang gcig /de ltar 'dren pa rnams kyis bshad
21a3(mdo sde): pa gcig / gang 'dir la la the tshom yod pa dag /the tshom za dang de bzhin som nyi spongs/ /gzhan du mi gsung 'jig rten 'dren pa rnams/ /theg pa 'di ni gcig ste gnyis su med/ /sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa gang byung ba/ /sangs rgyas stong ngam mya ngan yongs
21a4(mdo sde): 'das shing / /'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med la/ /gang dag tshad ni nam yang yong med pa/ /skyes bu dam pa de dag thams cad kyis/ /dpe dang gzhi dang rgyu dang bcas pa dang / /thabs la mkhas pa brgya phrag du ma yis/ /rnam par dag pa'i chos rnams rab
21a5(mdo sde): bshad pa/ /de dag thams cad theg pa gcig ston cing / /srog chags stong phrag bye ba bsam yas rnams/ /theg pa gcig po la yang rab 'dzud de/ /theg pa gcig la yongs su smin par byed/ /mos dang de bzhin bsam pa rnams mkhyen nas/ /de bzhin gshegs
21a6(mdo sde): pas lhar bcas 'jig rten du/ /rgyal ba'i thabs gzhan rnam pa mang po dag /gang gis chos mchog 'di ni rab bstan pa/ /sems can gang gis de las mngon sum der/ /chos nyan pa dang 'on te thos ldan pa/ /sbyin pa sbyin zhing tshul khrims spyod pa dang / /bzod
21a7(mdo sde): pas spyod pa thams cad bsgrubs pa dang / /brtson 'grus bsam gtan lhag par byas pa dang / /shes rab kyis ni chos 'di rnam bsams te/ /rnam pa tha dad bsod nams sus byas pa/ /de dag thams cad byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i rgyal ba de dag
21b1(mdo sde): gi/ /bstan pa de la sems can gang zhugs te/ /de na bzod cing zhi la dul ba ni/ /de dag thams cad byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba mya ngan 'das pa de dag gi/ /rgyal ba'i ring bsrel dag la su mchod cing / /rin chen mchod rten stong phrag du ma dag /gser dang
21b2(mdo sde): dngul dang 'on te shel gyi 'am/ /rdo yi snying po'i mchod rten gang gis byas/ /bai dUr+ya mchog de bzhin an da rnyil/ /la las mu tig ke ke ru las byas/ /de dag gis kyang byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /gang gis mchod rten rdo las byas pa dang / /gang gis a ga ru dang
21b3(mdo sde): tsan dan nam/ /gang gis thang shing mchod rten byas pa dang / /la las shing mang gzhan las byas pa dang / /sa dang so phag las ni brtsigs pa yi/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten dga' zhing byas pa dang / /de phyir sa rdul phung po dag las kyang / /mya ngam dgon pa
21b4(mdo sde): dag tu byas pa dang / /byis pa rtsed mor de dang de dag tu/ /gang gis rgyal ba de phyir mchod rten dag /bye ma las ni phung po byas pa yang / /de rnams kyis kyang byang chub thob par gyur/ /la las de bzhin rin chen gzugs byas pa/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang
21b5(mdo sde): ldan pa'i gzugs/ /gang gis de phyir byas pa de dag kyang / /de dag thams cad byang chub thob par gyur/ /la las der ni rin chen sna bdun dang / /la las de bzhin zangs dang khar ba las/ /bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi gzugs byas pa/ /de dag thams cad
21b6(mdo sde): byang chub thob par gyur/ /ro nye dang ni lcags sam sa yang rung / /bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi gzugs byas te/ /blta na sdug pa 'jim pa'i las byed bcug /de dag thams cad byang chub thob par gyur/ /gang gis rtsig ngos gzugs kyi ri mo dag /bsod
21b7(mdo sde): nams brgya mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa'i sku/ /bdag gis bris sam 'dri ru bcug kyang rung / /de dag thams cad byang chub thob par gyur/ /skyes bu dag gam 'on te gzhon nu'ang rung / /gang dag la la de ni slob pa'i tshe/ /rtsed mo dga' dang bsang bar byed pa na/ /
