123a1(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo bskor to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan yang stong bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ dri ma med pa'i snang ba zhes bya ba'i chos
123a2(mdo sde): kyi 'khor lo bskor to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan yang stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skye ba brgyad kyis thogs par gyur to/ /byang chub
123a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan yang gling bzhi pa bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skye ba bzhis thogs par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
123a4(mdo sde): gzhan yang gling bzhi pa gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skye ba gsum gyis thogs par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan yang gling bzhi pa gnyis
123a5(mdo sde): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skye ba gnyis kyis thogs par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan yang gling bzhi pa gcig gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
123a6(mdo sde): rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skye ba gcig gis thogs par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams brgyad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag
123a7(mdo sde): gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la chos mngon par rtogs pa'i gnas bstan ma thag tu/ de'i mod la steng gi nam mkha' bar
123b1(mdo sde): snang las/ me tog man dA ra dang man dA ra chen po'i me tog gi char chen po mngon par bab ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong de dag na/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rin po che'i shing ljon pa'i drung dag na seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la 'thor mngon
123b2(mdo sde): par rab tu 'thor ro/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang seng ge'i khri
123b3(mdo sde): la bzhugs pa la yang 'thor mngon par rab tu 'thor ro/ /thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dang / 'khor bzhi po de dag la yang 'thor mngon par rab tu 'thor ro/ /bar snang las lha'i tsan dan dang a ga ru'i phye ma yang rab tu bab po/ /steng gi nam mkha'i bar snang
123b4(mdo sde): las rnga dag kyang ma brdungs par yid du 'ong ba snyan cing 'jam pa'i sgra 'byin to/ /steng nas lha'i ras bcos bu zung brgya stong dag kyang ltung ngo / /steng gi nam mkha' bar snang las rgyan phreng dang / se mo do dang / mu tig gi phreng ba dang / nor bu rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che chen po dag kyang
123b5(mdo sde): phyogs thams cad du kun nas rab tu 'phyang ngo / /rin thang med pa'i bdug pa'i pog phor rin po che las byas pa brgya stong dag kyang kun nas rang rgyu'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa re re la yang rin po che'i gdugs kyi phreng ba tshangs pa'i 'jig rten la thug pa/ steng gi nam mkha' bar snang la byang
123b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'dzin to/ /rnam grangs 'dis sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa de dag thams cad la yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag rin po che'i gdugs kyi phreng ba tshangs pa'i 'jig rten la thug pa steng gi nam
123b7(mdo sde): mkha' bar snang la 'dzin to/ /so so nas tshigs su bcad pa mngon par bsgrub pa yang dag par sangs rgyas la bstod pa dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la mngon par bstod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol
124a1(mdo sde): to/ /bde bar gshegs pas ngo mtshar chos bsgrags pa/ /'dren pa rnams kyi mthu chen ci 'dra dang / /ji ltar sku tshe'i tshad kyang mtha' yas pa/ /bdag cag rnams kyis 'di sngon yong ma thos/ /bde bar gshegs pas mngon du rnam phye ba/ /'di
124a2(mdo sde): 'dra'i chos de de ring thos pas na/ /srog chags bye ba stong rnams dga' bas khyab/ /'jig rten rnam par 'dren gyi thugs sras ni/ /kha cig mi ldog byang chub mchog la 'khod/ /kha cig gzungs rnams kyi ni mchog la gnas/ /kha cig spobs pa thogs pa med la 'khod/ /
124a3(mdo sde): kha cig bye ba stong gi gzungs la gnas/ /de bzhin gzhan yang zhing rdul phra rab rnyed/ /de dag sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la gnas/ /de bzhin kha cig skye ba brgyad kyis na/ /mtha' yas gzigs pa rgyal ba rnams su 'gyur/ /rnam par 'dren pa'i chos 'di thos nas
124a4(mdo sde): su/ /kha cig skye ba bzhi las rab tu 'das/ /gzhan dag kha cig gsum dang gnyis kyis na/ /don dam gzigs pa byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /kha cig de na skye ba gcig gnas nas/ /srid pa gzhan la thams cad mkhyen du 'gyur/ /'dren pa'i sku tshe'i tshad 'di thos pas
124a5(mdo sde): na/ /'bras bu zag med de 'dra rab tu thob/ /sems can bye ba gang rnams chos thos nas/ /byang chub sems dpa' la ni sems bskyed pa/ /zhing brgyad dag gi phra rab rdul snyed de/ /bgrangs na dpag mi lang ba de snyed do/ /sangs rgyas byang chub 'di ni rab bstan pas/ /mtha'
124a6(mdo sde): yas gang la tshad kyang ma mchis pa/ /nam mkha'i khams ltar dpag tu ma mchis te/ /drang srong chen pos de 'dra'i phrin las mdzad/ /man dA ra ba'i char pa rab tu 'bab/ /lha yi bu dag bye stong mang po dang / /brgya byin tshangs pa gang gA'i bye ma snyed/ /zhing stong bye ba dag nas
124a7(mdo sde): de dag lhags/ /tsan dan dang ni spos mchog phye ma dang / /a ga ru yi phye mas 'thor bzhin du/ /nam mkha' la ni bya bzhin rab rgyu zhing / /rgyal ba'i dbang po la yang tshul bzhin 'thor/ /steng gi nam mkha' las ni rnga rnams kyang / /ma brdungs par ni sgra snyan nyid las
124b1(mdo sde): grag / lha ras bcos bu bye ba stong rnams kyang / /'dren pa rnams la bskor zhing 'thor bar bgyid/ /bdug pa rin thang ma mchis ri ba yi/ /rin chen pog phor bye ba stong rnams kyang / /skyob pa 'jig rten bdag po mchod slad du/ /de na kun du bdag nyid rab tu rgyu/ /
124b2(mdo sde): gdugs rnams bye ba khrag khrig mtha' yas pa/ /rin chen dag las bgyis pa mtho zhing che/ /phal chen tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bar thug pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa 'di dag 'dzin/ /rgyal ba'i ba dan blta sdug bcas pa yi/ /'dren pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan
124b3(mdo sde): rab tu btsugs/ /bde gshegs sras rnams rab tu sems dga' bas/ /tshigs su bcad pa stong gis mngon par bstod/ /de 'dra ngo mtshar khyad 'phags rmad byung ba/ /sna tshogs 'di dag 'dren pa de ring gda'/ /sku tshe'i tshad ni nges par bstan mdzad pas/ /sems
124b4(mdo sde): can 'di kun rab tu dga' ba thob/ /phyogs bcu dag na de ring don rgya che/ /'dren pa rnams kyi gsung yang mngon par 'phags/ /srog chags bye ba stong rnams tshim par gyur/ /byang chub phyir ni dge ba rnams dang ldan/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
124b5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ ma pham pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ sems can gang dag gis sems bskyed pa gcig tsam zhig mos pa bskyed dam/ mngon par dad na rigs
124b6(mdo sde): kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag bsod nams ji tsam zhig skye bar 'gyur ba de legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang / de dag bsod nams ji tsam skyed par 'gyur ba de bshad do/ /ma pham pa 'di lta ste dper na/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la bla na
124b7(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod de/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
125a1(mdo sde): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral na/ ma pham pa rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs
125a2(mdo sde): 'di thos nas/ sems bskyed pa gcig tsam zhig mos pa bskyed dam mngon par dad na de'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byas pa 'di la/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga dang ldan pa bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad du yongs su rdzogs par bsod nams mngon par 'du byas pa
125a3(mdo sde): dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byas pa snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro /stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/
125a4(mdo sde): grangs su yang char yang bgrang bar yang dper yang rgyur yang mi bzod do/ /ma pham pa de lta bu'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las/ phyir ldog pa de ni gnas med do/ /de
125a5(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med/ /ye shes 'di ni tshol ba'i phyir/ /gang gis pha rol phyin pa lnga/ /yi dam bcas nas der zhugs te/ /bskal pa bye ba stong phrag kyang / /brgyad du tshang bar
125a6(mdo sde): rab tu sbyor/ /phyi phyir nyan thos rnams dang ni/ /sangs rgyas rnams la sbyin pa byin/ /byang chub sems dpa' bye ba dang / /rang sangs rgyas ni mang po la/ /bza' bca' zas dang skom rnams dang / /gos dang mal chas mgu bar byed/ /gnas dang gtsug lag khang
125a7(mdo sde): rnams kyang / /tsan dan las ni 'dir byas dang / /kun dga' ra ba nyams dga' dang / /'chag sa mdzes par byas pa rnams/ /sbyin pa sna tshogs rnam pa mang / /de lta bu yi sbyin 'dir byin/ /bskal pa bye ba phrag stong du/ /byin nas byang chub phyir yang bsngos/ /sangs
125b1(mdo sde): rgyas ye shes ched kyi phyir/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bsngags dag cing / /ma nyams yang dag bstod pa yi/ /tshul khrims phyir zhing srung bar byed/ /phyir zhing bzod pa sgom par byed/ /'dul ba'i sa la rab tu gnas/ /brtan dang ldan zhing dran dang ldan/ /kha ngan
125b2(mdo sde): mang po bzod par byed/ /dmigs pa can gyi sems can dag /nga rgyal dag la rab gnas pas/ /smad pa byas pa de dag kyang / /sangs rgyas ye shes phyir bzod do/ /brtson 'grus la ni rtag tu 'bad/ /dran pa brtan zhing mngon par brtson/ /yid la gzhan du rtog pa
125b3(mdo sde): med/ /bskal pa bye bar de bzhin gyur/ /dgon pa'i gnas na rab tu 'dug /'chag sar mngon par song nas su/ /gnyid dang rmugs pa rab spangs te/ /bskal pa bye bar de dag spyod/ /bsam gtan bsam gtan chen po pa/ /bsam gtan dga' zhing mnyam
125b4(mdo sde): par gzhag / bskal pa bye ba stong phrag brgyad/ /de las mi nyung bsam gtan byed/ /dpa' bo de ni bsam gtan des/ /thams cad mkhyen par bdag bsgyur zhes/ /byang chub dam pa don du gnyer/ /bsam gtan dag gi pha rol song / /bskal pa bye ba phrag
125b5(mdo sde): stong du/ /bya ba 'di la rab gnas pa'i/ /de dag bsod nams gang yin pa/ /gang sngar yongs su bsgrags pa bas/ /skyes pa rnams sam bud med dag /gang gis nga yi tshe thos nas/ /skad cig dad par byed pa yang / /bsod nams de ni mtha' yas so/ /
125b6(mdo sde): g.yo ba dang ni rlom sems dang / /the tshom dag kyang rnam spangs te/ /yud tsam shin tu mos pa yang / /de yi 'bras bu 'di 'dra'o/ /bskal pa bye bar spyod pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa/ /nga tshe bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /'di thos de dag mi spang ngo / /spyi
125b7(mdo sde): bo yis kyang phyag 'tshal te/ /ma 'ongs pa yi dus na yang / /bdag cag 'di 'drar rab gyur cig /srog chags bye ba bsgral bar bgyi/ /ji ltar mgon po shAkya thub/ /thub chen shAkya seng ge yis/ /byang chub snying por bzhugs nas su/ /seng ge'i sgra 'di bsgrags
126a1(mdo sde): pa ltar/ /bdag kyang ma 'ongs dus kyi tshe/ /lus chen kun gyis bkur sti zhing / /byang chub snying por 'dug nas ni/ /'di lta bu yi chos bshad do/ /mi gang thos pa 'dzin gyur zhing / /lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs/ /ldem por dgongs te bshad
126a2(mdo sde): zhes pa/ /de dag rnams ni the tshom med/ /ma pham pa gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'bab pa dang 'jug pa dang khong du chud pa de ni de bas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes su 'gyur ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa ches dpag
126a3(mdo sde): tu med pa skyed na/ gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'di nyan tam/ sgrogs sam/ 'dzin tam/ yi ger 'dri'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/ glegs bam la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang /
126a4(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan dang / 'bru mar gyi mar me dang / mar gyi mar me dang / spos mar gyi mar me dag gis bsti stang byed dam bsti stang byed du 'jug pa lta ci smos te/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes su 'gyur ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa ches mang du skyed do/ /
126a5(mdo sde): ma pham pa gang gi tshe rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas lhag pa'i bsam pas mos par byed pa de'i tshe/ de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i mtshan nyid ni 'di yin par rig par bya ste/ 'di lta ste nga bya rgod kyi
126a6(mdo sde): phung po'i ri la 'dug ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas pa dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi dbus na 'dug cing chos ston par mthong ba dang / nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten
126a7(mdo sde): gyi khams mi mjed 'di gzhi bai dUr+ya las grub cing mnyam par gnas la/ gser skud mig ris su bres shing rin po che'i shing ljon pa rnams kyis rnam par bkra bar mthong ba dang / 'di na yongs su spyad pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag na byang chub sems dpa' dag
126b1(mdo sde): gnas par mthong ba ste/ ma pham pa 'di ni lhag pa'i bsam pas mos pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o/ /ma pham pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ gang dag chos kyi rnam
126b2(mdo sde): grangs 'di thos na mi spong ba'i steng du rjes su yi rang ba de dag kyang / lhag pa'i bsam pas mos pa'i rigs kyi bur ngas bshad na/ gang 'dzin pa dang klog pa lta ci smos te de ni de bzhin gshegs pa phrag pa la thogs pa yin no/ /ma pham pa gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
126b3(mdo sde): glegs bam du byas shing phrag pa la thogs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des nga'i mchod rten bya mi dgos/ gtsug lag khang bya mi dgos/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad dag sbyin mi dgos so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma pham pa rigs kyi
126b4(mdo sde): bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des nga'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas pa yin/ rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten 'phang du ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten la thug pa kho ra khor yug tu ni rim bzhin du gdugs yongs su bzung ba dang bcas pa lha'i ba dan dang bcas pa dril bu'i sgra gsal
126b5(mdo sde): bar 'byung ba dag byas pa yin no/ /sku gdung gi mchod rten de dag la lha dang / mi'i me tog dang / spos dang / bdug pa dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan rnam pa
126b6(mdo sde): mang po dag gis bkur sti rnam pa mang po byas pa yin no/ /yid du 'ong ba snyan cing gsal ba'i sgra dang / rnga bo che rnam pa mang po dag dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / pheg rdob pa dang / rnam pa tha dad pa'i glu dang / gar dang / bzhad gad dang / rol mo rnam pa mang po tshad med pas/
126b7(mdo sde): bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa mang por bkur sti byas par 'gyur ro/ /ma pham pa nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ba dang / bklags pa dang / yi ger bri ba dang / rab tu ston pa des nga'i phyir tsan dan dmar po'i gtsug
127a1(mdo sde): lag khang rgya chen po yangs pa mthon po/ khang ma cu rtsa gnyis yod pa brgyad rtsegs/ dge slong stong gi gnas kun dga' ra ba dang / me tog gis mdzes par byas pa/ 'chag sa'i nags tshal dang ldan pa/ mal stan dang bcas pa/ bza'
127a2(mdo sde): ba dang bca' ba dang / zas dang skom dang / na ba'i gsos sman gyis yongs su gang ba/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa dag byas par gyur to/ /de dag mang zhing dpag tu med de/ brgya'am stong ngam/ stong phrag brgya'am/ bye ba'am/ bye ba brgya'am/ bye
127a3(mdo sde): ba stong ngam/ bye ba brgya stong ngam/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong de dag nga'i mdun du nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la phul te/ de dag kyang ngas yongs su spyad par rig par bya'o/ /ma pham pa de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
127a4(mdo sde): 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ ston tam/ yi ger 'dri 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug kyang rung ste/ rnam grangs 'dis des nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas ring bsrel gyi mchod rten dag bya mi dgos so/ /dge 'dun la mchod pa bya mi dgos so zhes nga de skad 'chad na/ ma pham pa gang
127a5(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin cing / sbyin pa sgrub pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab sgrub pa lta ci smos te/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa ches dpag tu med pa grangs med
127a6(mdo sde): pa mtha' yas pa skyed pa lta ci smos/ ma pham pa 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i khams ni shar dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / steng dang / 'og gi phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams rnams su yang mu med pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de bsod
127a7(mdo sde): nams mngon par 'du byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes su 'gyur ba grangs med dpag tu med pa skyed do/ /gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ ston tam/ yi ger 'dri'am yi ger 'drir 'jug na/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la bsti stang bya
127b1(mdo sde): ba'i phyir mngon par brtson pa yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams kyi bsngags pa smra ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yon tan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yongs su brjod cing gzhan dag la yang yang dag par rab tu ston pa yin no/ /
127b2(mdo sde): bzod pa bsgrubs pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / dge ba'i chos can dang 'grogs na bde ba dang / bzod pa can dang / dul ba dang / phrag dog med pa dang / khro ba yid la byed pa dang bral ba dang / gnod sems med pa yid la byed pa dang / dran pa dang ldan pa dang
127b3(mdo sde): mthu dang ldan pa yin/ brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol ba la rtag tu brtson pa yin/ bsam gtan pa yin/ nang du yang dag 'jog lhur len pa yin/ nang du yang dag 'jog mang du byed pa dang 'dri bar rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa yin/ 'dri ba bye ba
127b4(mdo sde): khrag khrig brgya stong gi lan ldon pa yin no/ /ma pham pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa'i yon tan dag ni gang dag ngas yongs su brjod pa 'di lta bu 'di dag
127b5(mdo sde): yin no/ /ma pham pa rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de byang chub kyi snying por yang dag par zhugs te/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub kyi shing drung du 'gro ba yin par
127b6(mdo sde): rig par bya'o/ /ma pham pa rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de gang na 'greng ngam 'dug gam 'chag pa der ma pham pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir mchod rten brtsig go/ /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten yin no zhes de la brjod par
127b7(mdo sde): bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /mi mgon mya ngan 'das pa na/ /mdo sde 'di ni gang 'dzin pa/ /bsod nams phung po mu med par/ /nga yis yang dang yang du bsngags/ /des ni nga la mchod pa byas/ /ring
128a1(mdo sde): bsrel gyi ni mchod rten yang / /rin chen byas pa sna tshogs pa/ /blta na sdug cing mdzes rnams byas/ /'phang du tshangs pa'i 'jig rten mnyam/ /gdugs phreng rnams dang rab tu ldan/ /kho ra yug ldan dpal can te/ /rnam rgyal ba dan rnams dang ldan/ /
128a2(mdo sde): dril bu gsal ba'i sgra 'byung ste/ /dar gyi lda ldis mdzes par byas/ /de bzhin dril bu rlung bskyod pas/ /rgyal ba'i ring bsrel shin tu mdzes/ /spos dang me tog byug pa dang / /gos dang rol mo'i sgra rnams dang / /rnga rnams kyis kyang yang dang yang / /de dag mchod pa rgya chen
128a3(mdo sde): byas/ /rol mo sgra snyan cha byad rnams/ /ring bsrel de la brdungs shing gsil/ /spos dang 'bru mar mar me rnams/ /de dag la ni kun nas phul/ /gang gis mdo sde 'di bzung zhing / /zad pa'i dus la ston pa yis/ /des ni mchod pa rnam mang po/ /de 'dra mtha' yas nga la byas/ /
128a4(mdo sde): gtsug lag khang mang bye ba dag /tsan dan las ni byas pa yin/ /khang ma cu rtsa gnyis te/ /de dag 'phang du brgyad rtseg go/ /mal cha dag gis nye bar brtan/ /bza' bca' rnams kyang tshogs par ldan/ /yol ba bzang po rab tu bshams/ /gnas rnams kyang ni rnam
128a5(mdo sde): par stong / /me tog kun dgas mdzes byas pa'i/ /kun dga' dag dang 'chag sa byin/ /gzugs mang rnam pa sna tshogs kyi/ /gding g.yogs mang po de bzhin no/ /rnam 'dren mya ngan 'das pa na/ /gang zhig mdo 'di 'dzin pa des/ /nga yi mdun du dge 'dun la/ /mchod pa
128a6(mdo sde): mang po byas pa yin/ /mos pa snying por gang gyur te/ /gang zhig mdo 'di klog pa 'am/ /yi ger 'dri bar byed pa ste/ /de bas bsod nams mang du thob/ /mi 'ga' la las glegs bam la/ /shin tu nges tshig 'drir bcug ste/ /spos dang phreng ba byug pa yis/ /glegs
128a7(mdo sde): bam de la mchod pa byed/ /spos kyi 'bru mar bkang ba yi/ /mar me rtag tu su 'bul zhing / /sna ma ud pal sil ma dang / /tsam pa kas kyang rab tu gtor/ /glegs bam dag la 'di 'dra ba'i/ /mchod pa byed pa'i mi de ni/ /bsod nams mang po rab 'phel te/ /de la
128b1(mdo sde): tshad kyang yong med do/ /ji ltar nam mkha'i khams kyi tshad/ /phyogs bcu dag ni thams cad du/ /rtag tu rnyed par 'gyur ma yin/ /bsod nams phung po 'di de 'dra/ /bzod cing dul te mnyam par gzhag /tshul khrims ldan zhing bsam gtan pa/ /yang dag nang 'jog spyod
128b2(mdo sde): yul can/ /de 'dra ba lta smos ci dgos/ /khro ba med cing phra ma med/ /mchod rten dag la gus par gnas/ /dge slong rnams la'ang rtag tu 'dud/ /nga rgyal med cing le lo med/ /shes rab ldan zhing bde bzhin brtan/ /dri ba dris na mi khro ste/ /snying rje blo yis srog chags
128b3(mdo sde): la/ /rjes su 'thun par rab tu ston/ /gang zhig de 'drar gyur nas su/ /mdo 'di yang ni gang 'dzin pa/ /de yi bsod nams phung po ni/ /tshad kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /mdo 'di 'dzin par byed pa yi/ /de lta bu yi chos smra ba/ /gal te mi 'gas mthong na yang / /de la
128b4(mdo sde): shin tu bkur sti bya/ /lha yi me tog rnams kyis de la gtor/ /lha yi gos rnams kyis kyang mngon par dgab/ /de yi rkang par mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ /de la de bzhin gshegs par 'du shes skyed/ /de mthong nas ni de tshe 'di snyam du/ /de ni shing ljon drung du 'gror 'gyur
128b5(mdo sde): te/ /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten phan pa'i phyir/ /bla med byang chub zhing 'tshang rgya snyam bsam/ /mdo sde 'di las tshigs bcad gcig brjod cing / /de 'dra'i mkhas de gang na 'chag pa 'am/ /gang na 'greng ngam 'on te 'dug pa 'am/ /dpa' bo gang du nyal bar byed pa'ang
128b6(mdo sde): rung / /der ni 'dren pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan gyi/ /ched du skyes bu dam pa'i mchod rten ni/ /blta na sdug pa sna tshogs byed du gzhug /de bzhin der ni mchod pa sna tshogs byas/ /gang na sangs rgyas bu de 'dug pa yi/ /sa phyogs de ni nga yis yongs su spyad/ /ngas ni de
128b7(mdo sde): nyid du yang 'chag pa byas/ /de nyid du yang nga ni 'dug par gyur/ /dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po las bsod nams kyi rnam grangs kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu drug pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
129a1(mdo sde): byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa thos nas rjes su yi rang na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams ji snyed cig bskyed
129a2(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /dpa' chen mya ngan 'das nas gang / /mdo 'di 'dra ba nyan pa dang / /thos nas rjes su yi rang ba/ /de yi dge ba ci tsam 'gyur/ de
129a3(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /ma pham pa de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo'am dge slong ngam dge slong ma'am dge bsnyen nam dge
129a4(mdo sde): bsnyen ma'am skyes bu mkhas pa'am gzhon nu'am gzhon nu ma gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa nyan cing thos nas kyang rjes su yi rang la chos nyan pa de nas song ste/ gtsug lag khang na 'dug gam khyim na 'dug gam dgon pa na 'dug gam srang na 'dug gam grong na
129a5(mdo sde): 'dug gam ljongs na 'dug kyang rung ste/ rgyu de dag dang byed rgyu de dag dang chos de ji ltar thos pa dang ji ltar zin pa bzhin du ci nus kyis/ pha'am ma'am nye du'am yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'am 'dris pa'am gzhan gang yang rung ste/ sems can pha rol la bstan nas
129a6(mdo sde): des de thos te/ rjes su yi rang la rjes su yi rang nas kyang gzhan la smras te/ des kyang de thos nas rjes su yi rang la des kyang gzhan la smras te/ des kyang de thos nas rjes su yi rang la de ltar na rnam grangs 'dis gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de lnga bcu pa la thug na/ ma pham
129a7(mdo sde): pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de thos pa/ rjes su yi rang ba lnga bcu pa'i mir gyur pa gang yin pa/ ma pham pa rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de/ ngas bshad kyis legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung
129b1(mdo sde): shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/ /ma pham pa 'di lta ste dper na/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bzhin sems can 'khod cing yod pa 'gro ba drug tu skyes pa/ sgo nga las skyes pa'am/ mngal nas skyes pa'am/ drod gsher las skyes pa'am brdzus
129b2(mdo sde): te skyes pa'am/ gzugs can nam/ gzugs med pa'am/ 'du shes can nam/ 'du shes med pa'am/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min nam/ rkang med dam/ rkang gnyis pa'am/ rkang bzhi pa'am/ rkang / sems can ji tsam sems can gyi
129b3(mdo sde): khams su bsdus shing / yang dag par 'du bar 'gyur ba rnams/ mi bsod nams 'dod pa/ phan par 'dod pa 'ga' zhig byung bas/ sems can gyi tshogs de la 'dod pa'i rtsed mo dang dga' ba'i longs spyod sdug pa mdzes pa gces pa yid du 'ong ba dag byin la/ 'dod pa'i
129b4(mdo sde): rtsed mo la dga' ba yongs su longs spyod par bya ba'i phyir sems can re re la yang 'dzam bu'i gling yongs su gang ba byin te/ 'gron bu dang / gser dang / dngul dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / rta'i shing rta dang / glang gi shing rta dang /
129b5(mdo sde): glang po che'i shing rta dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khang pa yang byin te/ ma pham pa rnam grangs 'dis sbyin pa'i bdag po sbyin bdag chen po'i mi des lo brgyad cu tshang bar sbyin pa byin la/ ma pham pa de nas sbyin pa'i bdag po sbyin bdag chen po'i mi de 'di snyam du sems te/
129b6(mdo sde): sems can 'di dag thams cad kyang bdag gis rtsen du bcug dga' bar byas bde bar gsos na/ sems can 'di dag mgo skya zhing gnyer mas gang ste/ na tshod lo brgyad cu lon pas rgas te/ 'chi ba'i dus byed par yang nye bar gyur na bdag gis 'di dag de bzhin
129b7(mdo sde): gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu btsud de rjes su bstan to snyam nas/ ma pham pa de nas mi des sems can de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la yang dag par btsud de/ yang dag par btsud nas 'dzin du bcug la/
130a1(mdo sde): sems can de dag gis kyang chos de mnyan te thos nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam gcig la 'dus te thams cad rgyun du zhugs par gyur/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa nas/ zag pa zad pa bsam gtan pa bsam gtan
130a2(mdo sde): pa chen po rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa'i dgra bcom pa'i bar du gyur na/ ma pham pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ sbyin pa'i bdag po sbyin pa'i bdag po chen po'i mi de gzhi de las bsod nams mang po dpag tu med grangs med pa skyed dam/ de skad ces bka' stsal
130a3(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa de de lta lags te/ sbyin pa'i bdag po sbyin pa'i bdag po chen po'i mi de sems can de snyed la bde
130a4(mdo sde): ba'i yo byad thams cad stsal ba'i slad du rgyu des kyang bsod nams mang du skyed na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i gong du dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de skad ces gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
130a5(mdo sde): po ma pham pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /ma pham pa khyod mos par bya khong du chud par bya'o/ /sbyin pa'i bdag po sbyin bdag chen po'i mi gang gis/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bzhi'i sems can thams cad la bde ba'i yo byad
130a6(mdo sde): thams cad kyis rim gro byas te/ dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod nas bsod nams skyed la/ gang yang gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de thos pa lnga bcu par gyur pa'i mi des/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshigs su bcad pa gcig gam/ tshig gcig tsam thos te rjes
130a7(mdo sde): su yi rang na/ gang mi de'i rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po ni/ sbyin pa'i bdag po sbyin bdag chen po'i mi de'i sbyin pa dang ldan pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de bas gang mi gcig nas gcig tu brgyud
130b1(mdo sde): pa'i lnga bcu pa'i mis/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshigs su bcad pa gcig gam tshig gcig thos nas rjes su yi rang ba ni ches mang ste/ ma pham pa rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa 'di'i mdun na/ snga ma'i
130b2(mdo sde): sbyin pa dang ldan pa dang dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ stong gi char yang brgya stong gi char yang bye ba'i char yang bye ba brgya'i char yang bye ba stong gi char yang bye ba brgya stong gi char yang bye ba khrag khrig brgya
130b3(mdo sde): stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/ bgrang bar yang char yang grangs su yang dper yang rgyur yang mi bzod do/ /ma pham pa de ltar lnga bcu pa'i mi de tha na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshigs su bcad pa gcig gam tshig gcig la rjes su yi rang ba yang / bsod nams 'di snyed
130b4(mdo sde): skyed na ma pham pa gang gis nga'i mngon sum du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan te thos nas rjes su yi rang ba lta ci smos te/ ma pham pa de'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa ni ches dpag tu med ches grangs med ces ngas bshad do/ /ma pham pa yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo
130b5(mdo sde): gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa'i phyir/ bdag gi khyim nas byung ste/ gtsug lag khang du song la/ de phyin nas der 'greng ngam 'dug ste chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yud tsam mnyan na/ sems can de bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba de tsam byas shing bsags
130b6(mdo sde): pas/ de tshe rjes nas lus phyi ma dang bdag gi ngo bo phyi ma thob pa la glang gi shing rta 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rta'i shing rta dang / glang po che'i shing rta dang / khyogs kyi bzhon pa dang / gru'i bzhon pa dang / khyu mchog gi bzhon pa dang / lha'i gzhal med khang thob par 'gyur ro/ /
130b7(mdo sde): gal te yang mdo'i chos sgrog pa der yud tsam zhig 'dug ste/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan tam pha rol 'dug tu bcug gam sems can gzhan la stan bgos na/ bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa des/ brgya byin gyi stan dang / tshangs pa'i stan dang / 'khor los
131a1(mdo sde): sgyur ba'i seng ge'i khri thob par 'gyur ro/ /ma pham pa gal te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las mi gzhan zhig la 'di skad du/ kye mi khyod tshur shog /dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyon cig ces smras la/ mi
131a2(mdo sde): de yang spro ba rnyed nas gal te yud tsam zhig mnyan na sems can de spro ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byas pa des/ gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang lhan cig 'grogs pa 'thob po/ /blun por mi 'gyur ro/ /dbang po rno zhing shes
131a3(mdo sde): rab dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /tshe rabs brgya stong du yang kha rul cing mnam par mi 'gyur/ de la lce nad med par 'gyur/ kha nad med par 'gyur/ so sngon por mi 'gyur/ so mi mnyam pa med pa dang / so mi ser ba dang / so gyed 'dums med pa dang / so sngo ba med pa
131a4(mdo sde): dang / so byung ba med pa dang / so yo ba med par 'gyur ro/ /mchu 'phyang du mi 'gyur/ mchu nang du song ba ma yin pa dang / mchu log pa med pa dang / mchu sho rer ma gyur pa dang / mchu yo ba med pa dang / mchu gnag pa med pa dang / mchu mi sdug pa med par 'gyur
131a5(mdo sde): ro/ /sna leb leb por mi 'gyur/ sna yon por mi 'gyur ro/ /gdong ring por mi 'gyur/ gdong yon por mi 'gyur/ gdong nag por mi 'gyur/ gdong blta na mi sdug par mi 'gyur ro/ /ma pham pa 'di ltar lce dang so dang / mchu srab cing shin tu legs par 'gyur/
131a6(mdo sde): sna che ba dang / bzhin gyi dbyibs legs pa dang / smin ma legs pa dang / dpral ba'i dbyes che bar 'gyur/ dpe byad rdzogs pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gdams pa dang rjes su bstan pa yang thob par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
131a7(mdo sde): 'das rnams dang yang myur du phrad par 'gyur ro/ /ma pham pa ltos/ sems can gcig spro bar byas pas kyang / bsod nams de tsam skyed na gang gis bsti stang du byas te mnyan tam/ bsti stang du byas te klog gam/ bsti stang du byas te ston tam/ bsti stang
131b1(mdo sde): du byas te rab tu 'chad pa lta ci smos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa lnga bcu pa/ /gang gis mdo 'di'i tshigs bcad gcig mnyan te/ /thos nas sems dang rjes su yi rang ba'i/ /
131b2(mdo sde): bsod nams ji snyed 'byung ba de nyon cig /gal te sbyin byed mi zhig byung gyur te/ /rtag tu sems can bye ba khrag khrig la/ /gang sngar nga yis dpe byas de dag rnams/ /de kun lo yang brgyad cu tshim par byas/ /mgo la skra dkar gnyer ma kun byung ste/ /de dag rgal nyer
131b3(mdo sde): gnas des mthong nas/ /kye ma sems can nyon mongs 'di dag kun/ /chos kyis 'di dag rab tu bstan par bya/ /de yis de rnams la ni phyis chos smras/ /mya ngan 'da' ba'i sa yang rab tu bshad/ /srid pa thams cad dbu ba smig rgyu 'dra/ /srid pa kun la myur du yid byung
131b4(mdo sde): byos/ /sbyin pa byed pa'i mi de'i gan nas su/ /sems can de dag kun gyis chos thos nas/ /zag pa zad cing tha ma'i lus 'dzin par/ /dus gcig du na dgra bcom thob gyur kyang / /gang zhig brgyud de tshigs bcad gcig thos shing / /rjes su yi rang bsod nams ji snyed pa/ /
131b5(mdo sde): de yi bsod nams de bas ches mang ste/ /bsod nams phung po snga mas char mi phod/ /gang gis brgyud de tshigs bcad gcig thos pa/ /de ltar de yi bsod nams mang gyur te/ /de dag mtha' yas tshad kyang yong med na/ /mngon sum thos pa de ni smos ci dgos/ /gang der
131b6(mdo sde): sems can gcig la 'ang smras pa ni/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig du mar yang / /mdo 'di yang ni shin tu rnyed dka' yis/ /song ste chos nyon ces ni spro bar byas/ /sems can de dag de yis spro byas nas/ /mdo 'di yang ni yud tsam nyan byed pa/ /de yi las kyi 'bras bu mnyan
131b7(mdo sde): par gyis/ /nam yang de la kha yi nad med 'gyur/ /de yi lce yang na bar gzhar mi 'gyur/ /de yi so rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sngon po ser po mi 'thun gzhar mi 'gyur/ /mchu mi sdug par yang ni yong mi 'gyur/ /de gdong yo 'am skam zhing ring ba med/ /nam yang sna
132a1(mdo sde): leb tu ni yong mi 'gyur/ /so dang mchu dang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor dang / /de yi sna dang dpral ba'i dbyibs kyang legs/ /mi rnams kyis ni blta na sdug par 'gyur/ /de yi kha ni rul bar gzhar mi 'gyur/ /ud pal bzhin du rtag tu dri zhim pa/ /de yi kha
132a2(mdo sde): nas dri yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dpa' bo khyim nas gtsug lag khang du song / /mdo sde nyan pa'i phyir ni der song ste/ /song nas der ni yud tsam des chos mnyan/ /dad pa'i sems kyi 'bras bu mnyan par gyis/ /de yi lus ni shin tu dkar bar 'gyur/ /brtan pa de ni rta yi
132a3(mdo sde): shing rtas 'gro/ /glang chen shing rta mthon por 'dug nas su/ /rin po che yis brgyan pa zhon zhing 'chag /shin tu sbud pa'i khyogs kyang des thob nas/ /de dag du ma mi yis bteg cing bkur/ /chos nyan phyir ni song ba gyur pa de'i/ /'bras bu dge ba 'di 'drar 'gyur ba
132a4(mdo sde): yin/ /de ni 'khor gyi nang der 'dug nas su/ /dkar po'i las rnams byas pa de dag gis/ /tshangs pa'i stan dang rgyal po'i stan rnams dang / /brgya byin stan rnams kyang ni des thob 'gyur/ /dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po las rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams bstan
132a5(mdo sde): pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu bdun pa'o/ / //bam po bcu gcig pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rgyun du brtson la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa'am
132a6(mdo sde): klog pa'am ston pa'am yi ger 'dri ba yang rung ste/ rigs kyi bu de mig gi yon tan brgyad brgya thob par 'gyur ro/ /rna ba'i yon tan stong nyis brgya thob par 'gyur ro/ /sna'i yon tan brgyad brgya thob par 'gyur ro/ /lce'i yon tan stong nyis brgya thob par 'gyur ro/ /lus
132a7(mdo sde): kyi yon tan brgyad brgya thob par 'gyur ro/ /yid kyi yon tan stong nyis brgya thob par 'gyur ro/ /de yon tan brgya phrag mang pos dbang po drug gi grong yongs su dag cing / shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /de'i pha dang ma las byung ba'i sha'i mig tha mal pa de ltar yongs
132b1(mdo sde): su dag pa'i/ mig gi dbang pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyi nang dang brag dang nags stug por bcas pa dang 'og tu mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po la thug pa yan chad/ steng du srid pa'i rtse mor thug pa'i bar du de dag thams cad mthong
132b2(mdo sde): ngo / /sha'i mig tha mal pas sems can gang dag der skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ste/ de dag gi las kyi rnam par smin pa 'ang shes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /'khor gyi dbus su mi 'jigs pa/ /
132b3(mdo sde): gang zhig mdo sde 'di 'chad cing / /le lo med par rab 'chad pa/ /de yi yon tan nga las nyon/ /yon tan dag ni brgyad brgya yi/ /de yi mig ni kun du mdzes/ /des ni de mig dri ma med/ /rnyog pa med cing dag par 'gyur/ /pha dang ma las byung ba yi/ /de yi sha yi mig des
132b4(mdo sde): ni/ /'jig rten khams 'di thams cad kyang / /phyi nang bcas pa rab tu mthong / /lhun po'i ri rab thams cad dang / /kho ra yug kyang des mthong ste/ /ri gzhan gang rnams grags pa dang / /rgya mtsho dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ /'og tu mnar med dmyal bar thug /
132b5(mdo sde): steng du srid pa'i rtser gnas pa/ /brtan pa des ni kun mthong ste/ /sha yi mig ni de 'dra'o/ /da dung de la lha yi mig /med pas shes pa ma yin no/ /de yi sha yi mig gi yul/ /de dag de ltar 'gyur ba yin/ /rtag par rgyun du brtson gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs
132b6(mdo sde): kyi bu mo des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par bstan cing gzhan dag la yang dag par bshad na/ rna ba'i yon tan stong nyis brgya po de dag dang ldan te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po la thug pa yan chad/ srid
132b7(mdo sde): pa'i rtse mo la thug pa man chad na/ phyi nang gi sgra rnam pa mang po gang dag 'byung ba 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i sgra'am/ rta'i sgra'am/ rnga mo'i sgra'am/ ba lang gi sgra'am/ ra'i sgra'am/ shing rta'i sgra'am/ ngu ba'i sgra'am/ mya ngan gyi sgra'am/ 'jigs pa'i sgra'am/ dung gi
133a1(mdo sde): sgra'am/ dril bu'i sgra'am/ rnga'i sgra'am/ rtsed mo'i sgra'am/ glu'i sgra'am/ rol mo'i sgra'am/ skyes pa'i sgra'am/ bud med kyi sgra'am/ khye'u'i sgra'am/ bu mo'i sgra'am/ chos kyi sgra'am/ chos ma yin pa'i sgra'am/ bde ba'i sgra'am/ sdug bsngal
133a2(mdo sde): ba'i sgra'am/ byis pa'i sgra'am/ 'phags pa'i sgra'am/ yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'am/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra'am/ lha'i sgra'am/ klu'i sgra'am/ gnod sbyin gyi sgra'am/ dri za'i sgra'am/ lha ma yin gyi sgra'am/ nam mkha' lding gi sgra'am/ mi'am ci'i sgra'am/ lto 'phye chen
133a3(mdo sde): po'i sgra'am/ mi'i sgra'am/ mi ma yin pa'i sgra'am/ me'i sgra'am/ chu'i sgra'am/ rlung gi sgra'am/ grong gi sgra'am/ grong khyer gyi sgra'am/ dge slong gi sgra'am/ nyan thos kyi sgra'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sgra'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i sgra'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
133a4(mdo sde): sgra'am/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyi nang na/ sgra ci byung ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rna ba'i dbang po tha mal pa yongs su dag pa des thos te/ re zhig lha'i rna ba ni mi sgrub mod kyi sems can de dang de dag gi skad du rab tu rtogs so/ /sems
133a5(mdo sde): can de dang de dag gis skad la rnam par rtog go/ /rnam par 'byed do/ /rna ba'i dbang po tha mal pa des sems can de dang de dag gis skad rnams thos kyang / de'i rna ba'i dbang po la sgra de dag thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non to/ /rtag par rgyun du brtson byang chub sems
133a6(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rna ba'i dbang po 'di lta bu thob par 'gyur te/ re zhig lha'i rna ba ni mngon par mi sgrub bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal
133a7(mdo sde): to/ /de yi rna ba'i dbang po tha mal pa/ /rnyog pa med cing rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /'jig rten khams 'di dag na ma lus par/ /rnam pa mang po'i sgra rnams des thos te/ /rnga bo che dang rdza rnga sgra snyan dang / /pi bang gling bu dang ni pa l+la ki /shing rta ba lang ra dang
133b1(mdo sde): lug dag dang / /rta dang glang chen dag gi sgra yang thos/ /'jam zhing yid 'ong glu yi dbyangs kyang thos/ /brtan pa de ni de la chags pa med/ /gang dang gang na su dang su smra ba/ /bye ba snyed kyi mi yi sgra rnams thos/ /lha yi sgra dang klu yi dbyangs rnams kyang / /snyan cing yid du
133b2(mdo sde): 'ong ba rtag par thos/ /skyes pa bud med dag gi sgra rnams dang / /khye'u dang bu mo'i sgra yang de bzhin thos/ /ri dang phug na gang gnas de dag dang / /khu byug rma bya ka la ping ka dang / /bya rnams gang dag shang shang te'u rnams dang / /de dag rnams kyi sgra snyan 'dir thos
133b3(mdo sde): so/ /sems dmyal dag na sdug bsngal gang myong ba/ /shin tu mi bzad pa yi sgra rnams dang / /zas kyi sdug bsngal dag gis nyen pa yi/ /rnams kyi sgra phyung de bzhin thos/ /lha ma yin dang rgya mtsho'i nang gnas dang / /sgra 'byin pa dang de bzhin gzhan dag
133b4(mdo sde): dang / /chos smra ba de 'di na 'dug bzhin du/ /sgra rnams thams cad thos te chod pa med/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dag na phan tshun du/ /smra bar byed pa'i sgra rnams gang yin pa/ /rnam pa tha dad sgra rnams mang po dag /de ni 'di na 'dug bzhin de dag thos/ /lha gang tshangs
133b5(mdo sde): pa'i 'jig rten gnas pa dang / /gang dag 'og min dang ni 'od gsal lha/ /phan tshun du ni sgra skad gang 'byin pa/ /de dag ma lus thams cad des thos so/ /bde bar gshegs kyi bstan la rab byung nas/ /dge slong gang dag kha don byed pa dang / /'khor gyi nang na
133b6(mdo sde): chos ston gang yin pa/ /de dag sgra yang rtag tu de yis thos/ /'jig rten khams 'dir byang chub sems dpa' gang / /kha don dag kyang byed cing phan tshun du/ /chos rnams yang dag rjod par gang byed pa/ /de dag sgra rnams rnam pa tha dad thos/ /byang chub sems
133b7(mdo sde): dpa' mdo 'di gang 'dzin pas/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan mi 'dul kha lo sgyur/ /'khor rnams la yang chos mchog gang gsung ba/ /dus gcig tu ni de yang de yis thos/ /mnar med yan chad steng du srid pa'i rtse/ /stong gsum gyi ni zhing 'di thams cad na/ /
134a1(mdo sde): nang logs dag dang phyi logs dag nas kyang / /sems can gang gis sgra mang phyung ba dang / /sems can kun gyi sgra rnams thos gyur kyang / /'on kyang de yi rna ba 'gag pa med/ /dbang po gsal zhing gnas dang gnas kyang shes/ /rna ba'i dbang po tha
134a2(mdo sde): mal de tsam mo/ /re zhig lha yi la ni 'bad mi byed/ /tha mal rna ba de ni de ltar 'dug /'jigs med gang gis mdo 'di bzung ba ni/ /de yi yon tan dag ni de 'drar 'gyur/ /rtag par rgyun du brtson gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rnam grangs
134a3(mdo sde): 'di 'dzin tam/ rab tu ston tam/ kha ton byed dam/ yi ger 'dri ba de/ sna'i yon tan brgyad brgya dang ldan zhing sna'i dbang po yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ de'i sna'i dbang po yongs su dag pa des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyi nang gi dri rnam pa
134a4(mdo sde): mang po yod pa 'di lta ste/ rul ba'i dri'am yid du 'ong ba'i dri'am yid du mi 'ong ba'i dri'am me tog rnam pa tha dad pa'i dri 'di lta ste/ sna ma'i me tog dang / ma li ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / skya snar gyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro/ /chu las skyes pa'i me tog rnam pa mang po'i dri
134a5(mdo sde): rnams kyang tshor te 'di lta ste/ ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar po rnams kyi dri dag kyang tshor ro/ /me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing rnam pa mang po'i me tog dang / 'bras bu'i dri rnams kyang tshor te/ 'di lta ste/ tsan dan dang / ta ma la'i 'dab ma dang /
134a6(mdo sde): rgya spos dang / a ga ru'i dri zhim po rnams kyang tshor ro/ /spos rnam pa tha dad pa brgya stong gnas gcig na 'dug pa thams cad kyang tshor ro/ /thams cad kyang shes so/ /sems can gyi dri rnam pa mang po yang tshor te 'di lta ste/ glang po che dang / rta dang / ba lang dang / ra lug
134a7(mdo sde): dang / phyugs kyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags rnam pa mang po'i lus kyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro/ /skyes pa dang bud med kyi lus kyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro/ /khye'u dang bu mo'i lus kyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro/ /rtswa dang shing gel pa dang
134b1(mdo sde): sman dang nags thag ring po na 'dug pa'i dri rnams kyang tshor ro/ /dri yang dag par tshor te dri yang dag par shes mod kyi/ dri de dag gis mi 'phrogs/ de dag gis myos par mi 'gyur ro/ /de 'di na 'dug bzhin du lha dag gi dri rnams kyang tshor te 'di lta ste/ yongs 'du
134b2(mdo sde): sa brtol gyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro/ /me tog man dA ra dang man dA ra chen po dang many+dzu Sha ka dang many+dzu Sha ka chen po rnams kyi lha'i dri rnams kyang tshor ro/ /lha'i a ga ru'i phye ma dang tsan dan gyi phye ma dag gi dri rnams kyang tshor ro/ /lha'i me tog rnam pa tha dad pa brgya stong gi dri dag kyang tshor ro/ /
134b3(mdo sde): de dag gi ming rnams kyang shes so/ /lha'i bu'i lus kyi dri rnams kyang tshor te 'di lta ste/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi lus kyi dri yang tshor ro/ /rnam par rgyal ba'i khang na rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod pa'am/ chos lha'i 'dun sa na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha
134b4(mdo sde): rnams la chos ston pa'am/ rtse dga' ba'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi sar byung ba de yang shes so/ /lha'i bu gzhan rnams kyi so so'i lus kyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro/ /lha'i bu mo rnams dang lha'i chung ma rnams kyi lus kyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro/ /lha gzhon nu rnams kyi lus kyi
134b5(mdo sde): dri rnams kyang tshor ro/ /lha gzhon nu ma rnams kyi lus kyi dri rnams kyang tshor te/ dri de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs shing myos par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam grangs 'dis srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du skyes pa'i sems can de dag gi lus kyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro/ /tshangs ris kyi
134b6(mdo sde): lha'i bu rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams kyi lus kyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro/ /rnam grangs 'dis lha'i ris thams cad kyi lus kyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dag gi sku'i dri
134b7(mdo sde): rnams kyang tshor ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dag gi gdan gyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na bzhugs pa de yang rab tu shes so/ /de'i sna'i dbang po de yang dri rnam pa mang po de dang de dag
135a1(mdo sde): gis mi 'phrogs te nyams pa'am gnod par 'gyur ba yang med do/ /de 'dod na dri de dang de dag gzhan dag la yang ston te/ de dran pa nyams par 'gyur ba med do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /
135a2(mdo sde): de yi sna yi dbang po rnam dag 'gyur/ /gang rnams 'jig rten khams 'di thams cad na/ /dri zhim dri mi zhim pa ci yod pa/ /des ni rnam pa mang po'i dri yang tshor/ /sna ma'i me tog dri dang ma li ka /tsan dan ta ma la yi 'dab ma dang / /rgya spos dag dang a ga ru yi dri/ /
135a3(mdo sde): me tog 'bras bu sna mang de dag dang / /skyes pa bud med ring na 'dug pa dang / /khye'u rnams dang ni bu mo de dag dang / /sems can rnams kyi dri yang de bzhin shes/ /de yi gnas kyang des ni dri las shes/ /'khor los sgyur rgyal rnams kyang de yis shes/ /stobs kyi
135a4(mdo sde): 'khor los sgyur dang rgyal phran dang / /de bzhin khye'u dang bu mo de dag dang / /chung ma'i 'khor kun dri las de yis shes/ /yongs su longs spyod rin chen rnam mang dang / /spa ba gang dag sa la 'dug rnams dang / /bud med rin po cher gyur de dag kyang / /byang chub sems
135a5(mdo sde): dpa' de yis dri las shes/ /de dag rnams kyi rgyan rnams ci yod pa/ /lus la btags pa rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs/ /gos dang phreng ba byug pa spos rnams kyang / /dri las byang chub sems dpa' de yis shes/ /de bzhin 'greng dang 'dug dang nyal ba dang / /rtsed
135a6(mdo sde): mo dga' ba mthu stobs thams cad kyang / /mdo sde dam pa 'di ni gang 'dzin pa/ /brtan pa de yi sna yi stobs kyis shes/ /spos mchog 'bru mar dri yang de bzhin te/ /me tog 'bras bu rnam pa mang po'i dri/ /dri 'di ga ge mo na yod ces kyang / /'dug bzhin du ni cig car
135a7(mdo sde): shes shing tshor/ /ri yi phrag ni rnam pa sna tshogs na/ /tsan dan me tog rgyas mang gang yod dang / /sems can gang dag de na gnas pa yang / /mkhas des de dag thams cad dri las shes/ /khor yug ngos la gang dag gnas pa dang / /rgya mtsho'i dbus na gang dag 'khod
135b1(mdo sde): pa dang / /sa yi dbus na sems can gang gnas pa/ /mkhas pa des ni thams cad dri las shes/ /lha dang lha ma yin yang de bzhin shes/ /des ni lha min bu mo dag kyang shes/ /lha ma yin gyi rtsed mo dga' ba'ang shes/ /de yi sna yi dbang po'i mthu de 'dra/ /nags khrod dag
135b2(mdo sde): na rkang bzhi gang yod pa/ /seng ge stag dang de bzhin glang chen mchog /de nam he ba lang ba men rnams/ /de dag gnas pa de yi sna yis shes/ /bud med gang dag sbrum mar gyur pa dang / /khye'u 'am 'on te bu mo gang yin pa/ /rum na 'chang ba shin tu ngal ba'i lus/ /de la gang
135b3(mdo sde): yod de yi dri las shes/ /sems can mngal du zhugs pa'ang des shes te/ /rnam par 'jig pa'i chos kyang de yis shes/ /bud med 'di ni sdug bsngal rnams dang bral/ /bsod nams ldan pa'i bu ni 'byung bar shes/ /skyes bu'i bsam pa mang po rab shes te/ /bsam
135b4(mdo sde): pa'i dri yang de bzhin de yis tshor/ /'dod chags zhe sdang de bzhin 'chab pa dang / /nye bar zhi ba'i sems kyi dri yang tshor/ /sa la gter rnams gang dag yod gyur pa/ /nor rnams dang ni gser dngul 'gron bu yis/ /lcags kyi sgrom rnams de bzhin gang ba dag /dri las
135b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de yis shes/ /mu tig nor bu do shal se mo do/ /rin thang med pa'i rin chen rnam mang po/ /rin thang med pa'i ming dang 'od dbyibs kyang / /de dag thams cad de yi dri las shes/ /de bzhin steng gi lha yi me tog rnams/ /man dA ra dang many+dzu Sha ka dang / /
135b6(mdo sde): yongs 'du'i me tog gang dag yod gyur pa/ /dpa' bo 'di na 'dug bzhin de dag tshor/ /gang gi gzhal med khang rnams ci 'dra ba/ /yangs dang 'bring dang de bzhin chung ngu dang / /de na rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs yod pa/ /'di na 'dug bzhin sna yi stobs kyis tshor/ /skyed
135b7(mdo sde): mos tshal gyi sa yang de bzhin shes/ /chos dang ni rnam par rgyal ba yi/ /khang mchog na lha gang 'khod pa dag /de na lha bu rtsen pa'ang rtag tu shes/ /gang zhig gang na las ni byed pa'am/ /'dug dang nyal dang gang du 'gro ba yang / /'di na 'dug
136a1(mdo sde): bzhin de dag dri yang tshor/ /lha yi bu rnams des ni dri las shes/ /me tog mang brgyan lha yi bu mo gang / /phreng ba thogs shing lhab lhub rnams kyis brgyan/ /gang dang gang du rtsen zhing 'dong ba dag /byang chub sems dpa' de yis dri las shes/ /steng
136a2(mdo sde): du srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar gyi lha/ /tshangs pa tshangs chen gzhal med khang rgyu ba/ /bsam gtan gnas sam 'on te langs pa yang / /de dag der ni dri las rab tu shes/ /'od gsal gyi ni lha yi bu rnams kyang / /'chi 'phos skyes pa gsar du 'ongs pa shes/ /byang chub
136a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' mdo 'di 'dzin pa yi/ /sna yi dbang po 'di 'drar 'gyur ba yin/ /dge slong gang rnams bde gshegs bstan pa la/ /mngon par brtson pa 'chag cing 'dug pa dang / /lung nod kha don mos pa'i dge slong rnams/ /thams cad byang chub sems dpa'
136a4(mdo sde): de yis shes/ /rgyal ba'i sras po nyan thos gang yod pa/ /la la rtag tu shing drung gnas pa dag /dge slong 'di zhes bya bar 'dir gnas shes/ /de dag thams cad mkhas pa des shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' dran ldan bsam gtan pa/ /rtag tu lung nod kha
136a5(mdo sde): don 'ga' gang dag / 'khor gyi nang na chos kyang rab 'chad pa/ /de dag dri las byang chub sems dpas shes/ /bde bar gshegs pa thub chen phyogs gang na/ /nyan thos dge 'dun mdun gyis bltas dbus na/ /phan zhing thugs brtse rab tu chos 'chad pa/ /
136a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten mgon po de yang dri las shes/ /sems can gang rnams chos 'di nyan pa dag /gang rnams thos nas dga' ba'i yid gyur pa/ /de na rgyal ba'i 'khor rnams thams cad kyang / /'di na 'dug bzhin byang chub sems dpas shes/ /de yi sna yi stobs ni
136a7(mdo sde): de 'drar 'gyur/ /de la lha yi sna ni da dung med/ /zag pa med par gyur pa lha yi sna/ /de yi sngun du 'gro bar 'di 'gyur ro/ /rtag par rgyun du brtson gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin tam ston tam rab tu 'chad dam yi ger 'drir
136b1(mdo sde): 'jug na/ lce'i yon tan stong nyis brgya po de dag dang ldan pa'i lce'i dbang po thob par 'gyur te/ de lce'i dbang po de lta bus ro gang dag myangs pa dang ro gang dag tshor ba dang ro gang dag lce'i dbang po la reg pa de thams cad lha'i ro bro ba dam par 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar yid du mi 'ong
136b2(mdo sde): ba'i ro gang dag yang mi myong ba de lta bu myong bar 'gyur ro/ /yid du mi 'ong ba'i ro gang yin pa de dag kyang / de'i lce'i dbang po'i steng du reg na lha'i ro bro bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor gyi nang du song nas chos gang bshad pa des sems can de dag dbang po tshim par 'gyur ro/ /mgu
136b3(mdo sde): ba dang yongs su mgu ba dang mchog tu dga' ba skye'o/ /de'i sgra yang zab cing yid du 'ong la mnyen zhing snyan par 'gyur te/ snying la 'bab pa dang dga' bar 'gyur ba des sems can de dag dga' mgu yi rangs pa'i sems su 'gyur ro/ /gang dag la chos bshad pa de dag
136b4(mdo sde): gis kyang de'i dbyangs 'jam zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba'i sgra thos nas/ lha rnams kyang blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i drung du 'gro bar sems so/ /lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo rnams kyang blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen
136b5(mdo sde): bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir drung du 'gro bar sems so/ /brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir drung du 'gro bar sems so/ /klu dang klu'i bu mo rnams
136b6(mdo sde): kyang blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir drung du 'gro bar sems so/ /lha ma yin dang lha ma yin gyi bu mo rnams kyang blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir drung du 'gro bar sems so/ /
136b7(mdo sde): nam mkha' lding dang nam mkha' lding gi bu mo rnams kyang blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir drung du 'gro bar sems so/ /mi'am ci dang mi'am ci'i bu mo dang gnod sbyin dang gnod sbyin gyi bu mo dang sha za dang sha za'i bu mo rnams kyang
137a1(mdo sde): blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan par bya ba'i phyir drung du 'gro bar sems te/ de dag kyang de la bkur stir byed bsti stang du byed btsun par byed mchod pa dang / gsol bar byed dbul bar byed do/ /dge slong dang / dge
137a2(mdo sde): slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams kyang lta 'dod par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po dang rgyal bu dang / rgyal po'i blon po rnams kyang lta 'dod par 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa/
137a3(mdo sde): bu dang bcas pa/ blon po dang bcas pa/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa yang bkur stir bya ba'i phyir lta 'dod par 'gyur ro/ /chos smra ba de de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad gsungs pa bzhin yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du snyan pa'i chos
137a4(mdo sde): 'chad do/ /bram ze dang khyim bdag dang / yul gyi mi gzhan dag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par tshe'i mtha' mar phyin gyi bar du/ chos smra ba de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams kyang de la lta 'dod par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs
137a5(mdo sde): rgyas rnams kyang de la lta 'dod par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang de la gzigs bzhed par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de phyogs gang na 'dug pa de'i phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs te chos 'chad do/ /sangs rgyas
137a6(mdo sde): kyi chos rnams kyi snod du 'gyur te/ de ltar de zab cing yid du 'ong ba'i chos rnams kyi sgra 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /de yi lce yi dbang po mchog tu 'gyur/ /nam yang ngan pa'i ro ni yong
137a7(mdo sde): mi myong / /reg ma thag tu lha yi ro bror 'gyur/ /lha yi ro bro shin tu ldan pa yin/ /rna bar snyan cing yid du 'ong ba dang / /'jam zhing mnyen pa'i sgra skad rab tu smra/ /'khor gyi dbus der dga' bar 'gyur ba yi/ /zab mo'i dbyangs ni rtag par rab tu smra/ /bye ba khrag khrig
137b1(mdo sde): du ma'i dpe rnams kyis/ /des bshad pa la chos rnams gang nyan pa/ /de na de la mchog tu dga' ba skyed/ /de la mchod pa dpag tu med pa byed/ /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin lha min dang / /gsang ba pa dag rtag tu de lta 'dod/ /chos 'di shin tu gus par nyan pa de/ /yon tan
137b2(mdo sde): 'di dag thams cad de yir 'gyur/ /'dod par gyur na 'jig rten khams 'di dag /dbyangs kyis thams cad du yang go bar byed/ /de yi dbyangs ni mnyen zhing 'jam pa ste/ /zab cing snyan la shin tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po sa bdag 'khor los sgyur ba rnams/ /mchod
137b3(mdo sde): pa'i phyir ni de yi drung du 'dong / /bu dang chung mar bcas te thal mo sbyar/ /rtag tu de la chos ni nyan par 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin rnams kyis rtag tu bkur sti byed/ /klu dang dri za dag gi tshogs rnams dang / /sha za pho dang sha za mo rnams kyis/ /bsti stang ri mo mchod pa rnams
137b4(mdo sde): kyang byas/ /tshangs pa rnams la de ni dbang byed 'gyur/ /lha bu dbang phyug che dang dbang phyug dang / /brgya byin de bzhin lha yi bu gzhan dang / /lha yi bu mo mang po drung du 'gro/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten phan zhing thugs brtse gang / /nyan thos bcas pas de yi dbyangs thos
137b5(mdo sde): nas/ /zhal ston pa dang bsrung ba dag kyang mdzad/ /chos 'di 'chad pa la ni dgyes par 'gyur/ /rtag par rgyun du brtson gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin tam klog gam rab tu 'chad dam ston tam yi ger bris na/ de'i
137b6(mdo sde): lus kyi yon tan brgyad brgya thob par 'gyur ro/ /de'i lus yongs su dag ste pags pa'i mdog bai dUr+ya ltar dag cing sems can rnams kyis mthong na dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i lus yongs su dag pa de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
137b7(mdo sde): snang ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can gang dag 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / ngan pa dang / bzang po dang / mdog bzang po dang / mdog ngan pa dang / bde 'gro dang / ngan 'gro dang / ri khor yug dang / khor yug
138a1(mdo sde): chen po dang / lhun po dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab la sems can gang dag gnas pa rnams dang / 'og tu mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba la thug pa dang / steng du srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du sems can gang dag gnas pa de dag thams cad kyang bdag
138a2(mdo sde): gi lus la snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang la la dag bzhugs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag chos gang ston
138a3(mdo sde): pa dang / sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / sems can de dag thams cad kyi lus so sor thob pa yang / bdag gi lus la snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de'i lus yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas de'i
138a4(mdo sde): tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /gang zhig rgya che mdo 'di 'dzin byed pa/ /de yi lus ni yongs su dag par 'gyur/ /rnam dag bai dUr+ya ltar grub pa ste/ /rtag tu sems can rnams kyis mthong na dga'/ /me long phyis par gzugs
138a5(mdo sde): brnyan snang ba bzhin/ /lus la 'jig rten 'di dag de bzhin snang / /sems can gzhan min rang byung de yis mthong / /yongs su dag pa'i lus ni de 'dra'o/ /'jig rten khams 'di'i sems can ci yod pa/ /lha mi lha ma yin dang gsang ba pa/ /sems dmyal
138a6(mdo sde): dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams/ /lus de la ni gzugs brnyan so sor snang / /srid pa'i rtse bar gzhal med khang gi lha/ /brag rnams dang ni ri dang kho ra yug /gangs ri ri rab lhun po chen po rnams/ /de yi lus las rnam pa thams cad snang / /de yi lus la nyan thos
138a7(mdo sde): bcas pa yi/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang sangs rgyas sras gzhan yang / /byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu gang gnas dang / /tshogs la gang dag chos ston rnams kyang snang / /de yi rnam dag lus ni de 'dra ste/ /'jig rten khams rnams thams cad de la snang / /
138b1(mdo sde): de ni da dung lha yis ma thob ste/ /de yi rang bzhin lus ni de 'dra'o/ /rtag par rgyun du brtson gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin tam ston tam rab tu 'chad dam
138b2(mdo sde): yi ger 'dri 'am klog na/ yid kyi las kyi yon tan stong nyis brgya po de dag dang ldan zhing yid kyi dbang po yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /de yid kyi dbang po yongs su dag pa des/ tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig thos pas kyang de'i don mang por shes so/ /des de dag
138b3(mdo sde): khong du chud nas de'i phyir zla ba gcig tu chos ston to/ /zla ba bzhi 'am lor yang chos ston to/ /chos gang bshad pa de la de brjed ngas par mi 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten pa'i 'jig rten gyi tha snyad gang dag skad dam sngags ci yod pa de dag thams cad chos kyi tshul dang sbyor
138b4(mdo sde): ro/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can 'gro ba drug tu skyes shing 'khor ba'i sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa'i g.yo ba rnams kyang shes so/ /g.yos pa dang bsam pa dang spros pa rnams kyang shes shing
138b5(mdo sde): rab tu rtogs so/ /re zhig 'phags pa'i ye shes ma thob kyang de'i yid kyi dbang po 'di lta bur yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi nges pa'i tshig gang dang gang rjes su bsams te/ gtam ston pa de dag thams cad kyang yang dag par ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs
138b6(mdo sde): pas gsungs pa thams cad ston to/ /sngon gyi rgyal bas mdo sde'i rnam grangs bstan pa thams cad 'chad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /de yi yid kyi dbang po rnam dag 'gyur/ /gsal zhing 'od gsal
138b7(mdo sde): rnyog pa med pa ste/ /ngan pa bzang po de bzhin bar ma dang / /des ni rnam pa mang po'i chos rab shes/ /brtan pa des ni tshigs bcad gcig thos kyang / /de don rnam pa mang po de yis shes/ /zla ba bzhi 'am de bzhin lo yi bar/ /rtag tu yang dag 'brel par rab tu
139a1(mdo sde): smra/ /sems can gang rnams 'jig rten khams 'di yi/ /phyi rol dag dang nang na gang gnas pa/ /lha mi lha ma yin dang gsang ba pa/ /klu dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas gar song dang / /'gro ba drug na gnas pa'i sems can rnams/ /de dag rnams kyis
139a2(mdo sde): rnam par ci bsams pa/ /skad cig tu ni thams cad mkhas pas shes/ /mdo 'dzin pa yi phan yon 'di dag go /bsod nams brgya yi mtshan ldan sangs rgyas kyis/ /'jig rten kun la chos gang rab bshad pa/ /de yi rnam par dag pa'i sgra yang thos/ /de yis
139a3(mdo sde): ci bstan pa yang des bzung ste/ /chos kyi mchog kyang mang du rnam par sems/ /de ni rtag tu mang po ston par 'gyur/ /de ni rmongs par nam yang mi 'gyur te/ /mdo 'dzin pa yi phan yon 'di dag go/ /des ni mtshams dang tshig kyang rab tu shes/ /chos rnams kun
139a4(mdo sde): gyi mtshan nyid mi 'thun dang / /don dang nges pa'i tshig kyang rab tu shes/ /ji ltar de dag shes pa bzhin du 'chad/ /sngon gyi 'jig rten dag gi slob dpon gyis/ /yun ring 'dir ni mdo sde gang bshad pa/ /de yi chos rnams 'khor gyi dbus su yang / /'jigs pa med
139a5(mdo sde): par rtag tu de 'chad do/ /mdo 'di bzung ba dang ni bklags pa yis/ /de yi yid kyi dbang po de 'drar 'gyur/ /da dung ma chags ye shes ma thob ste/ /'di ni de yi sngon du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i mdo 'di 'dzin pa yang / /slob dpon gyi ni sa la 'jug
139a6(mdo sde): pa yin/ /sems can thams cad la yang chos smra ste/ /nges tshig bye ba snyed la mkhas par 'gyur/ /dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po las skye mched drug rnam par dag pa'i phan yon gyi le'u zhes bya ba ste bco brgyad pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan
139a7(mdo sde): 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob la bka' stsal pa/ mthu chen thob rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ gang dag kha cig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'di spong ba dang / mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa'i dge slong dang /
139b1(mdo sde): dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma la gshe zhing mi snyan par smra ba dang / tshogs par mi dbyung ba'i tshig rtsub po zer ba de dag gi rnam par smin pa 'dod pa ma yin par 'gyur te/ de ni tshig gis brjod du yang mi nus so/ /gang dag mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di 'dzin
139b2(mdo sde): pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chad pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa de dag gi rnam par smin pa ni 'dod par 'gyur te/ ji ltar ngas sngar brjod pa de lta bur mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid
139b3(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /mthu chen thob sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa yangs pa tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag gi yang ches pha rol du gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na tha dad du gnas pa'i bskal
139b4(mdo sde): pa la/ 'jig rten gyi khams cher 'byung bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi
139b5(mdo sde): rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs bsgrags dbyangs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ mthu chen thob bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jigs bsgrags dbyangs kyi
139b6(mdo sde): rgyal po de 'jig rten gyi khams cher byung ba de na/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun na chos ston te/ 'di lta ste nyan thos rnams la ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal
139b7(mdo sde): ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las shin tu bzla ba'i phyir/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang ldan pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i chos ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ni bla
140a1(mdo sde): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las brtsams te/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi mthar thug pa'i chos ston to/ /mthu chen thob bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
140a2(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas 'jigs bsgrags dbyangs kyi rgyal po de'i tshe'i tshad ni/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gang gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed du gyur to/ /de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul phra rab
140a3(mdo sde): snyed du dam pa'i chos gnas par gyur to/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gling bzhi'i rdul phra rab snyed du dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan gnas par gyur to/ /mthu chen thob 'jig rten gyi khams cher 'byung ba de na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
140a4(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jigs bsgrags dbyangs kyi rgyal po de/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dam pa'i chos dang dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan yang med par gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
140a5(mdo sde): rgyas 'jigs bsgrags dbyangs kyi rgyal po gzhan yang 'jig rten du byung ngo / /mthu chen thob de lta bu gcig nas gcig tu cher 'byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jigs bsgrags dbyangs
140a6(mdo sde): kyi rgyal po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag nyi shu byung ngo / /mthu chen thob tha dad du gnas pa'i bskal pa la/ 'jig rten gyi khams cher 'byung ba der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar
140a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa 'jigs bsgrags dbyangs kyi rgyal po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thog mar gang byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las
140b1(mdo sde): 'das pa de'i dam pa'i chos nub par gyur te/ dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan yang nub par gyur pa'i tshe/ de'i bstan pa la nga rgyal can gyi dge slong gis shin tu non par gyur te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brnyas pa zhes bya ba'i dge slong
140b2(mdo sde): zhig byung ngo / /mthu chen thob ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rtag tu brnyas pa zhes bya zhe na/ mthu chen thob byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma su mthong yang rung ste/
140b3(mdo sde): de dag gi drung du song nas 'di skad du/ kho bo ni tshe dang ldan pa khyed la brnyas par mi byed de khyed ni ma brnyas pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyed thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cig dang / khyed de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
140b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ /zhes smra'o/ /mthu chen thob rnam grangs 'dis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge slong du gyur pa de/ sems can rgyang ring po na 'dug pa su mthong yang rung ste/ de'i drung du song zhing de skad du yang dag par sgrogs pa ma gtogs
140b5(mdo sde): par/ lung yang mi nod/ kha don yang mi byed de/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma de dang de dag gi drung du song nas/ 'di skad du kho bo ni tshe dang ldan pa khyed la brnyas par mi byed de khyed ni ma brnyas pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyed thams
140b6(mdo sde): cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cig dang / khyed de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes smra'o/ /mthu chen thob byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des de'i tshe dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/
140b7(mdo sde): dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am su dang su la de skad bsgrags pa de dag thams cad las phal cher de la khro zhing gnod par sems la ma dad pa skyed de/ de la gshe zhing spyos te/ ci'i phyir dge slong 'di ma dris par brnyas pa'i sems med do/ /zhes bdag cag
141a1(mdo sde): la ston te/ bdag nyid la brnyas par byed cing 'di ltar ma bsams mi 'dod par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bdag cag la lung ston ces smra'o/ /mthu chen thob byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de de lta bur gshe zhing spyo bas lo
141a2(mdo sde): mang po 'das te/ su la yang mi khro zhing gnod sems mi bskyed do/ /de ltar de yang dag par sgrogs pa la bong ba dang dbyug pa 'phen kyang / des de dag la thag ring po nas sgra chen por byas te/ kho bo khyed la brnyas par mi byed do zhes yang dag par sgrog go/ /des nga rgyal can gyi
141a3(mdo sde): dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma de dag la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yang dag par bsgrags pas de dag gis de la ming rtag tu brnyas pa zhes btags so/ /mthu chen thob byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brnyas pa de 'chi ba'i
141a4(mdo sde): dus byed pa nye bar gnas te/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jigs bsgrags dbyangs kyi rgyal po des chos kyi
141a5(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di tshigs su bcad pa dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag nyi shu bshad pa de yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brnyas pa de/ 'chi ba'i dus nye bar gnas pa'i tshe bar snang gi sgra las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos so/ /sus kyang ma
141a6(mdo sde): smras par des bar snang las sgra thos te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung nas mig rnam par dag pa dang / rna ba rnam par dag pa dang / sna rnam par dag pa dang / lce rnam par dag pa dang / lus rnam par dag pa dang / yid rnam par dag pa de lta bu thob bo/ /rnam par dag pa
141a7(mdo sde): de dag thob ma thag tu phyir yang lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag nyi shur bdag gi srog gi 'du byed byin gyis brlabs te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par bsgrags so/ /dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma nga rgyal can gang dag la
141b1(mdo sde): sngon khyed la kho bos brnyas par mi byed do/ /zhes bsgrags pa gang dag gis/ de'i ming rtag tu brnyas par btags pa de dag gis/ de'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi mthu dang / dam bcas pa'i stobs kyi mthu dang / spobs pa'i stobs kyi mthu dang / shes rab kyi mthu rgya chen po
141b2(mdo sde): mthong nas/ thams cad kyang chos mnyan pa'i phyir phyi na 'khod par gyur to/ /des gzhan yang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par btsud do/ /mthu chen thob byang chub sems dpa' sems
141b3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po de/ de nas shi 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po zhes bya bar mtshan 'thun pa bye ba brgya phrag nyi shu mnyes par byas te/ thams cad du yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par rab tu bstan
141b4(mdo sde): to/ /de sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba des rim gyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes bya bar mtshan 'thun pa bye ba brgya phrag nyi shu mthar gyis mnyes par byas nas de thams cad du yang / dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos
141b5(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ste/ 'khor bzhi la yang dag par rab tu bshad do/ /de sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba des mthar gyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin sgra rgyal po zhes bya bar mtshan 'thun pa bye ba brgya phrag nyi shu mnyes par byas
141b6(mdo sde): nas/ thams cad du yang dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid bzung ste/ 'khor bzhi la yang dag par rab tu bshad do/ /thams cad na yang mig yongs su dag pa dang ldan par gyur to/ /rna ba yongs su dag pa dang / sna yongs su dag pa dang /
141b7(mdo sde): lce yongs su dag pa dang / lus yongs su dag pa dang / yid yongs su dag pa de lta bu dang ldan par gyur to/ /mthu chen thob byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brnyas pa des/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong de snyed la bsti stang byas bla
142a1(mdo sde): mar byas ri mo dang mchod pa dang gsol ba dang dbul ba byas te gzhan yang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsti stang du bya ba dang bla mar bya ba dang ri mo dang mchod pa dang gsol ba byas nas/ de dag thams cad du yang dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i
142a2(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ste/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid yongs su smin pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mthu chen thob de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
142a3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jigs bsgrags dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i bstan pa la/ 'khor bzhi rnams kyis rtag tu brnyas par grags shing / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de snyed mnyes par byas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
142a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brnyas pa de/ gzhan zhig yin snyam du som nyi'am/ yid gnyis sam/ the tshom za bar gyur na/ mthu chen thob khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brnyas pa
142a5(mdo sde): zhes bya bar gyur to/ /mthu chen thob gal te ngas sngon chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma blangs ma bzung bar gyur na/ nga 'di ltar myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par mi 'gyur te/ mthu chen thob de ltar ngas sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs
142a6(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gan nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ste/ bklags pa dang bstan pas de'i phyir nga 'di ltar myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mthu chen thob byang
142a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brnyas pa des dge slong dang dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma brgya phrag mang po dag la/ bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par bsgrags shing / kho bo khyed la brnyas par mi byed do/ /
142b1(mdo sde): khyed cag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cig dang / khyed de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes byas pa dang / gang gis byang chub sems dpa' de la gnod sems bskyed par gyur pa de dag gis bskal pa
142b2(mdo sde): bye ba brgya phrag nyi shur nam yang de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong chos kyi sgra yang ma thos/ dge 'dun gyi sgra yang ma thos so bskal pa stong phrag bcur mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por sdug bsngal mi bzad pa myong ngo / /de dag thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa de las
142b3(mdo sde): yongs su thar nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so/ /mthu chen thob de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can du gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la bsting
142b4(mdo sde): ba dang / 'phya ba byas pa de dag gang yin snyam du som nyi 'am yid gnyis sam the tshom za bar gyur na/ mthu chen thob 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang na bzang skyong la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya dang seng ge'i zla ba la sogs pa dge slong ma lnga brgya dang bde gshegs sems
142b5(mdo sde): pa la sogs pa dge bsnyen ma lnga brgya ste/ thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par byas so/ /mthu chen thob chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang ston pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de ltar don che ste/ byang chub sems
142b6(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par byed par 'gyur ro/ /mthu chen thob de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis chos
142b7(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyun mi 'chad par gzung bar bya'o/ /bstan par bya'o/ /bklag par bya'o/ /bshad par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /'das pa'i dus rnams rjes su dran pa ni/ /'jigs
143a1(mdo sde): bsgrags dbyangs rgyal rgyal ba gang byung ba/ /lha mi gnod sbyin srin po'i 'dren pa ste/ /mthu chen de la lha dang mi yis mchod/ /rgyal ba de ni mya ngan yongs 'das nas/ /dam chos 'khrugs par gyur pa tha ma la/ /de na byang chub sems dpa' dge
143a2(mdo sde): slong byung / /de yi ming ni rtag tu brnyas zhes bya/ /de na dge slong gzhan dang de bzhin du/ /dmigs par lta ba'i dge slong de gan song / /kho bos khyed la nam yang brnyas pa med/ /khyed kyis byang chub mchog phyir spyad pa spyod/ /de bzhin rtag tu yang dag bsgrags pa na/ /
143a3(mdo sde): gshe zhing brgyad pa de dag bzod par byed/ /'chi ba'i dus byed nye bar gnas pa dang / /de yis mdo sde 'di ni thos gyur nas/ /de tshe mkhas pas 'chi ba'i dus ma byas/ /tshe yang shin tu ring por byin brlabs te/ /rnam par 'dren pa de yi bstan pa la/ /de tshe mdo 'di yang ni rab
143a4(mdo sde): tu bshad/ /dmigs can mang po de dag thams cad kyang / /de yis byang chub tu ni yongs smin byas/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' shi 'phos nas/ /sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong mnyes byas te/ /mthar gyis bsod nams byas pa de dag gis/ /mdo 'di yang ni rtag par
