149a4(mdo sde): dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kye srin mo dag legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis chos smra ba de dag la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bgyis shig /gang dag tha na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming tsam 'dzin pa de dag la yang / mdung can khyod 'khor dang bcas pas
149a5(mdo sde): bsrung bar bya na/ gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mtha' dag chub par 'dzin pa dang glegs bam du byas te/ rim gro byed pa dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan dang /
149a6(mdo sde): 'bru mar gyi mar me'am/ mar gyi mar me'am/ spos mar gyi mar me'am/ tsam pa ka'i mar gyi mar me'am/ par sha ka'i mar gyi mar me'am/ ud pa la'i mar gyi mar me'am/ sna ma'i mar gyi mar me'am/ de lta bu'i mchod pa'i yo byad rnam pa mang po brgya stong gis rim
149a7(mdo sde): gro byed pa lta ci smos te/ mdung can khyod g.yog dang bcas pas bsrung bar bya'o/ /gzungs sngags kyi le'u 'di bshad pa na srog chags drug khri brgyad stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po las gzungs sngags kyi le'u
149b1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o/ / //de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'
149b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na rgyu ba dang / bcom ldan 'das 'di dka' ba bgyid pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag gda'/ bcom ldan 'das gang thos pas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
149b3(mdo sde): nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po 'di dag gis thos nas thams cad dga' mgu rangs shing
149b4(mdo sde): yid bde bar 'gyur ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po'i spyod pa gang ci lags pa'i phyogs tsam zhig /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis legs par bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
149b5(mdo sde): kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pas gsol ba btab par mkhyen nas/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa la 'di skad ces bka'
149b6(mdo sde): stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes
149b7(mdo sde): bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
150a1(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal de'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgyad cu'i 'dus pa chen po byung ngo / /gang gA'i klung bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi nyan thos 'dus pa byung ngo / /de'i bstan pa la bud med med par gyur to/ /
150a2(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / dang / lha ma yin gyi ris med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang lag mthil ltar mnyam la nyams dga' bar gyur to/ /lha'i bai dUr+ya las grub pa'i sa phyogs rin po che dang tsan dan gyi shing ljon pas brgyan zhing / rin
150a3(mdo sde): po che'i dra bas bres pa dar gyi lda ldi mngon par rab tu spyangs pa rin po che'i pog phor nas bdug pas bdugs pa rin po che'i shing ljon pa'i drung thams cad na rin po che'i mkha' rten mda' rgyang gang gi tshad tsam byas pa yod pa/ rin po che'i mkha' rten thams cad kyi steng na lha'i bu bye ba
150a4(mdo sde): brgya dag / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ sil snyan byed cing pheg rdob pa dang rol mo'i sgra 'byin cing 'khod do/ /bcom ldan 'das de yang byang chub sems
150a5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba las brtsams te/ dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di/ nyan thos chen po de dag dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la rgyas par rab tu ston to/ /skar ma'i
150a6(mdo sde): rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal de'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bzhi khri nyis stong du gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag
150a7(mdo sde): dang nyan thos chen po de dag gi tshe'i tshad kyang de tsam du gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba de yang / bcom ldan 'das de'i gsung rab la dka' ba byed pa la brtson par gyur te/ de lo khri nyis stong du 'chag pa
150b1(mdo sde): la zhugs shing brtson 'grus chen po brtsams pas rnal 'byor la brtson par gyur to/ /de lo khri nyis stong 'das nas gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob ste/ ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can
150b2(mdo sde): thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba de tshim zhing mgu ste yi rangs nas rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ de'i tshe 'di snyam du sems te/ dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la brten nas gzungs thams cad yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
150b3(mdo sde): bdag gis thob po snyam mo/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba yang 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal
150b4(mdo sde): dang dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchod par bya'o snyam nas/ de'i tshe de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma
150b5(mdo sde): thag tu/ de'i mod la steng gi bar snang las me tog man dA ra dang / man dA ra chen po'i lha'i me tog gi char chen po mngon par bab po/ /dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i tsan dan gyis sprin byas te/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i char chen po mngon par bab ste/ skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu
150b6(mdo sde): rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de lta bu'i spos kyi rnam pa zho gnyis kyi rin du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dis mi chog go/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na
150b7(mdo sde): dga' ba dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las langs so/ /langs nas 'di snyam du sems te ci ltar lus yongs su btang ba ltar ni rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas pa ma yin no snyam mo/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu
151a1(mdo sde): rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba de de'i tshe/ a ga ru dang / du ru ka dang / pog gi khu ba za zhing tsam pa ka'i mar yang 'thung ngo / /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa
151a2(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa/ rnam grangs 'dis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba/ rtag tu spos za zhing tsam pa ka'i mar 'thung bas lo bcu gnyis 'das par gyur to/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/
151a3(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba/ lo bcu gnyis po de 'das nas rang gi lus lha'i ras kyis kun tu dkris nas 'bru mar gyis zhen par byas te bdag gi byin gyis brlabs byas so/ /bdag gis byin gyis brlabs
151a4(mdo sde): byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchod pa'i las kyi phyir bdag gi lus la me 'bar bar byas so/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
151a5(mdo sde): chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba'i lus kyi mar me 'bar ba de'i 'od kyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed khyab par gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed thams
151a6(mdo sde): cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi brtson 'grus rtsom pa yang dag pa'o/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang chos la mchod pa yang dag pa ste/ me tog dang / bdug
151a7(mdo sde): pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan gyis mchod pa dang / zang zing gis mchod pa dang / tsan dan sbrul gyi snying pos mchod pa ni de lta ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu sbyin pa 'di ni mchog
151b1(mdo sde): ste/ rgyal srid yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa ni de lta ma yin no/ /bu dang chung ma phangs pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa yang de lta ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu gang bdag gi lus gtong ba'i chos kyi mchod pa 'di ni mchod pa khyad par can no/ /dam pa'o/ /mchog go/ /phul lo/ /gya nom
151b2(mdo sde): pa'o/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis tshig de skad ces gsungs nas de nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
151b3(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba'i lus la 'bar ba lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du zhi bar ma song ngo / /de phyis lo bcu gnyis 'das nas zhi bar gyur to/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can
151b4(mdo sde): thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba des/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di lta bu'i mchod pa dang chos kyi mchod pa byas te/ de nas shi 'phos nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal gyi gsung rab la
151b5(mdo sde): rgyal po dri ma med pas byin pa'i khyim du skyes te/ skyil mo krung bcas bzhin du pang par rdzus te skyes par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba skyes ma thag tu/ de'i tshe rang gi pha ma la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/
151b6(mdo sde): rgyal mchog 'di na bdag 'chag cing / /der gnas bdag gis ting 'dzin thob/ /bdag gi lus phangs yongs btang ste/ /brtson 'grus sra brtsams brtul zhugs che/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
151b7(mdo sde): dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' bas tshigs su bcad pa de smras nas/ rang gi pha ma la 'di skad ces yab yum bcom ldan 'das gang la bdag gis mchod nas/ sgra thams cad la mkhas pa'i gzungs thob cing / dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos
152a1(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di yang tshigs su bcad pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gtams pa dang / dkrigs pa dang mi 'khrugs pa bye ba phrag brgyad cus/ bcom ldan 'das de las thos par gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
152a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal de da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ yab yum bdag bcom ldan 'das de'i drung du mchis na legs so/ /der mchis nas yang bcom ldan 'das de la mchod pa bgyi'o zhes smras so/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas
152a3(mdo sde): pa mngon par shes pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba de'i tshe/ nam mkha' la shing ta la bdun tsam du mngon par 'phags te/ rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs par skyil mo krung bcas nas bcom ldan 'das
152a4(mdo sde): de'i drung du song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te tshigs su bcad pa 'dis
152a5(mdo sde): mngon par bstod do/ /dpa' bo mi dbang shin tu dri med zhal/ /phyogs bcu 'dir ni khyod kyi 'od zer mdzes/ /bde gshegs khyod la bdag gis mchod mchog bgyis/ /mgon po lta ba'i slad du bdag 'dir mchis/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/
152a6(mdo sde): de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' bas tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal la 'di skad ces gsol
152a7(mdo sde): to/ /bcom ldan 'das khyod da dung bzhugs sam/ skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
152b1(mdo sde): dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu nga yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus la bab ste/ rigs kyi bu nga tshe zad pa'i dus la bab kyis rigs kyi bu khyod song la/ nga'i khri shoms shig dang nga yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/ /
152b2(mdo sde): skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na
152b3(mdo sde): dga' ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu bstan pa 'di ngas khyod la yongs su gtad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag dang / nyan thos chen po 'di dag dang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'di dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag dang / rin po
152b4(mdo sde): che'i mkha' rten 'di dag dang / rin po che'i shing ljon pa 'di dag dang nga'i bsnyen bkur byed pa'i lha'i bu 'di rnams kyang yongs su gtad do/ /rigs kyi bu nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel gang yin pa de dag kyang yongs su gtad do/ /rigs kyi bu nga'i ring bsrel la
152b5(mdo sde): khyod kyis kyang mchod pa rgya cher gyis shig / ring bsrel de dag kyang rgyas par gyis shig /mchod rten stong phrag mang po gyis shig /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
152b6(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba de la de ltar rjes su bstan nas/ de'i nub mo nam gyi cha smad la phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs
152b7(mdo sde): su mya ngan las 'das so/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal de yongs su
153a1(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das par rig ste/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po spungs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsregs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshig pa zhi bar rig nas ring bsrel bsdus te ngu zhing cho nges btab nas smre sngags 'don to/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas
153a2(mdo sde): pa mngon par shes pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba ngus te cho nges btab nas smre sngags 'don te/ rin po che sna bdun gyi bum pa brgyad khri bzhi stong byed du bcug nas/ de dag gi nang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i
153a3(mdo sde): ring bsrel bcug ste/ rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten 'phang du tshangs pa'i 'jig rten la thug pa gdugs kyi phreng bas legs par brgyan pa dar dang dril bu legs par spyangs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong byas te/ des mchod rten de dag byas nas 'di snyam du bsams te bdag gis bcom ldan 'das
153a4(mdo sde): nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la mchod pa ni byas na de bas kyang lhag pa ches khyad par du 'phags pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel la mchod pa bya'o snyam mo/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de nas byang chub sems
153a5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba des thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto
153a6(mdo sde): 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i tshogs de dag la smras pa/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de'i ring bsrel rnams la mchod pa bya bar soms shig /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
153a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba des/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten brgyad khri bzhi stong gi mdun du/ rang gi lag pa bsod nams brgyas brgyan pa 'bar bar byas te/ 'bar bar byas pas lo bdun khri nyis stong gi bar du de bzhin
153b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag la mchod pa byas so/ /des mchod pa de byas pas 'khor de las nyan thos grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong btul lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis kyang gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/ /
153b2(mdo sde): skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba de yan lag ma tshang bar mthong
153b3(mdo sde): nas ngus te cho nges btab nas smre sngags 'don cing gcig la gcig 'di skad du smras te bdag cag gi slob dpon rjes su ston pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba 'di da ltar yan lag ma tshang zhing lag pa med par gyur to zhes zer ro/ /skar
153b4(mdo sde): ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang lha'i bu de dag la smras pa rigs kyi bu
153b5(mdo sde): dag kho bo'i yan lag nyams par mthong bas ma ngu shig / cho nges ma 'debs shig /smre sngags ma 'don cig /rigs kyi bu dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs shing 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i
153b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kho bos dpang du bzhag ste/ de dag gi spyan sngar bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs so/ /bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag gi lag pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i phyir yongs su btang bas/ bdag gi lus gser
153b7(mdo sde): gyi kha dog tu 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des/ bdag gi lag pa 'di sngon gyi bzhin du gyur cig /sa chen po 'di lan drug tu g.yos par gyur cig /bar snang la gnas pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis me tog gi char chen po phob shig ces byas so/ /skar ma'i rgyal po
154a1(mdo sde): me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba des/ bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs de byas ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
154a2(mdo sde): rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /steng gi bar snang las kyang me tog gi char chen po mngon par bab bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba de'i lag pa de yang / 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de nyid kyi bsod
154a3(mdo sde): nams kyi stobs bskyed pa dang / ye shes kyi stobs bskyed pa des sngon gyi bzhin du gyur to/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba zhes bya bar gyur
154a4(mdo sde): pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du/ khyod som nyi'am yid gnyis sam the tshom za bar gyur na skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
154a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba zhes bya bar gyur to/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi
154a6(mdo sde): rgyal po bya dka' ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong de snyed byed do/ /lus yongs su gtong ba yang byed do/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par
154a7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di 'dod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag la rkang pa'i mthe bong 'bar bar bya'o/ /lag pa'i sor mo'am rkang pa'i sor mo gcig gam yan lag gcig gam lag pa 'bar bar bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la zhugs pa'i rigs kyi
154b1(mdo sde): bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa ches mang du skyed do/ /rgyal srid yongs su btang bas ni de lta ma yin no/ /chung ma dang bu pho dang bu mo phangs pa yongs su btang bas ni de lta ma yin no/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na nags tshal dang
154b2(mdo sde): bcas pa rgya mtsho dang bcas pa ri dang bcas pa 'bab chu'i dngo dang mtsho dang mtshe'u dang khron pa dang kun dga'i ra ba dang bcas pa yongs su btang bas ni de lta ma yin no/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems
154b3(mdo sde): dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu gang bar byas te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la sbyin pa byin na/ skar ma'i rgyal po me tog
154b4(mdo sde): kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las/ tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa
154b5(mdo sde): gcig tsam 'dzin pa de bsod nams ji snyed cig skyed pa de snyed du mi skyed de/ de'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa 'di ni de bas ches mang bar bshad kyi/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu gang bar byas te/ sangs rgyas dang
154b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la sbyin pa byin pa ni de lta ma yin no/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa 'di lta ste dper na 'bab chu'i dngo dang mtsho dang mtshe'u thams cad kyi nang na rgya mtsho ni mchog tu gyur pa yin no/ /skar
154b7(mdo sde): ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bshad pa'i mdo sde thams cad kyi nang na dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchog tu gyur pa yin no/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes
155a1(mdo sde): pa/ 'di lta ste dper na ri nag po dang khor yug dang khor yug chen po thams cad kyi nang na ri rab ni ri'i rgyal po ste mchog tu gyur pa yin no/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde thams
155a2(mdo sde): cad kyi nang na/ dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyal po ste mchog tu gyur pa yin no/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ 'di lta ste dper na skar ma thams cad kyi nang na zla ba ni 'od byed pa'i mchog tu gyur pa yin no/ /skar ma'i rgyal
155a3(mdo sde): po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde thams cad kyi nang na/ dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni zla ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bas lhag par 'od byed pa'i mchog tu gyur pa yin no/ /skar ma'i
155a4(mdo sde): rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ 'di lta ste dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni mun pa mun gnag thams cad sel bar byed do/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de bzhin du dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang
155a5(mdo sde): mi dge ba'i mun pa mun gnag thams cad sel bar byed do/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang na brgya byin ni lha rnams kyi dbang po yin no/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par
155a6(mdo sde): shes pa/ de bzhin du dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde thams cad kyi nang na dbang po yin no/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa 'di lta ste dper na/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa ni
155a7(mdo sde): tshangs ris kyi lha thams cad kyi rgyal po ste tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na pha'i bya ba byed do/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de bzhin du dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang sems can slob pa dang mi slob pa thams cad dang nyan thos dang byang chub
155b1(mdo sde): sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa thams cad la pha'i bya ba byed do/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyun du zhugs pa dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang phyir mi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom pa dang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni byis pa so so'i skye bo
155b2(mdo sde): thams cad las 'das pa'o/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa de bzhin du dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde thams cad las 'das shing mngon par 'phags te/ mchog tu gyur par
155b3(mdo sde): rig par bya'o/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa gang dag mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa de dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi gtso bor gyur par rig par bya'o/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ 'di lta ste dper na/ nyan thos dang
155b4(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nang na byang chub sems dpa' ni mchog ces bya'o/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de bzhin du dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde thams cad kyi nang na mchog
155b5(mdo sde): ces bya'o/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ 'di lta ste dper na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi nang na de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi rgyal por thabs gsol ba yin no/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu
155b6(mdo sde): rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de bzhin du dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba yin no/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ dam pa'i
155b7(mdo sde): chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sems can thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad las skyob pa/ sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar byed pa ste/ skom pa rnams la mtshe'u dang 'dra'o/ /grang bas nyen pa rnams la me dang 'dra'o/ /gcer bu rnams la gos
156a1(mdo sde): dang 'dra'o/ /tshong pa rnams la ded dpon dang 'dra'o/ /bu rnams la ma dang 'dra'o/ /pha rol du 'gro ba rnams la gru dang 'dra'o/ /nad pa rnams la sman pa dang 'dra'o/ /mun pa mun gnag gis bsgribs pa rnams la mar me dang 'dra'o/ /nor 'dod pa rnams la rin po
156a2(mdo sde): che dang 'dra'o/ /khams kyi rgyal po thams cad la 'khor los sgyur ba dang 'dra'o/ /'bab chu rnams la rgya mtsho dang 'dra'o/ /mun pa mun gnag thams cad sel ba'i phyir sgron ma dang 'dra'o/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de bzhin du dam pa'i
156a3(mdo sde): chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang sdug bsngal thams cad las rab tu thar bar byed pa'o/ /nad thams cad gcod pa'o/ /'khor ba'i bcing ba nyam nga ba thams cad las rab tu thar bar byed pa'o/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ gang gis dam
156a4(mdo sde): pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa dang gang yi ger 'dri ba dang gang yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ngam bstan tam/ thos sam/ yi ger bris sam/ yi ger
156a5(mdo sde): 'drir 'jug gam/ glegs bam du byas te/ bsti stang du byed pa dang / btsun par byed pa dang / bkur stir byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang /
156a6(mdo sde): rol mo'i sgra dang / na bza' dang / thal mo sbyar ba'i las dang / mar gyi mar me'am/ 'bru mar gyi mar me'am/ spos mar gyi mar me'am/ tsam pa ka'i mar gyi mar me'am/ sna ma dang skya snar dang / bar sha ka dang / na pa ma li ka'i mar gyi mar me'am/ mchod pa rnam pa mang
156a7(mdo sde): po dag gis bsti stang du byed/ btsun par byed/ rim gror byed/ mchod par byed pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa ji snyed cig 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de dag gi mtha' ni/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis kyang rtogs par mi nus so/ /skar
156b1(mdo sde): ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ gang zhig sman gyi rgyal po'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i le'u 'di 'dzin pa dang ston pa dang nyan pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa de bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur ro/ /gal te
156b2(mdo sde): bud med gcig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'dzin na/ de nyid bud med kyi lus kyi mtha' mar 'gyur ro/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ bud med gang la las sman gyi rgyal po'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i le'u 'di lnga brgya pa tha ma la thos nas nan tan
156b3(mdo sde): byed pa de/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ gang na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing bzhugs te
156b4(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes pa der/ de pad ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri la 'dug bzhin du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de 'dod chags kyis gzir bar mi 'gyur te/ zhe sdang gis ma yin gti mug gis ma yin nga rgyal gyis ma yin ser snas ma yin khro bas ma yin gnod sems kyis ma yin te/ de skyes
156b5(mdo sde): ma thag tu mngon par shes pa lnga thob par 'gyur ro/ /mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa yang thob par 'gyur ro/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nas/ de bzhin
156b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa gang gA'i klung bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /mig gi dbang po yongs su dag pa gang gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong bar 'gyur ba de 'dra bar de'i mig gi dbang po yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
156b7(mdo sde): de dag gis kyang de la legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur te/ gang khyod kyis dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de'i gsung rab la lung
157a1(mdo sde): mnos pa dang kha don byas pa dang bsgoms pa dang bsams pa dang yid la byas pa dang sems can gzhan dag la yang rab tu bstan pa/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyi bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa 'di ni mes tshig pa'am chus khyer bar
157a2(mdo sde): mi nus so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyi bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa 'di ni sangs rgyas brgya stong gis kyang bshad par mi nus so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bdud phyir rgol ba bcom mo/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho las brgal to/ /dgra'i tsher ma dkrugs so/ /sangs rgyas brgya stong gis byin
157a3(mdo sde): gyis brlabs so/ /rigs kyi bu lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na khyod 'dra ba med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gcig pu ma gtogs par gzhan nyan thos sam rang sangs rgyas sam byang chub sems dpa' gang gis kyang / khyod la bsod nams kyis kyang rung / ye shes kyis kyang
157a4(mdo sde): rung / shes rab kyis kyang rung / ting nge 'dzin gyis kyang rung ste/ zil gyis gnon par mi nus so/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ye shes kyi stobs bskyed pa 'di lta bu thob par 'gyur ro/ /skar ma'i
157a5(mdo sde): rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ gang la las sman gyi rgyal po'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i le'u 'di bshad pa thos nas/ legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin pa de'i kha nas ud pa la'i dri 'byung bar 'gyur/ de'i lus las kyang tsan dan gyi dri 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gang
157a6(mdo sde): gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad pa na legs so zhes bya ba byin pa de'i chos can gyi yon tan gyi phan yon de dag ni/ ngas da ltar gang dag bshad pa de 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems
157a7(mdo sde): dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i le'u 'di ci nas/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na spyod cing nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / bdud sdig can gyis glags mi rnyed pa dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha dang klu dang gnod
157b1(mdo sde): sbyin dang dri za dang grul bum rnams kyis glags mi rnyed par bya ba'i phyir ngas khyod la yongs su gtad do/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de lta bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir sems can nad pa nad kyis btab pa rnams la sman lta
157b2(mdo sde): bur 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab par byas te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas lus la nad kyis mi zug go/ /rga bas ma yin dus ma yin par 'chi bas ma yin no/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang
157b3(mdo sde): dag par zhugs pa gang la las/ mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong de lta bu de mthong na/ de la tsan dan gyi phye ma dang ud pal sngon pos mngon par gtor bar bya'o/ /mngon par gtor nas kyang 'di snyam du rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur/ 'di ni rtswa len par
157b4(mdo sde): 'gyur/ 'di ni byang chub kyi snying por rtswa 'ding bar 'gyur/ 'di ni bdud kyi phyogs pham par byed par 'gyur/ 'di ni chos kyi dung 'bud par 'gyur/ 'di ni chos kyi rnga rdung bar 'gyur/ 'di ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal bar 'gyur ro snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/ /skar ma'i
157b5(mdo sde): rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pas/ mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa'i dge slong mthong nas de ltar sems bskyed par byas te/ de ltar na de'i yon tan dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas
157b6(mdo sde): ci 'dra ba dag bshad pa de 'dra ba dag tu 'gyur ro/ /sman gyi rgyal po'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i le'u 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong gis/ sgra thams cad la mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i gzungs thob par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
157b7(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang des kyang / skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de ltar khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yon tan gyi chos dris pa legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /
158a1(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po las sman gyi rgyal po'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas de'i tshe/
158a2(mdo sde): skyes bu chen po'i mtshan smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od phyung ste/ 'od des shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed dag khyab par byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang gA'i klung brgyad
158a3(mdo sde): kyi bye ma snyed de dag 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer gyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho
158a4(mdo sde): zhing gzhes la/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rgya chen po tshad med pas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa des mdzod spu nas 'od gang
158a5(mdo sde): btang ba des/ de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer gyis brgyan pa de snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer gyis brgyan pa de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs zhes bya ba dge
158a6(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa sngon yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang po'i 'od zer de lta bu mthong zhing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis ting nge 'dzin mang po thob pa 'di lta ste/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung
158a7(mdo sde): rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin thob/ dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i ting nge 'dzin thob/ dri ma med pas byin pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob/ skar ma'i rgyal po rnam par rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob/ rlung lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob/ ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thob/ zla ba sgron ma'i ting
158b1(mdo sde): nge 'dzin thob/ sgra thams cad la mkhas pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob/ bsod nams thams cad kun las bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob/ dad pa can gyi ting nge 'dzin thob/ rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob/ ye shes ta la la'i ting nge 'dzin thob/ bkod pa'i
158b2(mdo sde): rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin thob/ dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin thob/ dri ma med pa'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin thob/ zad par chub pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob/ nyi ma'i 'khor ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs
158b3(mdo sde): kyis/ ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bar du thob par 'dug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs de'i lus la 'od des phog par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
158b4(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
158b5(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de yang blta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po de yang blta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu sbyin pa de yang
158b6(mdo sde): blta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa de yang blta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa khyad par can de yang blta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa'i rgyal po de yang blta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
158b7(mdo sde): sman yang dag 'phags de yang blta ba'i slad du/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du mchi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pas/ byang
159a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu khyod 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der song ste phyin nas/ ngan pa'i 'du shes bskyed par mi bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de ni mthon dman
159a2(mdo sde): can dang / sa las grub pa dang / ri nag pos gang ba dang / 'jim ngan gyis yongs su gang ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de yang sku thung ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang
159a3(mdo sde): lus thung ngo / /rigs kyi bu khyod kyi lus thob pa ni dpag tshad bzhi khri nyis stong ngo / rigs kyi bu nga'i lus ni dpag tshad 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad yod do/ /rigs kyi bu khyod ni mdzes pa blta na sdug pa gzugs bzang ba kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ bsod nams
159a4(mdo sde): brgya stong bas shin tu lhag pa'i dpal dang ldan pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu de lta bas na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du phyin nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de la ngan pa'i 'du shes ma skyed cig /de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub
159a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag
159a6(mdo sde): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bskyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par rol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der
159a7(mdo sde): mchi'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas ma g.yos shing / stan de las ma langs par 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i
159b1(mdo sde): dbyangs de ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de'i mod la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi gdan gyi drung du/ pad ma chu ba ni gser 'dab ma ni dngul snying po ni pad ma dang ne tso'am ci las grub pa bye ba khrag khrig
159b2(mdo sde): brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi byung bar gyur to/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ pad ma bkod pa byung ba de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
159b3(mdo sde): 'das 'di ltar chu ba ni gser 'dab ma ni dngul snying po ni pad ma dang ne tso'am ci las grub pa'i pad ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi gda' ba 'di su'i snga ltas lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces
159b4(mdo sde): bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal 'di ni shar phyogs logs nas 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer gyis brgyan pa nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun
159b5(mdo sde): tu rgyas pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ nga la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar
159b6(mdo sde): po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ong ba de'i snga ltas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu des dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs ci bgyis na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i
159b7(mdo sde): tshogs bsags pa des 'di lta bu'i khyad par 'di thob/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de ting nge 'dzin gang la spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin de bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mnyan par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ting nge 'dzin de la spyad par bgyi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'
160a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po de ci 'dra ba dang kha dog ci 'dra ba dang gzugs ci 'dra ba dang rtags ci 'dra ba dang dbyibs ci 'dra ba dang de'i spyod pa ci lags pa/ bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de blta bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das brda ltas gang gis
160a2(mdo sde): bskul ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir mchi bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i brda ltas shig de bzhin gshegs pas legs par mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
160a3(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rin chen mang la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /ci nas brda ltas gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs 'jig
160a4(mdo sde): rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir mchi ba de lta bu'i brda ltas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzod cig / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rin chen mang gis de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems
160a5(mdo sde): dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs bskul ba'i phyir/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di rigs kyi bu khyod kyi mthu mthong bar dga' bas rigs kyi bu khyod 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir shog cig ces de lta bu'i brda mdzad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
160a6(mdo sde): sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ byang chub sems
160a7(mdo sde): dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po de dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer gyis brgyan pa de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ zhing dag ni rab tu
160b1(mdo sde): g.yo bar byed/ pad ma'i char ni rab tu 'bebs/ sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni len cing / mig ni ud pal sngon po'i 'dab ma 'dra/ bzhin ni zla ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bas lhag /lus kyi mdog ni gser gyi kha dog 'dra la/ lus bsod nams brgya stong gis
160b2(mdo sde): ni brgyan/ dpal gyi sa ni rab tu 'bar/ gzi brjid kyis ni shin tu lhang nger gyur/ lus ni mtshan rnams kyis rnam par spras/ lus sred med kyi bu'i lus ltar ni mkhregs pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs par zhugs te/ nam mkha' la ta la bdun tsam nas byang chub
160b3(mdo sde): sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas 'ongs te/ de 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di ga la ba dang bya rgod phung po'i ri ga la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas/ khang pa brtsegs pa de nas babs te/ brgya stong ri ba'i mu tig gi phreng ba thogs shing / bcom ldan
160b4(mdo sde): 'das ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir mu tig gi phreng ba phul lo/ /phul nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
160b5(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa nyung ngam nyam nga ba nyung ngam bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar gnas sam zhes snyun gsol
160b6(mdo sde): lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de 'di skad ces kyang gsung ste/ bcom ldan 'das khyod bzod dam/ gzhes sam/ khams rnams 'thun nam/ khyod kyi sems can rnams go sla'am/ gdul sla'am/ gso sla'am/ gtsang ma 'dod dam/ ha cang 'dod chags mi spyod dam/
160b7(mdo sde): ha cang zhe sdang mi spyod dam/ ha cang gti mug mi spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das khyod kyi sems can dag shin tu phrag dog can ma yin nam/ ser sna can ma yin nam/ mar mi 'dzin pa ma yin nam/ phar mi 'dzin pa ma yin nam/ dge slong du mi 'dzin pa ma yin nam/ bram zer mi 'dzin
161a1(mdo sde): pa ma yin nam/ log par lta ba ma yin nam/ sems ma dul ba ma yin nam/ dbang po ma bsrungs pa ma yin nam/ bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis sems can de dag gis bdud phyir rgol ba bcom mam/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
161a2(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rin chen mang de/ rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten gyi nang na bzhugs pa chos gsan pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du gshegs sam/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang la
161a3(mdo sde): yang bcom ldan 'das de 'dri ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang de bzod dam/ gzhes sam/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang ring du gzhes sam zhes gsung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang / bcom ldan 'das de
161a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang de'i ring bsrel gyi sku blta bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang de'i ring bsrel gyi sku/ de bzhin gshegs
161a5(mdo sde): pas legs par bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa
161a6(mdo sde): rin chen mang de la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs 'di bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rin chen mang mthong
161a7(mdo sde): bar 'tshal nas mchis so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu khyod nga dang
161b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa mthong bar 'dod pa dang / dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa legs so
161b2(mdo sde): legs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi drung du sngon dge
161b3(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu zhig bskrun/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i
161b4(mdo sde): dus na bskal pa mthong na dga' ba la/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzugs thams cad shin tu ston par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul
161b5(mdo sde): ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sprin dang rnga sgra rgyal po zhes bya ba 'di 'jig rten du byung ste/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin dang rnga sgra
161b6(mdo sde): rgyal po de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis sil snyan brgya stong rab tu blangs te/ lo khri nyis stong du mchod pa byas so/ /rin po che sna bdun gyi snod brgyad khri bzhi stong phul lo/ /rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa sprin dang rnga sgra rgyal
161b7(mdo sde): po'i gsung rab de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis de lta bu'i dad pa thob po/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin dang rnga sgra rgyal po la mchod pa byas shing
162a1(mdo sde): snod brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag phul ba de/ gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod som nyi'am yid gnyis sam the tshom za bar gyur na rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu gang gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
162a2(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin dang rnga sgra rgyal po de la mchod pa byas pa dang / snod de dag kyang phul ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs 'di nyid yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang
162a3(mdo sde): po'i dbyangs de ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ yongs su sbyang ba byas pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs 'dis sngon yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi
162a4(mdo sde): bye ma snyed mthong ngo / /pad ma'i dpal khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs 'di mthong ngam/ pad ma'i dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
162a5(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad ma'i dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs 'di ni/ gzugs mang pos dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston te/ 'di lta ste/ la lar ni tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis/ la lar ni brgya
162a6(mdo sde): byin gyi gzugs kyis/ la lar ni dbang phyug gi gzugs kyis/ la lar ni dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs kyis/ la lar ni dmag dpon gyi gzugs kyis/ la lar ni mchog gi gzugs kyis/ la lar ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i gzugs kyis/ la lar ni
162a7(mdo sde): khams kyi rgyal po'i gzugs kyis/ la lar ni tshong dpon gyi gzugs kyis/ la lar ni khyim bdag gi gzugs kyis/ la lar ni grong mi'i gzugs kyis/ la lar ni bram ze'i gzugs kyis dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston to/ /
162b1(mdo sde): la lar ni dge slong gi gzugs kyis/ la lar ni dge slong ma'i gzugs kyis/ la lar ni dge bsnyen gyi gzugs kyis/ la lar ni dge bsnyen ma'i gzugs kyis/ la lar ni tshong dpon gyi chung ma'i gzugs kyis/ la lar ni khyim bdag gi chung ma'i gzugs kyis/
162b2(mdo sde): la lar ni grong mi'i chung ma'i gzugs kyis/ la lar ni khye'u'i gzugs kyis/ la lar ni bu mo'i gzugs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can rnams la ston te/ rigs
162b3(mdo sde): kyi bu gzugs 'di snyed cig kun tu ston pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can rnams la ston to/ /kha cig la ni gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyi bar gyis/ byang chub sems
162b4(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis/ dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can rnams la ston to/ /kha cig la ni lha ma yin gyi gzugs kyis/ kha cig la ni nam mkha' lding gi gzugs kyis/ kha cig la ni mi'am ci'i
162b5(mdo sde): gzugs kyis/ kha cig la ni lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs/ dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can rnams la ston to/ /sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas
162b6(mdo sde): dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang mi khom par skyes pa'i bar gyi sems can rnams la yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs skyob par 'gyur ro/ /btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa'i bar gyi sems can rnams la yang byang chub sems
162b7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs bud med kyi gzugs su mngon par sprul te/ dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /pad ma'i dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems
163a1(mdo sde): dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du skyes pa'i sems can rnams la skyob pa ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs 'di de snyed kyi gzugs su
163a2(mdo sde): sprul pas/ dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can rnams la ston te/ skyes bu dam pa 'di rdzu 'phrul yang nyams pa med/ shes rab kyang nyams pa med do/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs ni ye
163a3(mdo sde): shes kyi snang ba 'di snyed kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na snang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams gzhan gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na yang / byang chub sems dpas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la 'di byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyis chos ston to/ /nyan thos
163a4(mdo sde): kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la nyan thos kyi gzugs kyis chos ston to/ /rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis chos ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la de bzhin
163a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i gzugs kyis chos ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi bar gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel ston to/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la bdag yongs su mya
163a6(mdo sde): ngan las 'das par ston to/ /pad ma'i dpal de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs ni ye shes kyi stobs bskyed pa thob pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyis 'di skad ces
163a7(mdo sde): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa 'di/ bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis/ sems can
163b1(mdo sde): 'di snyed btul ba'i ting nge 'dzin de gang lags/ de skad ces gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal la 'di skad ces bka'
163b2(mdo sde): stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis 'di ltar sems can dpag tu med pa'i don byas pa ni/ gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di yin no/ /sang sang po'i
163b3(mdo sde): dbyangs kyi le'u 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs dang lhan cig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags pa de dag thams cad kyis
163b4(mdo sde): gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa de dag gis kyang / gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i ting nge
163b5(mdo sde): 'dzin thob par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
163b6(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang gi ring bsrel gyi mchod rten la yangs shing rgya che ba'i mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs par zhugs te/ zhing rnams ni rab tu g.yo bar byed/ pad ma'i char ni rab tu 'bebs/ sil snyan
163b7(mdo sde): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni len cing / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar nas/ lhan cig tu slar rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
164a1(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du bdag gis sems can gyi don byas so/ /
164a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang gi ring bsrel gyi mchod rten yang mthong ngo / /phyag kyang bgyis so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa yang mthong ste phyag bgyis so/ /'jam
164a3(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de yang mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyi shugs thob pa de dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu sbyin pa de yang mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig
164a4(mdo sde): brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po de dag thams cad kyis kyang gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i le'u 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' bzhi khri
164a5(mdo sde): nyis stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyis kyang / dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/ /dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po las/ sang sang po'i dbyangs kyi
164a6(mdo sde): le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o/ / //bam po bcu gsum pa ste tha ma/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/
164a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ci'i slad du spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bgyi/ de skad ces
164b1(mdo sde): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di la sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ji snyed cig sdug bsngal gang dag myong bar gyur pa de dag gis/ /gal te byang
164b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ming thos na/ de dag thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phung po de las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
164b3(mdo sde): gi ming 'dzin pa de dag / gal te me'i phung po chen por lhung na yang / de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzi brjid kyis/ me'i phung po chen po de las rab tu 'bar ba las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu
164b4(mdo sde): gal te chu klung dag gis khyer la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bos na/ chu klung de dag thams cad kyis sems can de dag thams cad gting tshugs par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu gal te sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya
164b5(mdo sde): stong rgya mtsho'i nang du grur zhugs te/ 'gron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / rdo'i snying po dang / byi ru dang / spug dang / mu tig dmar po la sogs pa'i phyir dong ba de rnams/ rlung nag pos srin mo'i gling du
164b6(mdo sde): 'phangs par gyur la/ de na sems can gcig 'ga' zhig gis spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bos na/ de dag thams cad srin mo'i gling de nas thar bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug spyan ras
164b7(mdo sde): gzigs dbang phyug ces btags so/ /rigs kyi bu gal te bsad par bkri ba las spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bos na/ gshed ma de dag gi mtshon de dag dum bu dum bur chag cing grugs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
165a1(mdo sde): 'di gnod sbyin dang srin pos gang bar gyur kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ming 'dzin pa la/ de dag thams cad kyi sdang ba'i sems kyis lta yang mi phod do/ /rigs kyi bu sems can la la lcags sgrog dang /
165a2(mdo sde): shing sgrog tu bcug par gyur na nyes yod kyang rung nyes med kyang rung na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ming nas phyung bas/ lcags sgrog dang shing sgrog tu bcug pa de dag gi bu ga bye bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
165a3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mthu ni de 'dra'o/ /rigs kyi bu gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di g.yon can dang chom rkun dang dgra lag na mtshon thogs pas sa gang bar gyur te/ der ded dpon gcig gis
165a4(mdo sde): 'dron po mang po phal po che rin po ches phyug pa ded de dong ba las/ 'dong ba de dag gis g.yon can chom rkun dang dgra lag na mtshon thogs pa de dag mthong ste/ mthong nas kyang 'jigs shing skrag ste bdag cag skyabs med par shes pa las ded dpon des 'dron po
165a5(mdo sde): mang po la 'di skad ces ma 'jigs shig / rigs kyi bu dag ma 'jigs shig mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sgra skad gcig tu bos shig dang / des khyod chom rkun gyis 'jigs pa dang dgra'i
165a6(mdo sde): 'jigs pa 'di las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro zhes bsgo la/ de nas 'dron po mang po thams cad kyis sgra skad gcig tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bos te/ 'jigs pa med pa'i sbyin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs
165a7(mdo sde): dbang phyug de la phyag 'tshal lo phyag 'tshal lo zhes ming nas phyung ma thag tu/ 'dron po phal po che de dag thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang
165b1(mdo sde): phyug gi mthu ni de 'dra'o/ /rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag 'dod chags spyod pa de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag byas na 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can gang dag zhe sdang spyod pa de dag gis/
165b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag byas na zhe sdang dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can gang dag gti mug spyod pa de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag byas na gti
165b3(mdo sde): mug dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ni rdzu 'phrul che ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ bud med bu pho 'dod pa gang la la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la
165b4(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal na de las bu pho 'byung ste/ gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa khye'u'i mtshan dang ldan pa/ skye bo mang po'i yid du 'ong zhing sdug pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'byung ngo / /gang bu mo 'dod pa de yang bu mo 'byung ste/ gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na
165b5(mdo sde): sdug pa bu mo'i mtshan dang ldan pa/ skye bo mang po'i yid du 'ong zhing sdug pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa 'byung ngo / /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi mthu ni de 'dra'o/ /gang dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

165b7(mdo sde): gang gA'i klung drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed dag la phyag 'tshal zhing ming 'dzin pa dang / yang gang zhig gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag la na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang /
166a1(mdo sde): gzims cha dang / snyun gyi gsos sman dang / yo byad kyis mchod pa byed na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de tsam zhig skyed/ de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub
166a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gzhi de las bsod nams bskyed pa ni bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/ /

167b6(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir ni bor ba'i mis/ /spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni/ /chus btab bzhin du me dag zhi bar 'gyur/ /rgya mtsho dang ni mya ngam rgal na yang / /klu dang 'byung po lha ma yin gnas su/ /spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni/ /chu yi nang du nam
167b7(mdo sde): yang mi nub bo/ /rab tu sdang ba'i yid kyis gsad pa'i phyir/ /ri rab lhun po'i rtse nas bor na yang / /spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni/ /nyi ma lta bur nam mkha' gnas par 'gyur/ /gal te rdo rje yi ni ri dag kyang / /gsad pa'i phyir ni spyi bor 'ongs na yang / /
168a1(mdo sde): spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni/ /ba spu'i khung tsam gtses par mi nus so/ /gsad pa'i sems kyis lag na mtshon thogs te/ /dgra tshogs mang pos kun tu bskor na yang / /spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni/ /de ma thag

169b5(mdo sde): kyi bu dag rgyal po dge ba bkod pa de la bu gnyis shig yod de gcig gi ming ni dri ma med pa'i snying po/ gcig gi ming ni dri ma med pa'i mig ste/ khye'u de gnyis rdzu 'phrul dang ldan shes rab dang ldan bsod nams dang ldan ye shes dang ldan te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la

170a1(mdo sde): song ngo / /rgyu skar dang skar ma dang nyi ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu song ngo / /dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu song ngo / /dri ma med pa'i 'od gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu song ngo / /dpa' rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu song ngo / /gzi
170a2(mdo sde): brjid chen po'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu song bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das de yang de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can de dag la thugs brtse ba dang / rgyal po dge ba bkod pa de la thugs brtse ba'i phyir/ dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston to/ /

170a4(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de la blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
170a5(mdo sde): rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de'i drung du bzhud de/ ci'i slad du zhe na yum bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de/ lha
170a6(mdo sde): dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs rgyas par rab tu 'chad kyis de mnyan pa'i phyir bzhud do/ /rigs kyi bu dag la de skad ces smras nas/ rgyal po'i chung ma dri ma med pas byin pas/ khye'u dri ma med pa'i snying po dang dri
170a7(mdo sde): ma med pa'i mig la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyi pha rgyal po dge ba bkod pa 'di bram ze la dad pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la blta ba'i phyir 'gror mi ster ro/ /rigs kyi bu dag de nas/ khye'u dri ma med pa'i snying po dang khye'u dri ma med pa'i mig gis
170b1(mdo sde): sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar nas/ bdag cag skyed pa'i ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag cag log par lta ba'i khyim du skyes te/ bdag cag chos kyi rgyal po'i bu ma lags pa ste/ rigs kyi bu dag de nas rgyal po'i chung ma dri ma med pas byin pas/ khye'u de
170b2(mdo sde): dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis bdag cag gi pha rgyal po dge ba bkod pa la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ cho 'phrul cung zad cig legs par ston cig dang khyed la dad par 'gyur yang srid kyis/ sems dad par gyur na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
170b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de'i gan du 'dong bar gnang ngo / /rigs kyi bu dag de nas khye'u dri ma med pa'i snying po dang khye'u dri ma med pa'i mig gis/ de'i tshe ta la bdun tsam du
170b4(mdo sde): nam mkha' la 'phags nas/ pha rgyal po dge ba bkod pa de la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i cho 'phrul zung du byed de/ de dag nam mkha' bar snang de la dong nas nyal bar byed do/ /bar snang de la 'chag go/ /bar snang de la rdul sprug go/ /bar snang
170b5(mdo sde): de nyid la lus kyi smad nas chu'i rgyun gtong zhing / lus kyi stod nas me'i phung po rab tu 'bar bar byed do/ /lus kyi stod nas chu'i rgyun gtong zhing / lus kyi smad nas me'i phung po rab tu 'bar bar byed do/ /de dag nam mkha' de nyid la chen por gyur nas chung ngur gyur/
170b6(mdo sde): chung ngur gyur nas chen por gyur to/ /bar snang de nyid la mi snang bar gyur te sa las byung ngo / /sa las byung nas nam mkha' la 'phags so/ /rigs kyi bu dag khye'u de gnyis kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de snyed kyis/ rang gi pha rgyal po dge ba bkod pa btul lo/ /rigs
170b7(mdo sde): kyi bu dag de nas rgyal po dge ba bkod pas/ khye'u de gnyis kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de dag mthong nas/ de'i tshe tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' zhing bde ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te/ khye'u de dag la 'di skad ces/ rigs kyi
171a1(mdo sde): bu dag khyed kyi ston pa su/ khyed su'i slob ma zhes smras so/ /rigs kyi bu dag de nas khye'u de gnyis kyis rgyal po dge ba bkod pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
171a2(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la rin po che'i shing byang chub kyi shing drung na chos kyi gdan la bzhugs te/ lha dang bcas bdud dang bcas tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun na dam pa'i
171a3(mdo sde): chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs rgyas par rab tu 'chad pa'i bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag cag gi ston pa ste/ rgyal po chen po bdag cag ni de'i slob ma'o/ /rigs kyi bu dag de nas rgyal po dge ba bkod pas khye'u de gnyis la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs
171a4(mdo sde): kyi bu dag khyed kyi ston pa lta zhing bcom ldan 'das de'i drung du bdag kyang 'gro'o/ /rigs kyi bu dag de nas khye'u de gnyis bar snang de las babs nas/ bdag cag skyed pa'i ma ga la ba der song ste phyin nas sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te/ bdag cag skyed pa'i ma
171a5(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces smras so/ /yum bdag cag gi yab 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu btul lags so/ /bdag cag gis yab kyi ston pa'i bgyi ba bgyis so/ /bdag cag bcom ldan 'das de las rab tu 'byung na yum da ni bdag cag gtang ba'i
171a6(mdo sde): rigs so/ /rigs kyi bu dag de nas khye'u dri ma med pa'i snying po dang khye'u dri ma med pa'i mig gis/ de'i tshe bdag cag skyed pa'i ma la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /khyim med rab tu 'byung bar ni/ /yum gyis bdag cag gnang bar mdzod/ /de
171a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa rnyed par dka'/ /bdag cag rab tu 'byung bar bgyi/ /u dum bA ra'i me tog bzhin/ /rgyal ba shin tu rnyed par dka'/ /dal ba 'byor pa'ang rnyed dka' bas/ /rab tu 'byung gis gtang du gsol/ /rgyal po'i chung ma dri ma med pas byin
171b1(mdo sde): pas smras pa/ de ring khyed gnyis gtang bar bya/ /byis pa dag go legs par deng / /de bzhin gshegs pa rnyed dka' bas/ /bdag kyang rab tu byung bar bya/ /rigs kyi bu dag khye'u de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas/ bdag
171b2(mdo sde): gi pha dang ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /yab yum legs so tshur spyon/ khyed dang thams cad lhan cig bzhud do/ /bcom ldan 'das de la blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
171b3(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de'i drung du bzhud do/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ yab yum sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka' ste/ u dum bA ra'i me tog dang 'dra zhing gnya' shing gi bu gar ru sbal gyi
171b4(mdo sde): mgrin pa chud pa dang 'dra ba'i slad du'o/ /yab yum sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag 'byung ba rnyed par dka' ste/ de bas na yab yum bdag cag bsod nams mchog gis brtan pas gsung rab 'di lta bu la skyes te/ yab yum bdag cag btang na legs te
171b5(mdo sde): bdag cag mchi zhing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ yab yum de bzhin gshegs pa
171b6(mdo sde): mthong ba rnyed par dka' ba dang / da ltar gyi dus na 'di 'dra ba'i chos kyi rgyal po rnyed par dka' ba dang / 'di lta bu'i dal ba 'byor pa shin tu rnyed par dka' ba'i slad du'o/ /rigs kyi bu dag de'i tshe na/ rgyal po dge ba bkod pa de'i btsun mo'i 'khor las slas
171b7(mdo sde): brgyad khri bzhi stong dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i snod du gyur to/ /khye'u dri ma med pa'i snying po dang dri ma med pa'i mig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la spyad de/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ngan song thams cad ji ltar bsal snyam
172a1(mdo sde): nas/ sems can thams cad kyi ngan song thams cad sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la spyad par gyur to/ /khye'u de dag gi ma dri ma med pas byin pa rgyal po'i chung ma de yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kun bstan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos gsang
172a2(mdo sde): ba'i gnas shes so/ /rigs kyi bu dag de nas khye'u de gnyis kyis rgyal po dge ba bkod pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la btul te zhugs par byas nas yongs su smin par byas te/ gnyen 'dab dang rgyal po'i chung ma dri ma med pas byin pa de dang gnyen 'dab dang
172a3(mdo sde): rgyal po dge ba bkod pa'i khye'u de gnyis kyang / srog chags bzhi khri nyis stong dang btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas blon po dang bcas te thams cad 'grogs nas lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs

172a5(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa des/ rgyal po dge ba bkod pa 'khor dang bcas te lhags par mkhyen nas/ chos kyi gtam gyis shin tu
172a6(mdo sde): legs par yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/ /rigs kyi bu dag de nas bcom ldan 'das des rgyal po dge ba bkod pa la/ chos kyi gtam gyis shin tu legs par yang
172a7(mdo sde): dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad pas/ de'i tshe tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ nu bo cod pan gyis bcings te/ rgyal por bcug nas
172b1(mdo sde): bu dang gnyen 'dab dang 'khor dang bcas pa dang / rgyal po'i chung ma dri ma med pas byin pa de yang / bud med kyi tshogs thams cad dang 'khor dang khye'u de gnyis dang lhan cig tu/ srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong dang lhan cig 'grogs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

172b4(mdo sde): bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob ste/ ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu de'i tshe nam mkha' la ta la bdun tsam du 'phags so/ /de nas rigs kyi bu dag rgyal po dge ba bkod pa nam mkha'i dkyil du 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra

172b6(mdo sde): bzlog ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu bzhag go/ /yongs su smin par bgyis/ zhugs par bgyis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba'i slad du yang bskul lo/ /bcom ldan 'das khye'u 'di gnyis bdag gi dge ba'i bshes
172b7(mdo sde): gnyen te/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dran par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bu'i gzugs kyis bdag gi khyim du skyes so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po
173a1(mdo sde): me tog kun tu rgyas pas rgyal po dge ba bkod pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no/ /dge ba'i rtsa bskyed pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo rnams ni srid pa'i 'gro ba dang 'chi 'pho'i gnas thams
173a2(mdo sde): cad du skyes pa na yang / gang dag ston pa'i byed pas nye bar gnas pa dang / gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa dang / 'dzud pa dang yongs su smin par byed pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams rnyed par sla bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po
173a3(mdo sde): chen po 'di lta ste dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa ltar 'dzud pa gnas 'di ni rgya che ba'o/ /rgyal po chen po khye'u 'di gnyis mthong ngam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so/ /

173a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gi slad du/ dbu'i gtsug tor rnam par mdzes spyan dri ma ma mchis pa lags/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu mdzes shing / zla ba dang dung ltar dkar la mdzes/ mnyam zhing thags
173b1(mdo sde): pa'i tshems kyi phreng ba zhal gyi nang nas mdzes/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgros me tog bim pa ltar dmar ba dang / bde bar gshegs pa'i spyan mdzes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas legs par bshad du gsol/ rigs kyi bu dag de nas rgyal po dge ba

173b3(mdo sde): dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das de la bstod do/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ji
