244b5(mdo sde): 'dzin la zhugs pa de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po nyi ma dam pa'i mig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs so/ /gang gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po byugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
244b6(mdo sde): 'dzin la zhugs pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs so/ /gang gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dbang po rnam par byed ces bya ba'i ting
244b7(mdo sde): nge 'dzin la zhugs pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po rdo rje'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs so/ /gang gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po dbang po'i 'gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
245a1(mdo sde): zhugs pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po rgya mtsho ltar zab ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs so/ gang gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po seng ge glal ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
245a2(mdo sde): zhugs pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po seng ge rnam par rol ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs so/ /gang gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po dam pa sbyin par byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs
245a3(mdo sde): pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po bstir med pa skems zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs so/ /gang gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po ba spu'i khung bu thams cad 'byed par byed pa de'i tshe byang
245a4(mdo sde): c hub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po yang ba spu'i khung bu thams cad 'byed par byed nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la spyan
245a5(mdo sde): ras gzigs kyi dbang po khyod kyi spobs pa de 'dra ba legs so legs so zhes smras so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa log par dad sel gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis byang
245a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i spobs pa cig mthong du zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i spobs pa ci 'dra ba de lta bu ni de bzhin gshegs pa dag la yang mi mnga'o/ /zhes ngas
245a7(mdo sde): log par dad sel las de skad thos so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po'i mdo'i rgyal po za ma tog bkod pa bshad du gsol/ /de'i slad du bdag cag chos kyi ros ngoms shing dga'
245b1(mdo sde): bar bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang dag theg pa chen po'i mdo'i rgyal po za ma tog bkod pa'i ming thos pa de dag la sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa med do/ /gang dag pha rol gyi bud med la chags shing zhan pa'i las la brtson pa dang / gang pha
245b2(mdo sde): dang ma gsod pa dang / dgra bcom pa gsod pa dang / mchod rten 'joms pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin pa dang / de lta bu'i sdig pa la dga' ba dag la yang theg pa chen po'i mdo'i rgyal po za ma tog bkod pas sdig pa las thar bar byed do/ /
245b3(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ji ltar theg pa chen po'i mdo za ma tog bkod pa sdig pa thams cad las thar bar bgyid pa 'tshal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
245b4(mdo sde): pa/ rigs kyi bu ri rab ri'i rgyal po'i g.yas phyogs kyi ngos la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas drug gis dri ma dang dri ma med pa'i mthar brtags pa yod de/ da ltar ngas kyang brtags so/ /gang gos dkar po sngon por 'gyur ba dang / gang gos sngon po dkar
245b5(mdo sde): por 'gyur ba ni/ gang gos dkar po de sngon por 'gyur ba de ni sdig pa'i phung por blta'o/ /gang gos sngon po de dkar por 'gyur ba de ni chos kyi phung por blta'o/ /rigs kyi bu de bzhin du theg pa chen po'i mdo'i rgyal po za ma tog bkod pa de ni sdig pa thams cad sreg cing
245b6(mdo sde): dkar por byed do/ /sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba 'di lta ste/ dper na dbyar gyi dus kyi tshe rtswa dang nags tshal dag shin tu sngo bar 'gyur te/ de nas klu'i rgyal po kha brgya pa zhes bya ba gnas nas langs te rtswa dang shing gel pa dang sman dang nags tshal dag sreg par byed
245b7(mdo sde): do/ /rigs kyi bu de bzhin du theg pa chen po'i mdo'i rgyal po za ma tog bkod pa 'di ni sdig pa thams cad sreg par byed do/ /gang theg pa chen po'i mdo'i rgyal po thos pa'i sems can de dag ni bde ba dang ldan pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de dag ni so so'i skye bo ma yin par rig par bya'o/ /
246a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa dang 'dra bar blta'o/ /de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa bcu gnyis gshegs te/ rigs kyi bu ma 'jigs shig ma 'jigs shig /khyod kyis theg pa chen po'i mdo'i rgyal po thos so/ /khyod slar 'khor
246a2(mdo sde): bar mi 'khor bar 'gyur ro/ /slar skye ba dang rga ba dang 'chi ba mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /'ga' zhig 'dod pa dang phrad la mi dga' zhing mi 'dod pa dang phrad par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song zhing de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas
246a3(mdo sde): pa las dam pa'i chos thos par 'gyur ro zhes dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/ rigs kyi bu de ltar sems can de dag bde bar mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
246a4(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu song ngo / /de nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba cang mi zer bar 'dug go/ /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dong
246a5(mdo sde): ngo / /gang gi tshe na de dag dong ba de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi bslab pa'i sdom pa bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gang dag bsnyen par
246a6(mdo sde): rdzogs par byed 'dod pa des thog ma kho nar song ste sna tshogs pa dag gi gnas brtag par bya'o/ /brtags nas dge slong dag la btsun pa sna tshogs kyi gnas ni dag ste/ sna tshogs kyi gnas de na rus pa yang ma mchis so/ /bshang gci yang ma mchis te/ sna tshogs
246a7(mdo sde): kyi gnas de ni yongs su dag go/ /dge slong dag kyang bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyir rung ngo zhes sbran to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshul khrims dang mi ldan pas ni bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bya'o/ /gsol pa dang bzhi pa yang sbyin par mi bya'o/ /bar gyi gsol
246b1(mdo sde): ba yang mi bya'o/ /mang du bshad ci dgos te/ dge slong dag tshul khrims dang mi ldan pa'i dge slong gis ni sna tshogs kyi gnas su yang 'gro bar mi bya na gsol ba dang bzhi ba bya ba lta ci smos te/ de dag ni ston pa'i bstan pa 'jig par byed pa'o/ /tshul khrims dang mi ldan pa
246b2(mdo sde): de dag ni sbyin gnas dag gi nang du gnas sbyin par mi bya'o/ /de dag ni gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du gnas su gzhug ste/ de dag la dge 'dun gyi zas kyang mi sbyin no/ /de dag la dge 'dun gyis yang 'os pa ma yin no/ /de dag la ni dge slong gi dngos po kyang
246b3(mdo sde): med do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe na de 'dra ba'i sbyin gnas dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga mya ngan las 'das nas lo sum brgya na de 'dra ba'i sbyin gnas
246b4(mdo sde): dag 'byung ste/ gang gtsug lag khang la khyim du 'du shes par 'dzin pa de dag ni bu pho dang bu mo dag gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag ni dge 'dun gyi khri dang / khri'u dang tshang thur dang sngas dang / mal stan dag la spyod par ma 'os pa la spyod par byed do/ /dge
246b5(mdo sde): 'dun dag gi nye bar spyod pa la bshang ba dang gci bar byed do/ /mchil ma dag kyang 'dor zhing las kyi rnam par smin pa mi shes so/ /gang dge 'dun gyi nye bar spyod pa la mchil ma 'dor ba de dag ni lo bcu gnyis su shing sA la'i tshal du kha khab kyi mig tsam gyi srog chags su skye'o/ /
246b6(mdo sde): gang dge 'dun gyi so shing la spyod du ma 'os pa la spyod pa de dag ni ru sbal dang / chu srin dang nya'i nang du skye'o/ /gang dge 'dun gyi til dang 'bras dang rgya shug dang / ku lan tha la sogs pa gang spyod par ma 'os pa la spyod pa de dag ni kyi grong khyer du skye ste/ mgal ba 'dra
246b7(mdo sde): zhing keng rus bsgreng ba lta bu bdag gi skra dang kha spus khebs pa/ kha khab kyi mig tsam du gyur pa'i sdug bsngal de dag lus la myong bar 'gyur ro/ /gang dge 'dun gyi zas kyis khyi gso bar byed pa de dag ni rigs dma' bar skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang po nyams par 'gyur ro/ /sgur
247a1(mdo sde): po dang khyor por skye'o/ /gzhan gyi bzhin la lta zhing slong mo byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas shi 'phos nas kyang nad bu can du 'gyur ro/ /lus las rnag dang khrag 'dzag par 'gyur ro/ /chu ba rnams 'khums par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe na langs pa de na sha
247a2(mdo sde): rnams sa la lhags shing rus pa rnams snang bar 'gyur te/ de ltar de dag lo mang por/ lo brgya stong mang por lus kyi sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/ /gang dge 'dun gyi sa la mi 'os par spyod pa de dag ni bskal pa bcu gnyis su 'o dod 'bod pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por
247a3(mdo sde): skye ste/ lcags kyi thu lum bsregs pa khar bcug nas mchu dang so dag kyang lhags/ rkan yang gas mgul pa yang tshig /snying dang rgyu ma dag kyang thams cad du thams cad tshig nas rus pa'i lhag ma lus par 'gyur te/ dge slong dag de'i tshe las kyi rlung langs nas shi nas kyang slar
247a4(mdo sde): 'tsho'o/ /de nas slar yang gshin rje skyong ba'i skyes bus bzung ngo / /de nas de dag gi las bdag gis bya ba'i las kyi dbang gis lce chen po 'byung bar 'gyur zhing lce de'i steng du gshol brgya stong gis rmo bar 'gyur te/ de ltar lo brgya phrag stong du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug
247a5(mdo sde): bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas shi 'phos nas me'i rdza ma'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes te/ de nas gshin rje skyong ba'i skyes bu dag gis bzung nas lce de nyid la khab brgya stong gis 'bigs par byed do/ /de nas kyang las kyi dbang gis sos nas me'i 'obs su 'dor
247a6(mdo sde): ro/ /me'i 'obs de nas kyang phyung nas chu bo be'i ta ra ni chen por 'dor ro/ /de nas 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sems can dmyal ba gzhan dag tu skyes te/ de ltar 'khyam pa las bskal pa gsum zad nas shi 'phos te 'dzam bu gling du dbul po dang / dmus long gi nang du skye bar
247a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo de lta bas na dge 'dun dag gi rdzas ni bsrung bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag gang bslab pa sdom pas chos gos gsum bcang bar bya ste/ chos gos gcig ni dge 'dun la yid brtan cing dge 'dun gyis spyad pa'i phyir ro/ /chos gos gnyis pa ni rgyal po'i
247b1(mdo sde): pho brang du 'gro ba'i phyir ro/ /chos gos gsum pa ni grong dang / grong khyer dang grong 'dab dang / ye 'ur 'khod pa dang tshong 'dus dag gi phyir te/ dge slong dag gis chos gos de gsum bcang bar bya'o/ /gang tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang yon tan dang ldan pa'i dge slong
247b2(mdo sde): dag gis ni ngas bslab tshigs bcas pa 'di gzung bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag dge 'dun gyi rdzas la spyod par mi 'os pa dag gis ni yongs su spyad par mi bya'o/ /dge 'dun gyi ni me'i 'obs lta bu'o/ /dge 'dun gyi ni dug lta bu'o/ /dge 'dun gyi ni rdo rje lta bu'o/ /dge
247b3(mdo sde): 'dun gyi ni khur lta bu'o/ /dug la ni gnyen po bya nus kyi dge 'dun gyi la ni gnyen po bya mi nus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i bslab tshigs la dge slong gang dag
247b4(mdo sde): 'dzin par bgyid pa ni so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa lags so/ /'dul ba la mngon pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi bslab tshigs kyi rjes su bsrungs pa lags so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
247b5(mdo sde): bos phyag 'tshal te song ngo / /de nas nyan thos chen po de dag bdag bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dong ngo / /lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag kyang dong
247b6(mdo sde): ngo / /bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga'o/ /'phags pa za ma tog
247b7(mdo sde): bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //
248a1(mdo sde): @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya rat+na ka raN+Da nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkon mchog gi za ma tog ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis
248a2(mdo sde): thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang byang chub sems dpa' khri dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ yang de'i
248a3(mdo sde): tshe bcom ldan 'das smyig ma'i ldum bu'i 'khor gyi khyams na 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong dang lhan cig tu brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig
248a4(mdo sde): rten skyong ba rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ smyig ma'i ldum bu'i 'khor gyi khyams ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan
248a5(mdo sde): gsum bskor ba byas te byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams dang lhan cig tu phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces
248a6(mdo sde): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das da ltar ci'i bka' mchid cig mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das bka' mchid de nyid kyi rjes rgyun mi 'chad par mdzad du gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras
248a7(mdo sde): so/ /'jam dpal da ltar ni nyan thos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad na/ 'jam dpal bdag gis khyod la bskul gyis byang chub sems dpa' dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid brtsam par khyod spobs par gyis shig /'jam dpal gyis smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
248b1(mdo sde): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' dang ldan pa'i gtam gyi snod du gyur pa ma yin na/ btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' dang ldan pa'i gtam cir dgos/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'dir gang snod du gyur pa 'byung
248b2(mdo sde): ba de dag la khyod kyis shod cig / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di na snod du gyur pa ni gang dag yin/ snod du ma gyur pa ni gang dag yin shes sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal bdag ni gzhan gyi sgra'i rjes su 'brang ba yin pas snod
248b3(mdo sde): dang snod ma yin pa lta ci shes mod kyi 'on kyang 'jam dpal khyod byang chub sems dpa' dang ldan pa'i gtam brtsam par spobs par gyis shig / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gang su dag skyon med pa la zhugs pa de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos
248b4(mdo sde): rnams kyi snod du ma gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor gang dag skyon med pa la yang rtog cing sems can rnams la yang lta la skyon med par yang mi ltung zhing skyon dang yang lhan cig mi gnas pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor
248b5(mdo sde): gzhan yang gang dag mtshams la gnas par gyur pa/ slob pa dang mi slob pa'i chos la zhugs pa/ sems can thams cad la btang snyoms pa/ srid pa la me 'bar ba lta bur lta ba/ yid yongs su skyo ba/ khams gsum thams cad kyis skrag pa/ skad cig tsam
248b6(mdo sde): yang srid pa mngon par 'grub par mi dga' ba de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du ma gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor gang dag phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa bye bar go cha bgos pa/ srid pa thams cad kyis mi 'jigs mi dngang ba/ khams gsum spyod yul ba/ dri ma
248b7(mdo sde): gsum dang bral ba/ 'khor ba la skyed mos tshal dang gzhal med khang du 'du shes pa/ srid pa 'dod cing srid pa thams cad la chags pa dang bral ba de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang gang dag 'dod chags
249a1(mdo sde): dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / bag la nyal ba dang / kun du dkris te 'dug pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du ma gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor gang
249a2(mdo sde): dag 'dod chags kyis chags pa yang ma yin la 'dod chags spyod par yang ston pa/ zhe sdang gis sdang ba yang ma yin la zhe sdang spyod par yang ston pa/ gti mug gis rmongs pa yang ma yin la gti mug spyod par yang ston pa/ nyon mongs pa dang yang bral la khams
249a3(mdo sde): gsum du yang snang ba/ sems can thams cad la byams pa/ ma khengs pa/ ma zhum pa/ sems can thams cad kyi khur khyer ba/ de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su song ba/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa/ rig pa gsum
249a4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ rig pa mngon du gyur pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du gyur pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal gal te/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gcig /de bzhin nyid kyang gcig /yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gcig na snod dam snod
249a5(mdo sde): ma yin pa de ji ltar mngon/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na rdza mkhan gyis 'jim pa'i gong bu gcig las snod rnam pa sna tshogs byas te/ snod de thams cad so gcig tu btang na/ de la kha cig ni 'bru mar dang mar gyi snod
249a6(mdo sde): du 'gyur/ kha cig ni sbrang rtsi dang li kha ra'i snod du 'gyur/ kha cig ni ngan pa mi gtsang ba'i snod du 'gyur te/ 'jim pa'i gong bu de dang so btang ba la ni tha dad pa kyang med do/ /btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyang gcig /de bzhin nyid kyang gcig /
249a7(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gcig mod kyi/ ji ltar las mngon par 'du byas pa bzhin du snod kyi khyad par du 'gyur ro/ /de la sbrang rtsi dang / li kha ra'i snod ji lta ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la blta'o/ /'bru mar dang mar gyi snod ji lta ba de bzhin du nyan
249b1(mdo sde): thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la blta'o/ /ngan pa mi gtsang ba'i snod ji lta ba de bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad la blta'o/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal rnam grangs gang gis gang dag snod du gyur pa de dag snod ma yin par 'gyur ba dang / gang
249b2(mdo sde): dag snod ma yin pa de dag snod du gyur pa'i rnam grangs yod dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor yod do/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ rnam grangs gang gis na gang dag snod du gyur pa de dag snod ma yin par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag snod ma yin pa
249b3(mdo sde): de dag snod du gyur pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gang la la nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi snod du gyur pa bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba ma bcom pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du ma gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor gang
249b4(mdo sde): dag nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi snod du ma gyur pa bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba bcom pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du gyur pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal snod du ci zhig gzhug par bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun
249b5(mdo sde): pa rab 'byor ci yang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' gzhug pa med pa dang / dbyung ba med pa la spyod pa de'i tshe snod kyi snying por rig par bya'o/ /gang gi tshe gzhug pa dang dbyung ba la spyod pa de'i tshe snod chag par rig par bya'o/ /
249b6(mdo sde): btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' ni rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman dang / nags tshal thams cad kyi snod ces kyang bya la gang gi snod kyang ma yin no/ /btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi snod
249b7(mdo sde): ces kyang bya la gang gi snod kyang ma yin no/ /btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sa las skyes pa'i shing rnams ni snod nam mkha' yin pas rnam par skye'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du lhag pa'i bsam pa las skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang snod
250a1(mdo sde): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin pas rnam par skye'o/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci byang chub sems dpa' rnam par skye'am/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gal te nam mkha' rnam par skye na/ de'i phyir byang
250a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyang rnam par skye ba zhig na/ nam mkha' ni rnam par skye ba'am/ yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur te/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang rnam par skye bar yang mi 'gyur/ yongs su nyams par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /rab
250a3(mdo sde): 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams rnam par skye bar yang mi 'gyur/ yongs su nyams par yang mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ci las bsams te de skad smras/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nyon mongs pa rnam par skye bar yang mi 'gyur/
250a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las yongs su nyams par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal nyon mongs pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la tha dad du bya ba ci yod/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor nyon mongs pa
250a5(mdo sde): rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la tha dad par bya ba ni kyang med do/ /btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi 'od kyis reg na gzugs thams cad 'di lta ste/ gser gyi kha dog tu kha dog gcig par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa
250a6(mdo sde): rab 'byor de bzhin du shes rab dang ye shes kyi snang bar byas pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyang 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi kha dog tu kha dog gcig par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa rab 'byor de bas na shes rab dang ye shes kyis snang bar byas pa'i nyon mongs pa
250a7(mdo sde): rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la ni tha dad pa kyang med de/ de bas na chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir na chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
250b1(mdo sde): btsun pa rab 'byor ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji lta ba bzhin zhes bya bas ci zhig bstan par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ thog ma ji lta bar tha mar yang de bzhin du de bzhin nyid las phyir mi ldog pas de'i phyir ji
250b2(mdo sde): lta ba bzhin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal thog ma dang tha ma zhes bya bas ci zhig bstan par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ thog ma ni stong pa nyid/ tha ma ni dben pa nyid de de bas na thog ma dang tha ma zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis
250b3(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'jam dpal stong pa nyid dang / dben pa nyid la tha dad du bya ba ci yod/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ gser dang sa le sbram la tha dad du bya ba yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal ming du
250b4(mdo sde): btags pa la ni tha dad pa yod do/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid dang / dben pa nyid 'di ni ming dang brda tsam du zad de/ ming dang brda la ni mkhas pa rnams mngon par zhen pa med kyi/ byis pa rnams mngon
250b5(mdo sde): par zhen to/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal byis pa'i mtshan nyid ni ji lta bu/ mkhas pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ji lta bu yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyis byis pa ni las kyi mtshan nyid do/ /mkhas pa
250b6(mdo sde): ni chos kyi mtshan nyid do zhes gsungs so/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal las kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid ni las te/ de la gang dag mngon par 'du byed pa de
250b7(mdo sde): dag gi ni yod par mngon no/ /gang dag mngon par 'du mi byed pa de dag gi ni med par mngon no/ /de la byis pa rnams ni mngon par 'du byed pas de dag gi ni yod par mngon no/ /mkhas pa rnams ni mngon par 'du mi byed pas de dag gi ni med par mngon te/ de la gang
251a1(mdo sde): yod pa dang / gang med pa'i dbus de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo/ /'phags pa'i spyod yul gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa ma yin pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'phags pa zhes bya bas
251a2(mdo sde): ci zhig bstan par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'phags pa zhes bya ba de ni rdul med cing nyon mongs pa med pa la yang dag par 'du ba'i gzhi'o/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal rnam grangs gang gis chos thams cad rdul med
251a3(mdo sde): cing / nyon mongs pa med pa la yang dag par 'du bar 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs yod dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor yod do/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ rnam grangs gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper
251a4(mdo sde): na rgya mtsho chen por chu thams cad yang dag par 'du ste/ de yang 'di lta ste/ lan tshwa'i ror ro gcig go/ /btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang rdul med cing nyon mongs pa med pa yang dag par 'du zhing / de yang 'di lta ste rnam par grol
251a5(mdo sde): ba'i ror ro gcig go/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang las rnam par thar bar bya ba'i phyir rnam par grol ba ston/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang yod na 'ching bar 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras
251a6(mdo sde): pa/ 'jam dpal mi shes pa yod na 'ching bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bas na mi shes pa las rnam par thar bar bya ba'i phyir rnam par grol ba bstan to/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos thams cad
251a7(mdo sde): la tha dad par bya ba med na shes pa'am mi shes par ji ltar bstan/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na dpyid kyis bsros pa'i chu la ni dro ba zhes bstan to/ /chu de nyid grang ba'i dus su ni grang ba zhes bstan to/ chu de la ni tha dad du bya ba
251b1(mdo sde): cung zad kyang med do/ /btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pas bsros pa'i sems la ni mi shes pa zhes bstan to/ /tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la ni shes pa zhes bstan te/ de la nang gi byed pa'i skyes bu de'i shes pa'am/ mi shes par
251b2(mdo sde): bstan pa ni gang yang med do/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal don de ni rtogs par dka' ba'o/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gnyis la spyod pa rnams kyis so/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal don de ni mthong bar dka'o/ /
251b3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi mig dang bral ba rnams kyis so/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal don de ni gting dpag dka' ba'o/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gting ma rnyed pa rnams kyis so/ /rab
251b4(mdo sde): 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal don de ni shes par dka' ba'o/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor lhag pa'i nga rgyal can rnams kyis so/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal don de ni go bar dka' ba'o/ /'jam dpal gyis smras
251b5(mdo sde): pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag dang bral ba rnams kyis so/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal don de ni mos par dka' ba'o/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor kun gzhi la dga' ba rnams kyis so/ /rab 'byor gyis
251b6(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'jam dpal don de ni brtag mi nus pa'o/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 'di ltar der mtshan ma kun du mi 'byung ngo / /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal don de ni rtog ge'i spyod pa can ma yin pa'o/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 'di
251b7(mdo sde): ltar de la so sor rnam par rig pa med do/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal don de ni mchog tu 'phags pa'o/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 'di ltar de ni bsngo ba'i 'du shes dang bral ba'o/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal don de
252a1(mdo sde): ni mkhas pa dang mdzangs pas rig pa'o/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 'di ltar de ni bdag nyid kyis rig pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas gang don du na don ni don ma yin pa'o zhes de skad bshad pa tshig
252a2(mdo sde): de'i dgongs pa'i tshig bshad pa ji lta bu yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor don ces bya ba ni brjod du med pa'i don to/ /de la gang dag brjod du yod pa'i don la spyod pa de dag gi don ni don ma yin te/ de bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis don du na don
252a3(mdo sde): de ni don ma yin pa'o zhes de skad bka' stsal to/ /gzhan yang btsun pa rab 'byor don ces bya ba ni dben pa'i don to/ /de la gang dag lus dang ngag dang / sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i don la spyod pa de dag gi don ni don ma yin te/ de bas na bcom ldan 'das
252a4(mdo sde): kyis kyang don du na don ni don ma yin pa'o zhes de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos thams cad chos ma yin pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis ci las dgongs te de skad bka' stsal/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa
252a5(mdo sde): rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs gzings dang 'dra bar shes pa rnams kyis chos nyid kyang spang bar bya na chos ma yin pa lta ci smos zhes de skad ces bka' stsal te/ gang spang bar bya ba de ni chos dang chos ma yin pa zhes mi bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
252a6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal ci sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang chos ma yin nam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la ni yang dag par grub pa gang yang med do/ /gang yang dag par grub pa ma yin pa de ni chos dang chos ma yin pa zhes mi bya'o/ /
252a7(mdo sde): de bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang chos thams cad ni chos ma yin pa'o zhes de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag bshad pa 'di thos nas mi skrag mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur ba ni ngo mtshar
252b1(mdo sde): to/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ brgya la seng ge'i phru gus seng ge'i sgra thos nas skrag gam/ dngang ngam/ dngang bar 'gyur ram/ ngang pa'i rgyal po'i phru gu nam mkha'i dkyil na 'phur ba na ngang pa'i sgra thos nas skrag
252b2(mdo sde): gam/ dngang ngam/ dngang bar 'gyur ram/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/ seng ge'i phru gu rang gi sgra dang / ngang pa'i rgyal po'i phru gu rang gi spyod yul gyis mi skrag go/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin
252b3(mdo sde): du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / gdung las skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin nyid dang / stong pa nyid las nges par byung ba de rnams ni chos thams cad dang / sgra thams cad dang / bshad pa thams cad kyis mi skrag mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur
252b4(mdo sde): mod kyi/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'on kyang gang yod na skrag par 'gyur ba shes sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'jig tshogs la lta ba yod na skrag par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'jig tshogs la lta ba de byang chub
252b5(mdo sde): sems dpas yongs su shes te/ de bas na chos thams cad kyis mi skrag go/ /de sgra thams cad dang / bshad pa thams cad kyis mi skrag mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpas 'jig tshogs la
252b6(mdo sde): lta ba yongs su shes na de ji ltar 'bras bu ma thob/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' ni 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa'i phyir 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa ma yin gyi/ 'bras bu 'thob pa la btang snyoms su bya ba dang /
252b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos thob par 'dod pa'i phyir sems can thams cad la snying rje chen pos sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpas 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes te/ de bas na 'bras bu mi 'thob bo/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i thabs
253a1(mdo sde): gang gis byang chub sems dpas 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes la 'bras bu yang mi 'thob pa de ni thabs chen po yin no/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi dbyings ni thabs dang shes
253a2(mdo sde): rab kyis yang dag par zin pa ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' de 'jig tshogs la lta ba yang yongs su shes la 'bras bu yang mi thob bo/ /btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu chen po che zhig gis mtshon cha rnon pos shing sA la chen po bcad na/ de
253a3(mdo sde): ril gyis chad bzhin du de nyid na 'dug ste mi 'gyel lo/ /btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi dbyings kyang thabs dang shes rab kyis yang dag par zin te/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' de 'jig tshogs la lta ba yang yongs su shes la
253a4(mdo sde): 'bras bu yang mi 'thob bo/ /btsun pa rab 'byor gang shing sA la chen po de char pa chen po bab ste gsher cing rlan par gyur na slar yang skye zhing yal ga dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dag kyang 'byung la/ gang sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur
253a5(mdo sde): ba de lta bu'i dus dang / de lta bu'i skabs kyang yod do/ /btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen pos gsher cing rlan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jig tshogs la lta ba yang yongs su shes la khams gsum du yang skye zhing gang sems can
253a6(mdo sde): thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ba tshe dang / rigs dang / skye bar yang ston par byed do/ /btsun pa rab 'byor gang shing sA la chen po de rlung chen po'i shugs kyis phul na sa la ltung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dus dang / de lta bu'i skabs kyang yod do/ /btsun pa rab 'byor
253a7(mdo sde): de bzhin du ye shes chen po'i rlung gi shugs kyis phul na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po 'gog par ltung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams
253b1(mdo sde): kyi thabs dang shes rab kyis yang dag par zin pa'i ye shes kyi dbyings dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa de ni legs par bshad de/ legs so legs so/ /'jam dpal 'on kyang dpe gang dag bstan pas byang chub sems
253b2(mdo sde): dpa'i thabs dang shes rab shes par 'gyur ba'i dpe ngas kyang bstan gyis nyon cig / 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na klu'i rgyal po mthu dang ldan pas sems pa'i dbang gis sprin gyi phung po gcig las char pa'i bdag nyid dang glog gi phreng ba yang gtong ngo / /skye bar byed
253b3(mdo sde): pa'i bdag nyid chu'i rgyun kyang gtong ngo / /'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang thabs dang shes rab dang / ye shes kyi sprin gcig las sems can so so'i skye bo rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi spyod pa yang ston
253b4(mdo sde): to/ /gdul bar bya ba'i sems can rnams gdul ba'i phyir 'phags pa thams cad kyi spyod pa yang ston to/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na ri'i rgyal po gangs ri la dri'i shing zhig yod de/ de'i rtsa ba'i dri yang gzhan/ sdong po'i dri yang gzhan/ yal
253b5(mdo sde): ga'i dri yang gzhan/ lo ma'i dri yang gzhan/ me tog gi dri yang gzhan/ 'bras bu'i dri yang gzhan no/ /'jam dpal de bzhin du dri'i shing lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus de yang sems can rnams ji ltar mos pa bzhin du so so ci rigs par chos kyi dri gtong ste/
253b6(mdo sde): snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba'i dri de las kyang mi g.yo'o/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na brgya byin thogs pa'i nor bu rin po che lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi mgul du thogs na/ de la sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas thams cad dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin
253b7(mdo sde): gyi dga' ba dang / rtse ba'i tshogs thams cad snang yang nor bu rin po che de ni rnam par mi rtog go/ /'jam dpal de bzhin du nor bu rin po che dag pa lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi dbyings de yang bya ba thams cad kyang ston la/ thams cad du yang rnam par mi rtog
254a1(mdo sde): go/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na nor bu rin po che yid bzhin du 'gro ba zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par byed kyang nor bu rin po che de ni rnam par mi rtog go/ /'jam
254a2(mdo sde): dpal de bzhin du nor bu rin po che lta bur lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin yongs su rdzogs par byed kyang byang chub sems dpa' de ni rnam par mi rtog go/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper
254a3(mdo sde): na nam mkha' la me yang 'bar zhing char pa yang 'bab mod kyi/ nam mkha' la ni tsha ba'ang med grang bar 'gyur ba'ang med do/ /'jam dpal de bzhin du thabs mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang kun du 'bar ba'i khams gsum na yang gnas shing mya ngan las 'das
254a4(mdo sde): pa'i zhi ba la'ang spyod mod kyi/ tsha ba'ang med/ grang bar 'gyur ba'ang med do/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la dug gi shing yang skye/ sman gyi shing yang skye mod kyi/ nam mkha' la ni dug gi shing gis nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur/ sman
254a5(mdo sde): gyi shing gis rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal de bzhin du thabs mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang dug gi shing lta bu'i phung po yang 'chang / sman gyi shing lta bu'i dbang po yang 'chang mod kyi/ phung po'i nyon mongs pas nyon mongs par yang mi
254a6(mdo sde): 'gyur/ rnam par dag pa'i dbang pos rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur la/ gnyi ga'i bya ba yang byed do/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na chu'i snod bu gu brgya yod pa la/ bu gu gcig bkag na thams cad nas mi 'dzag go/ /bu gu gcig phye na thams cad
254a7(mdo sde): nas kyang 'dzag go/ /'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par bzhag pa'i tshe mngon par shes pa chen po la yongs su rdzogs par byed kyi yul la mi 'dzag go/ /yang langs pa na 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la so so ji ltar 'os par
254b1(mdo sde): chos bstan pa'i phyir yul thams cad du zag go/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na mchog tu mthu dang ldan pa'i rta cang shes ni rta zhon pa la srung bar byed de/ bdag la ni de lta ma yin no/ /'jam dpal de bzhin du snying rje chen po thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
254b2(mdo sde): mchog tu mthu dang ldan pa dag ni sems can rnams la srung bar byed de/ bdag la ni de lta ma yin no/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na kyi rgyal po seng ge ni me 'bar ba ma gtogs par cis kyang mi 'jigs so/ /'jam dpal de bzhin du byang
254b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba ma gtogs par cis kyang mi 'jigs so/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na bal glang gi rgyal po sa srung gi bu ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs mod kyi/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha
254b4(mdo sde): rnams dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi bsod nams bsags pa'i phyir dga' ba dang rtse ba'i tshogs thams cad so so ci rigs par ston to/ /'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song yang 'di lta ste/ sems can
254b5(mdo sde): rnams so so ci rigs par yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi tshogs thams cad ston to/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na gang gtsub stan las byung ba dang / gang nor bu rin po che las byung ba'i me de gnyi ga yang tsha ba'i bdag nyid do/ /'jam dpal de bzhin
254b6(mdo sde): du byang chub sems dpa' gang sems dang po bskyed pa dang / gang byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i sems tha ma bskyed pa de gnyi ga yang sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa sreg pa'i bdag nyid do/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na dri'i shing sna tshogs rnams ni
254b7(mdo sde): de dag thams cad khams bzhis yongs su bzung ste skye'o/ /'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs kyi tshogs bsags pa de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub kyi sems kyis yongs su bzung zhing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
255a1(mdo sde): du bsngos na skye'o/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i 'khor lo rin po che gang du 'gro ba der 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dpung gi tshogs thams cad 'dong ngo / /'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub
255a2(mdo sde): sems dpa'i thabs dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang du 'gro ba der byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad 'dong ngo / /'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na bya'i rgyal po ka la ping ka'i phru gu sgo nga'i sbubs na 'dug pa sgo nga
255a3(mdo sde): ma chag cing sbubs nas ma byung yang 'di lta ste/ sgra yid du 'ong ba ka la ping ka'i sgra nyid sgrogs so/ /'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs su zhugs pa/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba ma bcom pa/ khams gsum nas mngon
255a4(mdo sde): par ma byung yang 'di lta ste/ sgra stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sgra nyid sgrogs so/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na ka la ping ka rma bya'i nang du song na ka la ping
255a5(mdo sde): ka'i sgra mi sgrogs so/ /ka la ping ka'i nang du song na ni ka la ping ka'i sgra sgrogs so/ /'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi nang du song na sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgra mi sgrogs so/ /byang chub
255a6(mdo sde): sems dpa'i nang du song na ni sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgra sgrogs so/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na rnam par 'thor rlung ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi shing ngam/ khang pa'am/ gzhal med khang ngam/ sa phyogs rnams kyis bzod par mi
255a7(mdo sde): nus so/ /'jam dpal de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su sgrogs pa na sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis ma brlabs pa'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis mos pa'am/ dad par mi
255b1(mdo sde): nus te/ gang dag sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs pa de dag ni mos shing yid ches so/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma'i 'od ni gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba gnyi ga la 'char mod kyi/ gtsang ba la yang rjes su chags par mi byed/ mi gtsang ba la yang
255b2(mdo sde): khong khro bar mi byed de/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni gang du yang brjod par bya ba ma yin no/ /'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer kyang nyan thos dang / so so'i skye bo la 'char mod kyi/ nyan thos rnams la rjes su chags par yang mi byed/
255b3(mdo sde): so so'i skye bo rnams la khong khro bar yang mi byed/ byang chub sems dpa' ni gang du yang brjod par bya ba ma yin no/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na nam shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi lo ma lhags par gyur pa de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams ring por mi thogs
255b4(mdo sde): par shing yongs 'du sa brtol 'di me tog dang / 'bras bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro snyam nas yid dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal de bzhin du nam byang chub sems dpa' bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar gyur pa de'i tshe ring por mi thogs par byang chub
255b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'di ni sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi me tog dang / 'bras bu sbyin par 'gyur ro zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bstod par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na shing gang dag rlung gis btud/ kun du btud/
255b6(mdo sde): rab tu btud pa de dag 'gyel bar 'jigs pa med do/ /'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sems can thams cad la 'dud/ kun du 'dud/ rab tu 'dud pa de dag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'jigs pa med
255b7(mdo sde): do/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na chu ni gang du dma' ba der 'bab bo/ /'jam dpal de bzhin du nga rgyal med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nga thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ga la ba der 'gro'o/ 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na nam rgya mtsho chen po dang po gnas pa de'i
256a1(mdo sde): tshe sa chen po thams cad kyi nang na dma' ba'i sa phyogs der dang por gnas te/ de nas 'bab chu'i rgyun thams cad tshegs chung ngus der mngon du 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal de bzhin du nga rgyal med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la tshegs chung
256a2(mdo sde): ngus sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thams cad du mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na nor bu rin po che rdo rjes nor bu rin po che thams cad 'bigs mod kyi/ nor bu rin po che rdo rje de ni de dag gis mi phigs so/ /'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub
256a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams 'dul mod kyi de dag gi gdul ba der yang mi ltung ngo / /'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na me tog man dA ra ba rlung gis bskyod na dpag tshad brgya kho ra khor yug tu dris khyab bo/ /'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub
256a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis bskyod pa yang sems can thams cad la byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i dris khyab par byed do/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na gang dag me tog man dA ra ba'i dri snom pa de dag ni nad thams cad kyis mi 'debs so/ /
256a5(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de bzhin du gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'i dri snom pa de dag nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na sangs rgyas 'byung ba med na u dum bA ra'i me tog mi 'byung
256a6(mdo sde): ngo / /'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub tu sems bskyed pa med na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi me tog kyang mi 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na nam klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa char 'bebs pa de'i tshe/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad khyab par char 'bebs so/ /
256a7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de bzhin du nam byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos kyi char 'bebs pa de'i tshe sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud la mnyam par 'bebs so/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na mtsho chen po ma dros pa las klung gi rgyun bzhi 'bab ste/ rgya mtsho chen
256b1(mdo sde): po bzhi yongs su 'gengs so/ /'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi 'bab pas ye shes kyi rgya mtsho chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /'jam dpa' 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po med na 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi
256b2(mdo sde): rnams nor bu rin po che la spyod par mi 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal de bzhin du sangs rgyas 'byung ba med na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par grol ba'i chos rin po che la spyod par mi 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na gzugs gang ci
256b3(mdo sde): yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad 'byung ba chen po bzhis yongs su bzung ngo / /'jam dpal de bzhin du gang byang chub sems dpa'i chos gang ci yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad byin gyi rlabs bzhis yongs su bzung ngo / /'jam dpal 'di lta ste/
256b4(mdo sde): dper na g.yang sa nyam nga ba na 'dug pa'i sman gyi shing skye bo mang po'i nye bar 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal de bzhin du nyan thos 'khor bas 'jigs pa'i g.yang sa nyam nga bar gnas pa rnams ni skye bo mang po'i nye bar 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal
256b5(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ dper na grong khyer gyi nang na 'dug pa'i sman gyi shing ni skye bo mang po'i nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal de bzhin du byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'i nang du song ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems bskyed pas
256b6(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na gang dbyar byung ba'i chu mig de dag ni yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal de bzhin du gang nyan thos rnams kyis chos bstan pa de ni yun ring du gnas par mi
256b7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na gang dpyid byung ba'i chu mig de ni yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal de bzhin du gang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos bstan pa de ni yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste/
257a1(mdo sde): dper na ri'i rgyal po gangs ri'i shing gang dag bcad pa de dag ni slar yang myur du skye'o/ /'jam dpal de bzhin du nam de bzhin gshegs pas bya ba byas te yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /de
257a2(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan bsngags pa tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan pa de dag gi yang dag pa'i yon tan bsngags pa 'di lta bu 'di dag de bzhin gshegs
257a3(mdo sde): pas gsungs pa ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de dag yang dag pa'i yon tan bsngags pa de lta bu de dag thos nas dga' bar mi 'gyur/ rgyags par mi 'gyur ba de'ang mchog tu ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
257a4(mdo sde): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad ni rtsa ba dag pa ste/ yang dag pa'i yon tan dang bsngags pa brjod pas dga' bar yang mi 'gyur/ rgyags par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams
257a5(mdo sde): rtsa ba gang las dag pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag med pa'i rtsa ba dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gso ba med pa dang / gang zag med pa'i rtsa ba dang / 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtsa ba dang /
257a6(mdo sde): ma rig pa dang srid pa'i sred pa'i rtsa ba dang / nga dang nga'i zhes bya ba'i rtsa ba las dag go/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dag pa zhes bgyi bas ci zhig bstan pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ ma bzung ma btang ba ste/ de bas na dag pa zhes bya'o/ /ma
257a7(mdo sde): skyes/ ma 'gags ma brtags/ rnam par ma brtags/ ma phyung ma bcug /ma byas rnam par ma byas/ mun pa ma yin/ snang ba ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ bcings pa ma yin/ thar ba ma yin/ 'khor ba
257b1(mdo sde): ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin te/ de bas na dag pa zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te 'khor ba yang ma lags/ mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma lags na de la dag pa de gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gang mya ngan
257b2(mdo sde): las 'das par yang rlom sems med la 'khor ba la mngon par zhen pa'ang med pa de nyid 'dir dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' dag pa zhes bya yang nam mkha' ni dag pa yang ma yin kun nas nyon mongs pa'ang ma yin te 'on kyang nam
257b3(mdo sde): mkha' ni dag pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa dag pa zhes bya yang mya ngan las 'das pa ni dag pa'ang ma yin kun nas nyon mongs pa'ang ma yin te 'on kyang mya ngan las 'das pa dag pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor 'di ci snyam du sems/
257b4(mdo sde): khyod ci dag pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das nam kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa de'i tshe bdag dag pa'o/ /bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i rnam par dag pa gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
257b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa ste/ bdag gis de yongs su rtogs pas de'i slad du yongs su dag go/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings yongs su shes par nus sam/ rab 'byor
257b6(mdo sde): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos kyi dbyings ma gtogs par chos gzhan 'ga' zhig mchis na ni des chos kyi dbyings yongs su 'tshal bar 'gyur gyi/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyis ni chos kyi dbyings yongs su mi 'tshal to/ /bcom ldan
257b7(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te chos kyi dbyings ma gtogs par gang chos kyi dbyings yongs su shes pa'i chos de yang med na chos kyi dbyings de khyod kyis ji ltar yongs su shes/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab
258a1(mdo sde): 'byor cang mi smra bar gyur to/ / //bam po gnyis pa/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor cang mi smra bar gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor khyod ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis
258a2(mdo sde): rmas pa'i lan glan pa las 'dug par gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang gi tshe sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma zhugs pa de'i tshe kho bo 'dug go/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos rnams kyi spobs pa ni thogs pa
258a3(mdo sde): dang bcas pa/ bar chad dang bcas pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni thogs pa med pa/ bar chad med pa'o/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ ci btsun pa rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings la thogs pa'am/ bar chad pa gang yang dmigs
258a4(mdo sde): sam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/ chos kyi dbyings la ni thogs pa'am/ bar chad pa mi dmigs so/ /smras pa/ 'o na ci'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'chad pa las bar chad du gyur/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang gis chos kyi dbyings
258a5(mdo sde): la yongs su chad pa'i tshul gyis yongs su shes pa de dag ni 'chad pa bar chad pa yin gyis gang yang chos kyi dbyings la tshad med pa'i tshul gyis yongs su shes pa de dag ni chad par mi 'chad do/ /smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor ci chos kyi dbyings la yongs su chad
258a6(mdo sde): pa gang yang yod dam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/ chos kyi dbyings ni kun gyi sgo ste/ chos kyi dbyings la yongs su chad pa gang yang med do/ /smras pa/ 'o na ci'i phyir btsun pa rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings la yongs su chad par ston/ smras pa/ 'jam
258a7(mdo sde): dpal nyan thos kyi yul tshad mar byas te chos kyi dbyings yongs su chad par ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi yul tshad mar byas te/ de ni chos kyi dbyings tshad med par ston to/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ ci btsun pa rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings yul las byung ngam/
258b1(mdo sde): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings yul las byung ba ma yin te/ 'jam dpal de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings ni yul med pa/ yul dang bral ba'o/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 'o na ci'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yul
258b2(mdo sde): tha dad par ston/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal nyan thos rnams kyi spobs pa ni thogs pa dang bcas pa/ bar chad dang bcas pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni thogs pa med pa/ bar chad med pa'o zhes dang po nyid du kho bos ma
258b3(mdo sde): smras sam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor khyod kyis so so yang dag par rig pa ma thob bam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal kho bos so so yang dag par rig pa thob bo/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 'o na ci'i phyir tshe dang
258b4(mdo sde): ldan pa rab 'byor 'chad pa bar chad/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal nyan thos rnams kyi so so yang dag par rig pa ni sems can gyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang bral ba ste/ de bas na 'chad pa bar chad do/ /byang chub sems
258b5(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi so so yang dag par rig pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pas bskyed pa ste/ de bas na 'chad pa bar mi 'chad do/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ ci ye shes kyi dbyings gang gis tshe dang ldan pa
258b6(mdo sde): rab 'byor gyi so so yang dag par rig pa'i ye shes bskyed pa'i ye shes kyi dbyings de bar chad pa'i mtshan nyid yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/ ye shes kyi dbyings ni thogs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid bar chad pa med pa'i rang bzhin
258b7(mdo sde): can no/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te ye shes kyi dbyings thogs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid bar chad pa med pa'i rang bzhin can yin na/ 'o na ci'i phyir 'chad pa bar chad/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal tshe dang ldan
259a1(mdo sde): pa shA ri'i bu 'di nyan thos rnams kyi nang na shes rab che ba'i mchog tu bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs kyis/ 'di la dris shig dang / 'di nyid khyod la 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nyid
259a2(mdo sde): kyis shod cig / kho bo ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas chos bstan pa nyan par 'dod kyi/ 'chad par ni mi 'dod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di sngon sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po'i spyan snga na chos 'chad cing / nyan
259a3(mdo sde): thos chen po dag kyang cang mi smra bar gzhog pa kho bos mthong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag mang po 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams dang ba can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
259a4(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od kyi tog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /de na nyan thos chen po shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba nyan thos rnams kyi nang na shes rab che ba'i mchog tu bcom ldan 'das des gsungs
259a5(mdo sde): so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od kyi tog de nam nang du yang dag 'jog par gyur pa de'i tshe nyan thos chen po shes rab sgron ma de tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad du mngon par song ste/ thams cad dang
259a6(mdo sde): ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dun par byas nas chos ston to/ /kho bo dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yang 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin te/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag mang po dang / lha'i bu brgya phrag stong
259a7(mdo sde): yang chos nyan par 'dod pa'i phyir 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i phyir 'brang bar gyur to/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris su 'dug ste/ mgul bsal ba'i sgra gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
259b1(mdo sde): thams cad sgras go bar 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi gnas thams cad spa gong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mgul bsal ba'i sgra phyung ngo / /de nas nyan thos chen po des mgul bsal ba'i sgra de thos pa dang / mgul bsal ba'i sgra de'i shugs ma bzod pas rnam par 'thor rlung
259b2(mdo sde): gis bus pa'i bya bzhin du sa la lhung ste/ de dngangs te spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas/ ngo mtshar du bzung ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od kyi tog de ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom
259b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das mgul bsal ba'i sgra gang thos pas bdag mgul bsal ba'i sgra'i shugs de ma bzod pas rnam par 'thor rlung gis bus pa'i bya bzhin
259b4(mdo sde): du dog sa la lhung bar gyur pa'i mgul bsal ba'i sgra zab mo 'di lta bu 'di sus bgyis/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ dge slong 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba phyir mi ldog pa skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de nga la blta
259b5(mdo sde): ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / yongs su zhu ba dang / yongs su legs par zhu bar bya ba'i phyir chags pa med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis rnam par rtse zhing 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de 'od
259b6(mdo sde): gsal gyi lha'i ris su 'dug nas mgul bsal ba'i sgra gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sgras go bar 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi gnas thams cad spa gong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mgul bsal ba'i sgra phyung ngo / /des
259b7(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa de lta bu dag mthong na legs par 'gyur gyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bdag cag gis kyang blta bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
260a1(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas 'od kyi tog gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir mtshan ma mdzad do/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang lha'i bu de dag dang lhan cig tu bar snang de las babs nas/
260a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od kyi tog ga la ba der dong ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor nas 'khor dang
260a3(mdo sde): bcas te ji ltar rang gi smon lam dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus sprul pa'i stan la phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od kyi tog gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
260a4(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal khyod don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong nas 'jig rten gyi khams dang ba can 'dir 'ongs/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /
260a5(mdo sde): yongs su zhu ba dang / yongs su legs par zhu ba'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyur/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag byas par 'gyur/ ji ltar
260a6(mdo sde): na bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur/ ji ltar na yongs su zhus par 'gyur/ ji ltar na yongs su legs par zhus par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das nam chos mthong ba shin tu rnam par dag pa de lta bu ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba
260a7(mdo sde): shin tu rnam par dag pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das nam lus dang sems kyis 'dud par mi bgyid/ rab tu 'dud par mi bgyid cing bgyid pa ma mchis/ zhum pa ma mchis par gnas pa/ mi g.yo ba thob pa/ sems dben pa'i ngang tshul du spyod pa/ dran
260b1(mdo sde): pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du bgyid pa de lta bus ni de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das nam bdag tu sgro 'dogs par mi bgyid/ gzhan du sgro 'dogs par mi bgyid/ mnyam pa nyid la mnyam par mi bgyid/ mi mnyam
260b2(mdo sde): pa nyid la mi mnyam par mi bgyid cing / bgyid pa ma mchis/ rnam par bgyid pa ma mchis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang yang spyod pa gcig tu gyur pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / chos kyi sku'i rjes su 'jug pa/ gang gi lus kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi
260b3(mdo sde): rjes su zhugs par mthong ba/ mthong ba la mthong bar mi mthong ba/ log par mi mthong ba/ gang la yang ring por mi 'gyur ba/ nye bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das nam tshul
260b4(mdo sde): bzhin ma lags par ni ma lags kyi/ nam tshul bzhin du zhu ba/ tshul bzhin ma lags pa/ ci'ang mi mthong ba/ bdag gi tshul bzhin gyis chos thams cad kyi tshul bzhin gyi rjes su mchi ba g.yengs pa'i sems kyis ma lags kyi/ mnyam par bzhag
260b5(mdo sde): pas zhu ba/ gang zhu ba dang / gang gi slad du zhu ba dang / gang la zhu ba de dus gsum yongs su tshol zhing / 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas zhu ba de lta bu ni de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhus par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das nam zhu ba mchis pa la rtogs
260b6(mdo sde): par mi bgyid pa/ ji skad gsungs pa'i rjes su 'thun par bgyid pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par bgyid pa/ 'khor thams cad mgu bar bgyid pa/ yongs su zhu ba la mi chags pa/ yongs su zhu ba des kyang sems can tshad ma mchis pa rnams byang chub
260b7(mdo sde): tu go cha skon zhing / go cha de yang nam byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du mi 'dor ba de lta bu ni de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su legs par zhu ba bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
261a1(mdo sde): rgyas 'od kyi tog des 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la de ltar blta bar bya'o/ /de ltar phyag bya'o/ /de ltar bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /de ltar yongs su zhu bar bya'o/ /
261a2(mdo sde): de ltar yongs su legs par zhu bar bya'o zhes smras pa de ni khyod kyis legs par bshad de legs so legs so/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas nyan thos chen po shes rab sgron ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa la
261a3(mdo sde): ji ltar mthong / ji ltar phyag 'tshal/ ji ltar bsnyen bkur byed/ ji ltar yongs su zhu/ ji ltar yongs su legs par zhu/ des smras pa/ 'jam dpal bstan pa 'di lta bu ni kho bo cag lta bu nyan thos gzhan gyi sgra'i rjes su mos pa rnams kyi yul ma yin no/ /
261a4(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'o na gang mngon par rtogs pas tshe dang ldan pa shes rab sgron ma'i sems rnam par grol/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal bden pa mngon par rtogs pas sems rnam par grol lo/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa bden pa zhes bya bas ci bstan par 'gyur/ des
261a5(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'jam dpal gnyen po med pas rab tu phye ba ni bden pa'o/ /smras pa/ 'o na ji ltar bden pa mngon par rtogs pas tshe dang ldan pa'i sems rnam par grol/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal kun rdzob nye bar bzung ste de skad ces ston gyi don dam par ni ma yin
261a6(mdo sde): no/ /smras pa/ ci kun rdzob don dam par 'du'am/ smras pa/ gal te mi 'du na don dam pa med par 'gyur ro/ /smras pa/ 'o na ji ltar kun rdzob nye bar bzung ste ston gyi/ don dam par ni ma yin/ gal te kun rdzob don dam par 'du na ni 'di lta ste/ don dam
261a7(mdo sde): pa'i bden par bden pa gcig pur mi 'gyur ram/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal bshad pa 'di thos na las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams skrag par 'gyur ro/ /smras pa/ btsun pa nyid kyang skrag na las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams lta ci smos/
261b1(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'jam dpal kho bo skrag par byed mi nus so/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa ci skrag pa med pa dang / skyo ba med pas nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal nyan thos rnams ni skrag pa med pa
261b2(mdo sde): dang / skyo ba med par rnam par mi grol lo/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa de bas na sngon skrag pa de nyid la bsams nas btsun pa nyid kyang skrag na las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams lta ci smos zhes de skad smras so/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub
261b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' ji ltar rnam par grol/ smras pa/ btsun pa byang chub sems dpa' ni skrag pa med pa dang / skyo ba med pas rnam par grol lo/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji la bsams te de skad smra/ smras pa/ bdud kyi sde bye ba phrag brgyas mi skrag cing
261b4(mdo sde): sems can rnams la chos bshad pas mi skyo la/ bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med pa bsags pas mi skrag cing ye shes kyi tshogs tshad med pa bsags pas mi skyo'o/ /de nas 'khor der lha'i bu gang dag 'dus par gyur pa de dag gis me tog sna tshogs kyis
261b5(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la gtor to/ /gang na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snang ba der ni de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du mthong ba yin no/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang du gnas pa'i sa phyogs de'ang mchod rten du 'gyur ro/ /gang
261b6(mdo sde): gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i chos bstan pa kun du shes sam/ kun du shes par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag gis kyang bsod nams thams cad yongs su bzung ba yin no zhes de skad kyi tshig smras so/ /de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas
261b7(mdo sde): nyan thos chen po shes rab sgron ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa nyan thos rnams kyi nang na shes rab che ba'i mchog tu bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs na/ ci shes rab de 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid dam 'on te 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid/ gal te de 'dus
262a1(mdo sde): byas kyi mtshan nyid yin na ni skye zhing 'jig pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /ji ste 'dus ma byas pa'i mtshan nyid yin na ni mtshan nyid gsum las ldog par 'gyur ro/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'phags pa rnams ni 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye
262a2(mdo sde): bar ston to/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa 'dus ma byas pa gdags par nus sam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/ 'dus ma byas la gdags pa gang yang med do/ /smras pa/ 'o na ji ltar 'phags pa rnams 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu
262a3(mdo sde): phye ba ston/ de skad ces smras pa dang / nyan thos chen po shes rab sgron ma de cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od kyi tog des 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
262a4(mdo sde): to/ /'jam dpal chos gang thos pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi sgo 'ga' zhig rtsoms te/ 'khor 'dir khyod kyis ston cig /'jam dpal gyis
262a5(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi sgo rnams kyi bstan pa thams cad kyang dben pa'i sgo ste/ dben pa'i sgo de dag dben pa nyid du ston to/ /yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros zhes bya ba 'khor der 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des 'jam
262a6(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal gang de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug bstan pa de dag ci dben pa'i sgo ste/ dben pa'i sgo nyid du ston pa yin nam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du
262a7(mdo sde): sems/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gang nas byung / smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug ni rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa las byung ngo / /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa de yang
262b1(mdo sde): gang nas byung / smras pa/ 'jam dpal rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa ni phyin ci log las byung ngo / /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu phyin ci log kyang gang nas byung / smras pa/ 'jam dpal phyin ci log ni ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa las byung ngo / /
262b2(mdo sde): smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa yang gang nas byung / smras pa/ 'jam dpal ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba las byung ngo / /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'jig tshogs la lta ba yang gang nas byung /
262b3(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'jig tshogs la lta ba ni bdag las byung ngo / /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu bdag kyang gang nas byung / smras pa/ 'jam dpal bdag ni gang nas kyang ma byung ste/ 'byung ba med pa ni bdag 'byung ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar bdag
262b4(mdo sde): ni phyogs bcur yongs su btsal kyang mi dmigs so/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu chos gang dag phyogs bcur yongs su btsal kyang mi dmigs pa de'i sgo ci zhig yod/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal dben pa nyid de'i sgo'o/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu dben pa'i sgo ci yin/
262b5(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'jam dpal sgo med pa nyid dben pa'i sgo'o/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho bos de las bsams te/ chos thams cad kyi sgo rnams kyi bstan pa thams cad kyang dben pa'i sgo ste/ de dag dben pa'i sgo nyid du ston to zhes de skad smras so/ /bstan pa 'di bshad
262b6(mdo sde): pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' brgyad brgyas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas der rgya cher chos bstan pa byas nas stan las langs te song ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang nyan thos sam/ rang
262b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas gang gis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de'i spobs pa'i rgyun gcod nus pa med na/ skabs ma phye bar bdag cag lta bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang lhan cig tu smra bar ga la nus/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di
263a1(mdo sde): skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing du spyad pa spyod pa na rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang / cho 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa ji snyed cig mthong / shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
263a2(mdo sde): kho bos mngon par shes te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang lhan cig sangs rgyas kyi zhing du spyad pa spyod pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang tshig pa de dag ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa song ba dang chus yongs su gang zhing / pad ma mang pos yog par gnas par gyur
263a3(mdo sde): to/ /gang dag chus yongs su gang ba de dag ni mes yongs su gang bar gnas par gyur te/ me de yang reg na 'di lta ste dper na tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'am/ ka tsa lin di'i gos lta bur gyur to/ /gang dag stong pa nam mkhar gyur pa de dag ni tshangs pa'i
263a4(mdo sde): gzhal med khang gis brgyan cing bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpas yongs su gang bar gnas par gyur to/ /gang dag 'chags pa de dag ni 'jig par snang ngo / /gang dag ngan song gis yongs su gang ba de dag ni ngan song thams cad dang
263a5(mdo sde): bral bar snang ste/ sems can de dag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag gi rnam pas bskyed pa'i byams pa thob par gyur to/ /byang chub kyi yan lag gi rnam pas bskyed pa'i byams pa gang zhe na/ gang la snyoms par zhugs na bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
263a6(mdo sde): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ sems can gang dag nyon mongs pa 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis gzir ba de dag gi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug shin tu spang bar bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to snyam sems pa ste/
263a7(mdo sde): gang de ltar byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa de ni byang chub kyi yan lag gi rnam pas bskyed pa'i byams pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de'i tshe de'i dus na kho bo'i sems la sems kyi rnam par rtog pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul
263b1(mdo sde): gang yin pa dang / bdag gi gang yin pa de gnyis ni mnyam mo snyam du gyur pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sems kyis kho bo'i sems kyi rnam par rtog pa de shes nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir me 'bar ba na 'jig rten gyi
263b2(mdo sde): bar du 'dug ste kho bo la 'di skad ces zer ro/ /ci tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus 'jig rten gyi khams 'di las brgal bar bya'am/ 'on te kho bo'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus brgal bar bya/ kho bos de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kho bo'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu'i
263b3(mdo sde): mgyogs pas 'jig rten gyi khams 'di las brgal bar bya'o zhes/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kho bo'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu'i mgyogs pa'i cho 'phrul thams cad bstan te/ 'dom gang tsam khor yug tu me de zhi bar byas nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang lhan cig tu nyin
263b4(mdo sde): zhag bdun gyis 'jig rten gyi khams de brgal to/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na de bas kyang shin tu rgya che zhing yangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su me 'bar ba na 'jig rten gyi bar du 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dug ste/ kho bo la 'di skad ces zer ro/ /btsun pa
263b5(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu su'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus 'jig rten gyi khams 'di las brgal bar bya/ kho bos de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal khyod kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus 'jig rten gyi khams 'di las brgal bar bya'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mngon
263b6(mdo sde): par 'du byed pa'i mngon sum gyi rdzu 'phrul sems bskyed pa gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams de pad ma'i dra bas g.yogs te rgal bar gyur to/ /brgal nas kho bo la 'di skad ces zer ro/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu bdag cag gnyis las su'i mthu dang ldan pa'i rdzu
263b7(mdo sde): 'phrul gyi shugs mgyogs/ kho bos de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/ bya lang gu li dang / bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding gnyis gang gi mthu shin tu mgyogs/ smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding gi
264a1(mdo sde): mthu'i mgyogs pa ni tshad med pa ste dpe blang du sla ba ma yin no/ /de la kho bos 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal bya lang gu li'i mgyogs pa lta bur ni kho bo'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mgyogs pa blta bar bya'o/ /ji ltar bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding gi
264a2(mdo sde): mthu'i mgyogs pa de bas kyang brgya stong gis shin tu lhag par khyod kyi rdzu 'phrul mgyogs par blta'o/ /des smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod kyi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul gang yin pa dang / bdag gi gang yin pa de
264a3(mdo sde): gnyis ni mnyam mo snyam du ma gyur tam/ kho bos de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ kho bo de snyam du gyur to/ /des smras pa/ ci'i phyir de snyam du gyur/ kho bos de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /nyan thos rnams ni bag chags kyi
264a4(mdo sde): mtshams sbyor ba ma bcad pa'i phyir mi mnyam du zin kyang mnyam du bdag nyid kyis shes so/ /des smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu legs so/ /legs so/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na rgya mtsho chen
264a5(mdo sde): po'i 'gram na drang srong chos 'dod ces bya ba dang / kun byin zhes bya ba gnyis shig 'khod de/ de la chos 'dod ni lnga mngon par shes shing mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse bar gyur to/ /kun byin ni rig pa dang sngags kyi mthus steng gi bar snang la 'gro bar gyur to/ /
264a6(mdo sde): de nas de gnyis dus dus su spyod pa'i phyir rgya mtsho'i tshu rol nas pha rol du 'dong ngo / /dong nas slar log cing rang rang gi gnas su 'khod do/ /de nas drang srong kun byin de kho bo'i rdzu 'phrul gang yin pa dang / chos 'dod kyi gang yin pa de gnyis ni mnyam mo snyam du gyur to/ /de
264a7(mdo sde): nas dus gzhan zhig na rgya mtsho'i tshu rol nas pha rol du dong ste/ srin mo'i gling du phyin pa dang / der srin mo de dag gis yid du 'ong ba'i rol mo'i sgra byas par gyur pa yang drang srong kun byin gyis thos/ srin mo de dag kyang mthong nas/ nam mkha'i dkyil nas sa'i steng du lhung
264b1(mdo sde): ngo / /de'i rig pa dang sngags kyang ma rung bar gyur to/ /de nas drang srong chos 'dod snying rje ba'i sems skyes nas lag pa g.yas pas bzung ste/ slar rang gi gnas su khrid nas bzhag go/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong chos 'dod ces bya ba de gzhan
264b2(mdo sde): zhig yin pa snyam du khyod the tshom mam/ yid gnyis su gyur na de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kho bo nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong chos 'dod ces bya bar gyur to/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong kun byin zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod the
264b3(mdo sde): tsom mam/ yid gnyis su gyur na de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyod nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong kun byin zhes bya bar gyur te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de'i tshe yang mi mnyam par bdag dang mnyam pa nyid du bzhag go/ /de ltar de phyogs gcig pa'i
264b4(mdo sde): ye shes dang ldan pa'i phyir da ltar yang mi mnyam bzhin du bdag dang mnyam par bzhag go/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la yang 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kho bos mngon par shes te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur
264b5(mdo sde): gyur pa dang lhan cig tu lho phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing du spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan thams cad kyis bklubs pa zhes bya ba na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin
264b6(mdo sde): chen srog shing zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bcom ldan 'das de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir phyin te/ de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa kho bo la 'di skad ces zer ro/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod kyis gang bdag cag
264b7(mdo sde): gis brgal ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag mthong ngam/ kho bos de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal mthong ngo / /des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag ci 'dra bar mthong / de la kho bos 'di skad ces smras so/ /kha cig
265a1(mdo sde): ni mes yongs su gang ba'o/ /kha cig ni chus yongs su gang ba'o/ /kha cig ni nam mkhar gyur pa'o/ /kha cig ni 'byor cing rgyas pa'o/ /kha cig ni 'jig pa'o/ /kha cig ni 'chags pa'o/ /kha cig ni ngan song gis yongs su gang ba'o/ /
265a2(mdo sde): kha cig ni ngan song dang bral ba'o/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag ji ltar blta bar bya/ de la kho bos 'di skad ces smras so/ /gang dag mes yongs su gang ba de dag ni mes yongs su gang ba nyid du blta bar bya'o/ /gang dag chus
265a3(mdo sde): yongs su gang ba de dag ni chus yongs su gang ba nyid du blta bar bya'o/ /gang dag nam mkhar gyur pa de dag ni nam mkhar gyur pa nyid du blta bar bya'o/ /gang dag 'byor cing rgyas pa de dag ni 'byor cing rgyas pa nyid du blta bar bya'o/ /gang dag 'jig pa de dag ni 'jig
265a4(mdo sde): pa nyid du blta bar bya'o/ /gang dag 'chags pa de dag ni 'chags pa nyid du blta bar bya'o/ /gang dag ngan song gis yongs su gang ba de dag ni ngan song gis yongs su gang ba nyid du blta bar bya'o/ /gang dag ngan song dang bral ba de dag ni ngan song dang bral ba nyid du
265a5(mdo sde): blta bar bya'o/ /des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu'i ye shes kyi yul ji lta ba bshad pa'ang de bzhin no/ /de la kho bos 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag ji ltar mthong / des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
265a6(mdo sde): ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ni nam mkha'i zhing du mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mes yongs su gang ba'am/ chus yongs su gang ba'am/ 'byor pa rgyas pa 'am/ 'jig pa'am/ 'chags pa'am/ ngan song gis yongs su gang
265a7(mdo sde): ba'am/ ngan song dang bral ba de dag ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'o/ /rkyen de dag ni glo bur du byung ba ste/ skye zhing 'jig pa dang ldan pa'o/ /nam mkha' ni rkyen gyis byung ba ma yin te/ rang bzhin du gnas pa nyid do/ /de bzhin du glo bur gyi nye bar nyon mongs pas
265b1(mdo sde): sems nyon mongs par gyur pa zhes bya ste/ sems kyi rang bzhin ni nam yang nyon mongs par gyur pa med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na 'das pa'i dus na gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal pas bsregs pa byung yang nam mkha' la sngon
265b2(mdo sde): nam yang tshig pa med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du sems can re res kyang gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byas kyang sems kyi rang bzhin ni nam yang de bzhin du nyon mongs par gyur pa med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
265b3(mdo sde): bu rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang la la rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings de lta bu la 'jug pa de dag ni kun nas ldang ba'am/ sgrib pa'am/ mngon par 'du byed pas kun nas ldang bar 'gyur ba kyang med de/ 'di ni kun nas ldang ba med
265b4(mdo sde): pa'i chos kyi sgo'o/ /chos kyi sgo de la brten nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin yongs su dag par zhugs nas/ nyes pa las 'byung ba la mkhas par shes shing / de'i sems nams kyang sgrib pa'i chos rnams kyis sgrib
