265b5(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa dang / chos bstan pa rnam par 'phrul pa las gang kho bos phyogs tsam zhig mngon sum du gyur pa ni de lta bu de dag yin no/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
265b6(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bos kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul kha cig mngon sum du gyur to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bos mngon par shes te/ dus gcig cig na bcom ldan
265b7(mdo sde): 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba 'di nyid na dge slong brgyad brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe na mnyan yod du dus ma yin pa'i
266a1(mdo sde): sprin chen po zhig byung ste/ de la nyin zhag bdun du rgyun ma chad par dus ma yin pa'i char chen po bab bo/ /de na dge slong gang dag rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu che ba bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa
266a2(mdo sde): thob pa de dag ni bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pas dus 'da' bar byas kyi/ gang dag ma thob pa de dag ni nyin zhag bdun du zas chad par gyur to/ /de nas dge slong de dag nyam chung ba dang ldan te/ bcom
266a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'dong yang ma nus nas de la kho bo 'di snyam du gyur te/ e ma'o dge slong 'di dag ni rjud par gyur na bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song ste/ tshul de dag bcom ldan 'das la gsol lo snyam du gyur nas/ kho bo bcom ldan 'das ga la
266a4(mdo sde): ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das e ma'o dge slong 'di dag nyin zhag bdun du 'tshal ma chad de bkres pas nyam chung ba dang ldan nas
266a5(mdo sde): rjud de/ khri dang khri'u las ldang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i slad du mchi ba'i rngo yang mi thogs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kho bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo song ste 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la tshul de dag smros shig dang /
266a6(mdo sde): des dge slong gi dge 'dun rtas par byed par 'gyur ro/ /kho bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas khang ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rang gi gnas khang na brgya byin dang / tshangs
266a7(mdo sde): pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la chos ston pa mthong ngo / /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa des kyang kho bo gnas khang gi nang du 'ongs pa mthong ste/ mthong nas 'di skad ces zer ro/ /btsun pa kun dga' bo khyod ci'i phyir rlung dang char gyi nang na 'dir 'ongs/ kho
266b1(mdo sde): bos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la tshul de dag smras so/ /de kho bo la kun dga' bo song ste stan thing la/ gdugs tshod bab na gaN+DI rdungs shig de skad ces zer nas/ kho bo 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas khang nas byung ste/ dge 'dun gyi kun dga'
266b2(mdo sde): bar song nas stan bting ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ci gnas khang nas byung ngam zhes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas khang du lta zhing phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya
266b3(mdo sde): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sprul pa gzhan zhig sprul te/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag la chos ston to/ /de gnas khang nas byung ste mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs na kho bos ni ma mthong
266b4(mdo sde): ngo / /de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du gyur te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dis seng ge'i sgra bsgrags nas mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs na bdag gis 'di mig gis mi rtsol bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ des de nyid kyi tshe mnyan
266b5(mdo sde): yod kyi grong khyer chen po'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / grong 'dab dang / yul mi gang gis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mi mthong ba dang / gang yang bsur mi 'ong ba dang / su yang bsod snyoms mi 'bul ba de lta de ltar byin gyis brlabs so/ /
266b6(mdo sde): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang dang gang du song ba de dag thams cad na sgo dag kyang bcad par snang ste/ gang yang mi bsu bar gyur to/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bsams na/ e ma'o bram ze dang / khyim bdag 'di dag ni ci nas kyang bdag
266b7(mdo sde): mi mthong ba dang / gtam mi bya bar bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs so snyam du bsams nas/ des de'i tshe gang bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs gang dag gis bdag gi spu'i khung bu gcig lus la skyes pa'i bsod nams
267a1(mdo sde): kyi phung po de yang gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdud sdig can rnams la med pa'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des bdud kyi byin gyi rlabs 'di dag med par gyur cig /bdud sdig can nyid kyang khyim bdag gi tshul du srang dang /
267a2(mdo sde): sum mdo dang / bzhi mdo dag na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bsod snyoms phul cig /phul cig /'di la phul na 'bras bu che bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad la lo
267a3(mdo sde): 'bum du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas/ gus par byas/ phu dud du byas pa bas/ gang gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bsod snyoms sen mo'i rtse mo gang tsam phul na de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ches mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro zhes sgrogs par
267a4(mdo sde): gyur cig ces bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs byas so/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byin gyi rlabs de byas ma thag tu de nas de nyid kyi tshe sgo thams cad kyang bye bar gyur to/ /skye bo mang po thams cad kyang bsu zhing 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bde bar 'ongs so zhes
267a5(mdo sde): kyang rjod do/ /bdud sdig can nyid kyang khyim bdag gi tshul du srang dang / sum mdo dang / bzhi mdo dag na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bsod snyoms phul cig /phul cig /'di la phul na 'bras bu che bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen
267a6(mdo sde): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad la lo 'bum du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas/ gus par byas/ phu dud du byas pa bas/ gang gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bsod snyoms sen mo gang tsam phul na de'i bsod
267a7(mdo sde): nams kyi phung po ches mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro zhes sgrogs par gyur to/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ci nas kyang lhung bzed der bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba phal cher bcug pa de dag thams cad ji ltar snod so sor bcug pa bzhin du ma
267b1(mdo sde): 'dres par 'dug pa dang / gang dge slong brgyad brgya po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong po de dag la kha zas ji tsam gyis chog pa lhung bzed des blangs par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar rang gi lhung bzed de byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon
267b2(mdo sde): nur gyur pas mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir spyad nas mnyan yod kyi grong khyer gyi phyi rol du byung ste/ lam las byol nas lhung bzed de sa'i steng du bzhag ste bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sdig can lhung bzed 'di khyer la mdun du
267b3(mdo sde): song shig / de nas bdud sdig can gyis lhung bzed de sa de las gdeg par byas na gdegs ma nus nas/ des 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal lhung bzed 'di sa'i steng nas gdeg par ma nus so/ /smras pa/ sdig
267b4(mdo sde): can khyod kyang rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu chen po dang ldan pa yin na rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis lhung bzed 'di sa'i steng nas gdeg par gyis shig / de nas bdud sdig can gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi cho 'phrul thams cad bstan kyang lhung bzed de sa de las tha na skra'i rtse mo'i cha
267b5(mdo sde): tsam yang gdeg par ma nus nas/ de ngo mtshar du gyur te 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal kho bo ni 'dod na ri gshol mda' 'dzin kyang lag mthil du blangs te nam mkha' la 'dor na kho bos lhung bzed chung ngu 'di lta bu 'dis 'di'i
267b6(mdo sde): steng nas gdeg par ma nus na de ci'i phyir de ltar gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sems can chen po rnams dang / gang zag chen po rnams kyi stobs drangs pa lhung bzed 'dir bcug ste/ de'i phyir khyod kyis gdeg par ma nus so/ /de nas 'jam dpal
267b7(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa nyid kyis lhung bzed de sa las blangs nas bdud sdig can la byin te 'di skad ces smras so/ /sdig can lhung bzed 'di khyer la mdun du song shig /de nas bdud sdig can de slob ma bzhin du lhung bzed khyer te 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i
268a1(mdo sde): mdun du song ngo / /de nas lha'i bu dbang sgyur lha'i bu khri nyis stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ga la ba der dong nas lhags pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag
268a2(mdo sde): 'tshal nas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sdig can bran bzhin du 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i lhung bzed khyer te mdun du 'gro ba 'di ci zhig /bdud kyis smras pa/ lha'i bu mthu dang ldan pa rnams dang 'gran pa ci'ang med do/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ sdig
268a3(mdo sde): can khyod kyang rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu chen po dang ldan pa'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bdud sdig can gyis lha'i bu dbang sgyur la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha'i bu 'di lta ste/ bdud kyi stobs ni gti mug gi stobs so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i
268a4(mdo sde): stobs ni shes rab kyi stobs so/ /bdud kyi stobs ni nga rgyal gyi stobs so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i stobs ni ye shes kyi stobs so/ /bdud kyi stobs ni lta ba 'byung ba'i stobs so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i stobs ni stong pa nyid kyi stobs so/ /bdud kyi stobs
268a5(mdo sde): ni phyin ci log gi stobs so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i stobs ni bden pa'i stobs so/ /bdud kyi stobs ni nga dang nga'i zhes bya ba'i stobs so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i stobs ni byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'i stobs so/ /bdud kyi stobs ni 'dod chags dang
268a6(mdo sde): zhe sdang dang gti mug gi stobs so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i stobs ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi stobs so/ /bdud kyi stobs ni skye ba dang 'chi ba dang / 'byung ba'i stobs so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i stobs ni skye ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa'i chos la
268a7(mdo sde): bzod pa rab tu thob pa'i stobs so/ /bdud sdig can gyis bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe lha'i bu'i 'khor de las lha'i bu lnga brgya bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyis brgyas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par
268b1(mdo sde): gyur to/ / //bam po gsum pa/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bdud sdig can dang lhan cig tu lhung bzed de 'khor gyi khyams su bzhag ste song yang kho bos ma mthong ma thos nas/ gdugs tshod la bab par gyur kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur
268b2(mdo sde): gyur pa gnas khang de nas byung ba'am zhugs par yang ma mthong nas/ de la kho bo 'di snyam du gyur te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong gi dge 'dun ma bslus sam/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song ste tshul de dag gsol lo snyam du gyur nas/ kho bo
268b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod la bab na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni gnas khang de nas ma
268b4(mdo sde): byung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis kho bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo khyod kyis 'khor gyi khyams zlum po der ci yang ma mthong ngam/ bcom ldan 'das la kho bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de na lhung bzed zas kyis gang ba
268b5(mdo sde): gcig cig gda'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kho bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo song la gaN+DI rdungs te dge slong gi dge 'dun sdus shig /bcom ldan 'das la kho bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun
268b6(mdo sde): 'di dag mang po zhig mchis na lhung bzed gcig gang ba'i zas kyis ji ltar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod snying las chung bar byos shig /kun dga' bo gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i
268b7(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyis lo 'bum du lhung bzed gcig po de las zos kyang lhung bzed de ni yongs su zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lhung bzed de ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur
269a1(mdo sde): gyur pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni zad mi shes pa'i bsod nams las byung ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar kho bos mnyan nas sems dga' bas gaN+DI brdungs te dge slong gi dge 'dun yang bsags so/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
269a2(mdo sde): pas gaN+DI'i sgra thos nas/ lha'i bu de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang 'grogs te/ rang gi gnas khang nas byung ste/ khyams zlum por song nas lhung bzed de las bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba dang / ji ltar snod so so na
269a3(mdo sde): bzhag bzhag pa lta bur phan tshun ma 'dres pa phal cher phyung ste dge slong mang po thams cad kyang brtas par byas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' mang po thams cad kyang tshim par byas kyang zas de ni yongs su zad pa'am gtugs par ma gyur to/ /de nas bdud sdig can gyis 'jam
269a4(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bar chad bya ba'i phyir sham thabs legs par ma bgos pa/ bla gos legs par ma gyon pa/ sha tshugs ma legs pa/ lhung bzed rdol cing chag pa/ gos ngan pa/ sna leb leb po dang / zhar ba dang / 'theng po dang / zha bo dang de las
269a5(mdo sde): kha cig ni ha cang yang ring ba/ kha cig ni ha cang thung ba/ kha cig ni ha cang gnag pa/ kha cig ni ha cang dkar ba/ kha cig ni ha cang skem pa/ kha cig ni ha cang sbom pa/ kha cig ni sgur po/ kha cig ni mi'u thung ste/ de dag gzhon pa'i mtha' nas phyag 'tshal zhing
269a6(mdo sde): rgan pa'i mthar 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs gang gis mthong ba'i sems skyo bar 'gyur ba'i dge slong bzhi khri sprul par gyur te/ de dag la yang lhung bzed de nas bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba phal cher phyung ste/ byin kyang lhung bzed de zad
269a7(mdo sde): par ma gyur to/ /de nas bdud sdig can gyis sprul pa'i dge slong de dag re res kyang 'bras can yul ma ga d+hA'i bre bo bcu bcu zos kyang tshim par ma gyur pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs so/ de na rung byed rnams thams cad yongs su skyo bar gyur kyang de dag tshim par byed ma nus so/
269b1(mdo sde): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gang dge slong de dag lhung bzed rnams kyang yongs su gang la lag pa na yang kham thogs shing khar bcug pa'i kham yang mid mi nus la/ de dag mgrin pa btsir ba bzhin du mig log ste sa la lhung ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs so/ /de
269b2(mdo sde): nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sdig can khyod kyi dge slong 'di dag ci'i phyir zas mi za/ bdud kyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal bdag gi dge slong 'di dag ni shi la thug par gyur na khyod kyis dug dang bsres pa'i zas
269b3(mdo sde): ma byin grang / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sdig can dug med pa rnams dug sbyin par ga la 'gyur/ gang dag dug srel ba de dag ni dug sbyin par byed kyi/ gang dag dug mi srel ba de dag ni dug sbyin par mi byed do/ /sdig can dug ces bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags
269b4(mdo sde): dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug ste/ de dag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la med do/ /dug ces bya ba ni ma rig pa dang / srid pa'i sred pa dang / nga dang nga'i zhes bya ba dang / rgyu dang / lta ba dang / ming dang gzugs dang / rjes su chags pa dang / khong
269b5(mdo sde): khro ba dang / bdag tu lta ba dang / gzhan du lta ba dang / sgrib pa dang / kun nas ldang ba dang / phung po la mngon par zhen pa dang / khams la rlom sems su byed pa dang / skye mched la yongs su 'dzin pa dang / yul la chags pa dang / khams gsum la zhen pa dang / bsdus
269b6(mdo sde): pa dang / g.yengs pa dang / gzhag pa dang / gdeg pa dang / shi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / lus la mngon par chags pa dang / srog la zhen pa dang / sdug pa yid la byed pa dang / phyin ci log tu gnas pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung
269b7(mdo sde): ba dang mi 'thun pa dang / chad par lta ba dang / ther zug tu lta ba dang / 'byung bar lta ba dang / 'jig par lta ba dang / g.yo ba dang / rlom sems dang / rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / sogs pa dang / mdud pa dang / kun gzhi dang / nges pa'i gzhi dang /
270a1(mdo sde): zhen pa dang / khyim gyi gnas la dga' ba dang / len pa dang / 'dor ba dang / stong pa nyid kyis skrag pa dang / mtshan ma med pa la g.yang sar 'du shes pa dang / smon pa med pa la gshed mar 'du shes pa dang / dmigs su med pa la dngos por 'du
270a2(mdo sde): shes pa dang / nges par 'byung ba'i khams la kha na ma tho bar lta ba dang / chu bo las rgal bar 'du shes pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la chos ma yin par 'du shes pa dang / yang dag pa'i lta ba la log par lta bar 'du shes pa dang / log par lta ba la yang
270a3(mdo sde): dag par lta bar 'du shes pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sdig pa'i grogs por 'du shes pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs po la dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes pa dang / sangs rgyas dang mi 'thun pa dang / chos spong ba dang / dge 'dun la ma gus pa dang / dgon
270a4(mdo sde): pa'i gnas la mngon par mi dga' ba dang / nga rgyal dang / lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal ma spangs pa dang / rab tu 'dzin pa dang / rtsod pa 'bar bar byed pa dang / bden pa la par 'du shes pa dang / pa la bden par 'du shes pa dang / 'dod
270a5(mdo sde): pa la yon tan du 'du shes pa dang / 'dus byas la bden par 'du shes pa dang / 'khor ba la phan yon rnam pa bcur 'du shes pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la 'jigs pa rnam pa bcur 'du shes pa'i chos de lta bu de dag ni dug yin te/ sdig can de dag ni legs par
270a6(mdo sde): gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni bdud rtsi bstan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni bde ba bstan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni spros pa med pa bstan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni ma smad pa bstan pa'o/ /
270a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni kun nas ldang ba med pa bstan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni 'byung ba bstan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni 'thab pa med pa bstan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni rtsod pa med pa bstan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni bdag
270b1(mdo sde): dang gzhan la mi gdung ba bstan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni byams pa dang ldan pa'i bstan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni gnas dang / skyabs dang / gling dang / dpung gnyen bstan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni dul ba dang / zhi ba dang / rab
270b2(mdo sde): tu zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba bstan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni dag pa dang / rnam par dag pa dang / yongs su dag pa dang / 'od gsal ba bstan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni yang dag pa'i nan tan bstan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni mi dkrug
270b3(mdo sde): pa bstan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni shin tu dul ba bstan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa bstan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa ni bstod cing bsngags pa bstan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / shin
270b4(mdo sde): tu nges par bstan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba dang / yongs su grol ba bstan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang 'thun pas tshar gcod pa bstan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni bdud
270b5(mdo sde): thams cad 'joms pa bstan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni skye ba dang / shi 'pho dang / 'byung ba las nges par 'byung ba bstan pa'o/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pas dran pa bstan pa'o/ /sdig pa thams cad mi byed pas yang dag par spong ba bstan pa'o/ /
270b6(mdo sde): lus dang sems yang bas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bstan pa'o/ /dad pa sngon du 'gro bas dbang po bstan pa'o/ /nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi rdzi bas stobs bstan pa'o/ /'thun par khong du chud pas byang chub kyi yan lag bstan pa'o/ /'byung bas lam
270b7(mdo sde): bstan pa'o/ /sems zhi bas zhi gnas bstan pa'o/ /rnam par grol ba bskyed pas lhag mthong bstan pa'o/ /slu bar mi byed pas bden pa bstan pa'o/ /don dang / chos dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / spobs pa dang mi 'gal bas so so yang dag par
271a1(mdo sde): rig pa bstan pa'o/ /'dus byas la smon pas mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba yongs su brjod pa bstan pa'o/ /ya mtshan can thams cad spong bas bdag med pa bstan pa'o/ /mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro bas zhi ba bstan pa'o/ /pha rol du
271a2(mdo sde): 'gro bas pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa'o/ /sems can yang dag par sdud pas thabs bstan pa'o/ /zhe 'gras pa'i sems med pas byams pa bstan pa'o/ /'tshe ba med pas snying rje bstan pa'o/ /mi dga' ba sel bas dga' ba bstan pa'o/ /bya ba byas
271a3(mdo sde): pas btang snyoms bstan pa'o/ /nga rgyal med pas ye shes bstan pa'o/ /byang chub kyi sems bskyed pas dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad pa bstan pa'o/ /yang 'byung ba med pas bde ba thams cad dang 'thun pa bstan pa'o/ /bstan pa'i bshad pa 'di
271a4(mdo sde): bstan pa'i tshe gang bdud sdig can dang lhan cig tu lha'i bu gang dag lhags pa de las lha'i bu lnga brgya bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa de lta bu dang 'thun par
271a5(mdo sde): gyur cig ces de skad kyi tshig smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'dzum pa mdzad de/ kho bos 'dzum pa'i phyir zhus so/ /zhus nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo bdud kyi sprul pa'i dge slong 'di dag khyod
271a6(mdo sde): kyis mthong ngam/ bcom ldan 'das la kho bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis kho bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe lnga brgya
271a7(mdo sde): tha ma la dam pa'i chos 'jig pa'i tshe nga'i bstan pa la dge slong dag phal cher 'di bzhin du sham thabs legs par ma gyon pa/ bla gos legs par ma bgos pa/ gos brtul te gyon pa/ lhung bzed chag pa/ shes bzhin med pa/ spyod lam mi sdug pa/ lag
271b1(mdo sde): na 'khar ba thogs pa/ sna leb leb po dang / zhar ba dang / 'theng po dang / zha bo dang / lus kyi sha tshugs ma legs pa dang / nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'di ltar de'i tshe dge slong dag phal cher
271b2(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur la ched che bar byed pa rnyed pa dang bkur sti la rten pa dang / bya ba sna tshogs kyi mi khom pas brel ba dang / 'dul ba bor ba dang / so sor thar pa 'dral ba dang / mtshams las 'da' ba dang / tshe 'di ched che bar byed pa dang / tshe rabs gzhan ched mi che bar
271b3(mdo sde): byed par 'gyur te/ de dag 'di lta ste/ chos kyi phyir ni ma yin gyi/ bsnyen bkur gyi phyir zhar ba dang / 'theng po dang / zha bo dang / lus kyi sha tshugs ma legs pa dang / nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams rab tu 'byung bar byed do/ /bsnyen
271b4(mdo sde): par rdzogs par byed do/ /kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na nga'i bstan pa 'di la bltar mi rung ba dang mnyan du mi rung bar 'gyur ro/ /lha rnams kyang yid mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /bdud rnams yi rangs shing dga' ba dang btang snyoms su 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan
271b5(mdo sde): 'das la kho bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du na bdud sdig can rnams yi rangs shing dga' ba dang btang snyoms su 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo 'di ltar skyes bu blun po de dag bdag nyid bdud kyi las
271b6(mdo sde): byed par 'gyur te/ de la bar chad bya ba'i phyir phyir zhing bdud sdig can brtson par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdud sdig can ni mi brtson pa rnams la glags mi tshol gyi/ bdud sdig can ni dge slong gang dag yang 'byung ba med par bya ba'i phyir mgo dang
271b7(mdo sde): gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du brtson par gnas pa de dag la bdud glags tshol te/ kun dga' bo de lta bas na ma thob pa thob par bya ba dang / ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba dang / mngon du ma byas pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sbyor bar byos shig /bstsal bar byos shig /
272a1(mdo sde): 'bad par byos shig /bdud kyi phyogs tshar chod cig /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'bar bar byos shig /dam pa'i chos yongs su zung shig /nga la chos kyi mchod pas mchod cig /'di ni khyod la rjes su bstan pa yin no/ /bstan
272a2(mdo sde): pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe dge slong lnga stong gis tshe'i 'du byed spangs par gyur te/ bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa mthong bar ma gyur cig ces de skad kyi tshig smras nas/ de dag steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags te/ rang gi me'i
272a3(mdo sde): khams kyis bdag nyid bsregs so/ /lha'i bu 'bum gyis kyang de dag la mchod pa byas par gyur to/ /dge slong nyis brgya ni chos la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ /dge slong nyis brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems
272a4(mdo sde): rnam par grol lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dag kyang 'khor dang bcas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das
272a5(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa mi mthong bar bgyi ba dang / bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gi rna lam du grags par gyur pa de dag nams kyang sems le lo'i
272a6(mdo sde): dri mas kun nas mi gnas par bgyi ba dang / de dag bdud kyi las byung zhing byung ba rnams kyi dbang du mi 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das sku tshe ring du bzhugs shing bskyang bar gsol zhes smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam
272a7(mdo sde): par 'phrul pa dang / chos ston pa rnam par 'phrul pa las gang kho bos phyogs tsam zhig mngon sum du gyur pa ni de lta bu de dag yin no/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bos kyang
272b1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul kha cig mngon sum du gyur to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bos mngon par shes te/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon pa/ kho bo yang rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon pa zhig
272b2(mdo sde): na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen srog shing gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir dang po 'ongs par gyur te/ bcom ldan
272b3(mdo sde): 'das kyang mnyan yod kyi rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba 'dir dbyar gnas par dam bca' mdzad do/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'ang der dbyar zla ba gsum gnas par dam bcas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga dang / dge
272b4(mdo sde): 'dun gyi nang dang bkad sa dang / gso sbyong dang / phyag 'tshal ba'i las la kho bo cag gis phyir nam yang ma mthong bar gyur to/ /de nas dbyar zla ba gsum zad de 'das pa dang / gso sbyong dang / dgag dbye'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bzhin bstan to/ /de
272b5(mdo sde): la kho bos 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal khyod dbyar gyi zla ba de gsum gyi tshe gang na 'dug 'dug des smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po 'di nyid na rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi btsun mo'i nang na'o/ /de la kho bo 'di snyam du gyur te/
272b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'di lta bu ltung ba dang bcas pa dang yongs su dag pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun dang lhan cig dgag dbye byar mi rung ngo snyam du gyur nas/ kho bo 'khor gyi khyams de nas byung ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bskrad pa'i phyir gaN+DI brdungs so/ /der bcom
272b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal gnas brtan 'od srung chen po ci'i phyir gaN+DI rdungs pa soms shig /des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bsams na bdag bskrad pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan
273a1(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod la ma dad pa chen po byed par mi 'gyur bar bdag nyid tshangs par byos shig /rang gi spyod yul ston cig /nyan thos chen po rnams mgu bar byos shig /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur
273a2(mdo sde): gyur pas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe phyogs bcu na sangs
273a3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sbyangs pa'i yon tan smra ba'i dge slong 'od srung chen po 'dra ba sha stag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bskrad pa'i phyir gaN+DI rdung bar snang bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kho bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'od srung
273a4(mdo sde): ci'i phyir gaN+DI rdung / bcom ldan 'das la kho bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de dbyar zla gsum du btsun mo'i 'khor du gnas nas yongs su dag pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun dang lhan cig dgag dbye bgyid par
273a5(mdo sde): 'tshal te/ de bskrad pa'i slad du bdag gaN+DI rdung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku thams cad las 'od phyung ste/ kho bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'od srung phyogs bcu na ci snang ba je ltos shig /kho bos de'i tshe bltas na phyogs bcu na
273a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ gnas brtan bdag 'dra ba sha stag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bskrad pa'i phyir gaN+DI rdung bar mthong ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad na yang 'jam dpal gzhon
273a7(mdo sde): nur gyur pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi zhabs kyi drung na 'dug par mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis kho bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'od srung chen po khyod ci 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang nga'i mdun na 'dug pa 'di 'am/ 'on te gang
273b1(mdo sde): dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med tshad med pa na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung na 'dug pa'am gang bskrad par 'dod/ de'i tshe kho bo ngo tsha ba'i tshul gyis gaN+DI de sa la dor ro snyam na/ dor yang ma nus nas rgyun ma chad par sgra byung
273b2(mdo sde): ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na ji lta ba de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na'ang chad pa med/ lhag pa med/ skyes pa med par de bzhin du byed par snang ngo / /kho bos de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di
273b3(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni shes pa phyogs gcig pa dang ldan pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' yul tshad ma mchis pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma 'tshal nas gaN+DI brdungs pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bzod pa gsol lo/ /bcom ldan
273b4(mdo sde): 'das kyis kho bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'od srung chen po khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di snyed mthong ba thams cad du khyim pa'i khyim du sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir dbyar zla gsum du gnas so/ /'od srung
273b5(mdo sde): c hen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po 'dir btsun mo'i 'khor du dbyar gnas par dam bcas pas kyang rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi btsun mo'i 'khor las bud med lnga brgya bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par
273b6(mdo sde): yongs su smin par byas so/ /skyes pa lnga brgya dang / khye'u lnga brgya dang / bu mo lnga brgya dang / smad 'tshong ma lnga brgya yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bzhag go/ /sems can mang po dag kyang nyan thos kyi theg par
273b7(mdo sde): brtul te mtho ris su 'gro bar byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das la kho bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos ji lta bu zhig bshad pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sems can de snyed cig yongs su smin par bgyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
274a1(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de nyid la chos ji lta bu zhig bshad pas sems can de snyed yongs su smin par byas zhes khyod kyis dris shig dang / de nyid khyod la lan ldon par 'gyur ro/ /kho bos 'jam dpal gzhon
274a2(mdo sde): nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal khyod kyis chos ji lta bu zhig bshad pas sems can de snyed yongs su smin par byas/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po sems can de lta bu de dag ni chos bshad pas yongs su smin par mi
274a3(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po sems can gang dag dga' ba'i rtsed mos yongs su smin par 'gyur ba yang yod/ rab tu gzung ba dang / tshar gcad pa dang / sbyin pa rab tu sbyin pa dang / phongs shing dbul ba dang / bkod pa chen
274a4(mdo sde): po dang / kun rjod pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / brgya byin gyi gzugs dang / tshangs pa'i gzugs dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i gzugs dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i gzugs dang / sangs rgyas kyi
274a5(mdo sde): sku dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / nyan thos kyi gzugs dang / 'jigs pas bsdigs pa dang / tshig rtsub po dang / tshig 'jam po dang / phan gdags pas yongs su smin par 'gyur ba yang yod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa 'od srung chen
274a6(mdo sde): po sems can gyi spyod pa ni sna tshogs pa ste/ de dag bya ba yang sna tshogs pa nyid kyis yongs su smin par 'gyur te/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po de ltar yongs su smin pa'i sems can rnams phyis chos bshad pas shin tu dul bar 'gyur ro/ /de la kho bos
274a7(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal khyod kyis sems can gyi khams ji snyed cig spyod pa 'dis yongs su smin par byas/ des smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po chos kyi dbyings ji snyed pa'o/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings
274b1(mdo sde): kyang ji snyed/ smras pa/ nam mkha'i khams ji tsam pa'o/ /smras pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyang ji tsam/ smras pa/ sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa ste/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po de ltar na chos kyi dbyings dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / sems
274b2(mdo sde): can gyi khams de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med do/ /de la kho bos 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal 'di ltar sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med na 'o na sangs rgyas 'byung ba don med par mi 'gyur ram/ des smras pa/ btsun
274b3(mdo sde): pa 'od srung chen po dper na skyes bu la la zhig mkhris pa'i rims kyis btab ste/ rnam pa sna tshogs su bla bar gyur pa dang / de la kha cig skyes bu 'di ni gdon gyis btab bo snyam du gyur to/ /de nas sman pa mkhas pa zhig 'ongs te/ skyes bu de la mar blud pa la sogs
274b4(mdo sde): pa'i bya bas mkhris pa'i rims de zhi bar byas nas/ de phyis rnam pa sna tshogs su mi bla bar gyur na/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po 'di ji snyam du sems/ de las lha'am/ klu'am/ gnod sbyin byung bar gyur pa yod dam/ de la kho bos 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam
274b5(mdo sde): dpal de ni ma yin te/ 'on kyang mar blud pa la sogs pa'i bya bas mkhris pa de zhi bar gyur to/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po skyes bu de la sman pa des phan pa chen po byas pa ma yin nam/ kho bos de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam
274b6(mdo sde): dpal ji skad smras pa de bzhin no/ /des smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gnas pa phyin ci log gi rims kyis btab pa dag bdag med la bdag tu 'du shes shing bdag med pa la bdag tu mngon par zhen nas 'khor ba na 'khor ro/ /de la sangs
274b7(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dag 'jig rten du byung ste/ dpe bstan pa de dang de dag dang / chos la gzhug pa'i sgo de dang de dag gis bdag tu 'du shes pa yongs su shes pa dang / phyin ci log spang bar bya ba'i phyir sems can de dag la chos 'chad do/ /
275a1(mdo sde): de dag chos thos nas 'du shes thams cad dang bral zhing phyi phyir zhing mngon par mi chags te/ de dag bdag tu 'du shes pa spangs nas chu bo las brgal te/ de dag brgal ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba'i grangs
275a2(mdo sde): su 'gro'o/ /btsun pa 'od srung chen po 'di ji snyam du sems/ de la bdag gam sems can nam/ srog gam skye ba po'am/ gang zag gang yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa yod dam/ kho bos de la smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/ 'on
275a3(mdo sde): kyang mnyam pa nyid yang dag par bstan pas phyin ci log spong ngo / /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po 'di lta bu'i phyir sangs rgyas 'byung ste/ 'di lta ste/ mnyam pa nyid yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir te/ skye ba'i phyir ma yin/
275a4(mdo sde): 'gag pa'i phyir ma yin gyi/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa 'ba' zhig rtogs par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /kho bos de la 'di skad smras so/ /'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang dag rang bzhin de lta bu'i chos kyi dbyings la'ang rtog cing / sems can thams
275a5(mdo sde): cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i go cha yang mi 'dor la/ zhum par mi 'gyur/ rangs par mi 'gyur zhing rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir go cha bgos pa ni dka' ba byed pa ma yin no/ /des smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung
275a6(mdo sde): chen po de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa yin no/ /de la kho bos 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal khyod byang chub sems dpa'i go cha brtsam par spobs par gyis shig /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun
275a7(mdo sde): pa 'od srung chen po byang chub sems dpa'i go cha chen po ni sum cu rtsa gnyis te/ go cha de dag bgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po rmi lam gyi rang bzhin gyi
275b1(mdo sde): mtshan nyid kyis 'khor ba tshad med pa yongs su 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/ /bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis sems can tshad med pa yongs su smin par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/ /chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid kyis sangs rgyas tshad
275b2(mdo sde): med pa la mchod pa dang rim gro byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/ /brag ca dang mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa thams cad nyan cing 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/ /chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du ba'i mtshan
275b3(mdo sde): nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad srung ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/ /nyon mongs pa thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i mtshan nyid kyis bdud thams cad 'dul ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/ /yod pa dang med pa sel ba'i rten cing 'brel
275b4(mdo sde): bar 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid kyis phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang 'thun pas shin tu tshar gcod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/ /phung po thams cad spong ba'i mtshan nyid kyis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha 'o/ /
275b5(mdo sde): mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis tshul khrims dang / bslab pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyis yo byad bsnyungs pa thams cad yang dag par len pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/ /khong khro ba med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis bzod pa dang / dul ba dang /
275b6(mdo sde): des pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/ /lus dang sems dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyis blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa'i brtson 'grus ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/ /rten thams cad dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyis bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang /
275b7(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/ /ma rig pa'i gti mug gi lta ba yongs su dag pa'i mtshan nyid kyis thogs pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/ /bya ba thams cad
276a1(mdo sde): ston pa'i mtshan nyid kyis thabs chen po ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/ /zhe 'gras pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis byams pa chen po ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/ /sor mo lnga dang nam mkha' mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid kyis snying rje chen po ni byang chub
276a2(mdo sde): sems dpa'i go cha'o/ /yongs su mi skyo ba'i mtshan nyid kyis dga' ba chen po ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/ /bde ba dang sdug bsngal bar mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyis btang snyoms chen po ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/ /rnam par grol ba lag mthil
276a3(mdo sde): du 'ongs kyang thob par mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyis bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i mtshan nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/ /skyon med par mi ltung ba'i mtshan nyid kyis thams cad yid la mi byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/ /sgyu ma lta
276a4(mdo sde): bu'i chos legs par shes pa'i mtshan nyid kyis phung po lnga gshed ma lta bur gyur pa yongs su srung ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/ /chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyis khams bzhi la sbrul gdug pa lta bur 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/ /yul
276a5(mdo sde): thams cad la mi chags pa'i mtshan nyid kyis skye mched drug la grong stong pa lta bur rtog pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/ /kun gzhi med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis khams gsum dang mi 'dre ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/ /srid pa sel ba'i mtshan nyid kyis
276a6(mdo sde): ched du srid pa len pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid kyis dpa' ba chen po ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/ /sems can thams cad la so so ji ltar 'os par chos kyi sman sbyin pa'i mtshan nyid kyis sman pa chen po ni byang chub
276a7(mdo sde): sems dpa'i go cha'o/ /theg pa gsum gyi lam ston pa'i mtshan nyid kyis ded dpon chen po ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad la byas pa shes shing byas pa gzo ba'i mtshan nyid kyis dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi gcod
276b1(mdo sde): pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/ /mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i mtshan nyid kyis chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa las 'da' ba'i mtshan
276b2(mdo sde): nyid kyis phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/ /sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis byang chub kyi snying po brgyan pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/ /
276b3(mdo sde): btsun pa 'od srung chen po byang chub sems dpa'i go cha chen po sum cu rtsa gnyis ni de dag yin te/ go cha de dag bgos na 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni gzhan du 'gyur yang srid kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog pa'i
276b4(mdo sde): 'jigs pa ni med do/ /de la kho bos 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal go cha de dag las 'ga' yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams la med do/ /des smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po de bas na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni go cha
276b5(mdo sde): chen po ma bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa 'od srung chen po 'di ji snyam du sems/ go cha gang mthu dang ldan pa'i 'phong gi slob dpon gyis bgo bar bya ba'i go cha de mi phal gyis bgo bar bya'am/ kho bos de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/ mi
276b6(mdo sde): phal gyis go cha de bgo bar mi nus so/ /smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po de bzhin du go cha gang byang chub sems dpas bgo bar bya ba de dag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad mi gyon no/ /byang chub sems dpa'i go cha 'di bshad pa'i tshe lha'i bu khri nyis stong
276b7(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa dang / chos ston pa rnam par 'phrul pa gang kho bos phyogs tsam zhig mngon sum du gyur pa ni de lta bu de dag
277a1(mdo sde): yin no/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul kha cig mngon sum du gyur te/ tshe dang ldan pa
277a2(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu kho bos mngon par shes pa dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can gyi grong khyer gyi tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang pa na/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
277a3(mdo sde): dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe gcer bu ma'i bu bden pa po zhes bya ba gcer bu pa drug khris yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/ bsti stang byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas shing yangs pa can gyi grong khyer na 'dug go/ /kho bo ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
277a4(mdo sde): zhugs te/ gzhan mu stegs can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba la bltas na/ der kho bos sems can mu stegs can gdul bar bya ba brgya phrag mang po mthong nas/ kho bo der song ste de dag la chos bshad do/ /de dag kho bos chos bshad pa la sri zhu mi byed/ rna blags
277a5(mdo sde): te mi nyan/ kun du shes par bya ba'i sems kyis mi gnas pa'i steng du kho bo la 'phya smod gad mos 'debs shing tshig rtsub po dag kyang rjod do/ /der kho bos zla ba gsum du sems can de dag las 'ga' yang yongs su smin par bya ma nus te skyo bar gyur to/ /kho bo skyo
277a6(mdo sde): bar gyur nas slar song ngo / /de la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mu stegs can lnga brgya sprul te/ bdag nyid slob dpon du bzhag nas 'khor lnga brgya dang / gcer bu ma'i bu bden pa po gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang / gcer bu ma'i bu bden pa po'i rkang pa gnyis
277a7(mdo sde): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas mdun du 'dug ste/ gcer bu ma'i bu bden pa po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag cag gis 'phags pa'i grags pa'i sgra dang tshigs su bcad pa rgya chen po thos nas ljongs gzhan nas yangs pa can gyi grong khyer 'dir mchis te/ khyod
277b1(mdo sde): ni kho bo cag gi ston pa'o/ /kho bo cag ni khyod kyi slob ma'o/ /kho bo cag khyod las rjes su bstan pa nod do/ /ci nas kyang dge sbyong gau ta ma de dang / de'i nyan thos rnams mi mthong ba dang / ci nas kyang de las mi 'thun pa'i chos mi thos pa de ltar kho bo cag la mdzod
277b2(mdo sde): cig / gcer bu ma'i bu bden pa pos smras pa/ skyes bu dam pa dag legs so/ /legs so/ /dad pa dang ldan pa/ dang ba dang ldan pa khyod ring po mi thogs par nga'i chos bstan pa 'di shes par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gcer bu ma'i bu bden pa pos rang gi
277b3(mdo sde): 'khor rnams la smras pa/ tshur shog khyed cag bram ze'i bu lnga brgya po 'di dag dang lhan cig tu kun du dga' ba dang / 'thun pa dang / phan tshun chos la dpyad pa dpyod cing lhan cig tu gnas par gyis shig /'di dag gis gang ci smras pa deng khyed kyis shin
277b4(mdo sde): tu legs par zung shig / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'khor gcer bu pa lnga brgya sprul pa dang / gzhan mu stegs can gyi nyan thos rnams dang lhan cig tu 'dug nas/ de dag gi dka' thub dang / brtul zhugs dang / spyod lam dang / bslab pa'i
277b5(mdo sde): tshig ji tsam du rgyun mi 'chad pa de bas kyang bdag dang 'khor la lhag par ston to/ /skabs skabs su dkon mchog gsum gyi bsngags brjod do/ /skabs skabs ni gcer bu ma'i bu bden pa po'i yang dag pa'i yon tan bsngags pa brjod de/ des de
277b6(mdo sde): dag yid ches par byas nas dus gzhan dang / tshod gzhan zhig na mu stegs can gzhan tshogs pa la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag gi bstan bcos pa dang / sngags dang / rig byed dang / gzhung
277b7(mdo sde): las 'byung ba bzhin dge sbyong gau ta ma de'i yang dag pa'i yon tan bsngags pa yang yod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dge sbyong gau ta ma ni rigs phun sum tshogs pa pha dang ma dag pa/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i rigs su skyes pa/ bsod nams brgya'i
278a1(mdo sde): mtshan dang ldan pa ste/ btsas pa tsam na brgya byin dang / tshangs pas yongs su blangs shing / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ ma bzung bar gom pa bdun bor te/ tshig kyang nga ni 'jig rten gyi thu bo ste/
278a2(mdo sde): skye ba dang 'chi ba mthar bya'o zhes de skad smra zhing / chu'i rgyun gnyis byung ste/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong bas khrus byas/ lha'i dang mi'i rol mo dag kyang ma brdungs par sgra byung / des 'od gang gis ngan song thams cad so sor thar pa dang /
278a3(mdo sde): bdud kyi gnas thams cad zil gyis gnon pa de lta bu'i 'od kyang btang ste/ dbang po nyams pa thams cad kyang dbang po ma nyams par gyur/ yud tsam de la sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi ste mchog tu bde ba thob par gyur/ bram ze rig byed kyi
278a4(mdo sde): cho ga shes pa rnams kyis kyang de ste khyim na 'dug na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /de ste nags su song na chos kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes bsgo ste/ de'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bor nas rab tu byung ste/ des byang chub kyi snying por
278a5(mdo sde): bdud kyi sde bye ba phrag brgya pa btul te byang chub thob/ des 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ sus kyang chos dang 'thun par bskor bar mi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ de chos kyang ston te/ tshangs par
278a6(mdo sde): spyod pa thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /de la de'i nyan thos dag gi thog mar dge ba de ni 'di lta
278a7(mdo sde): ste/ lus kyi legs par spyod pa dang / ngag gi legs par spyod pa dang / yid kyi legs par spyod pa'o/ /bar du dge ba ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang / sems dang / shes rab la bslab par bya'o/ /tha mar dge ba ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
278b1(mdo sde): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o/ /gzhan yang thog mar dge ba ni 'dun pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bag yod pa'o/ /bar du dge ba ni dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / sems rtse gcig pa'o/ /tha mar dge ba ni shes rab dang / lhag mthong dang / ye
278b2(mdo sde): shes so/ /gzhan yang thog mar dge ba ni sangs rgyas la mi phyed par dad pa'o/ /bar du dge ba ni chos la mi phyed par dad pa'o/ /tha mar dge ba ni dge 'dun la mi phyed par dad pas 'bras bu thob pa'o/ /gzhan yang thog mar dge ba ni gzhan las nyan pa'o/ /
278b3(mdo sde): bar du dge ba ni tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'o/ /tha mar dge ba ni 'phags pa'i yang dag par lta ba'o/ /gzhan yang thog mar dge ba ni sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba spang ba'o/ /bar du dge ba ni lam bsgom pa'o/ /tha mar dge ba ni
278b4(mdo sde): 'gog pa mngon sum du byed pa ste/ 'di dag ni nyan thos rnams kyi thog mar dge ba dang / bar du dge ba dang / tha mar dge ba'o/ de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thog mar dge ba dang / bar du dge ba dang / tha mar dge ba gang zhe na/ de la thog mar dge
278b5(mdo sde): ba ni byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba'o/ /bar du dge ba ni theg pa dman pa mi 'dod pa'o/ /tha mar dge ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ba'o/ /gzhan yang thog mar dge ba ni sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pas byams pa chen po'o/ /
278b6(mdo sde): bar du dge ba ni sems can thams cad la bya ba ji yod snyam pas snying rje chen po'o/ /tha mar dge ba ni dga' ba dang / btang snyoms mnyam pa'i sems kyis nges par sems pa'o/ /gzhan yang thog mar dge ba ni ser sna'i sems tshar gcod pa dang / 'chal
278b7(mdo sde): ba'i tshul khrims spong ba dang / gnod sems sel ba dang / le lo spong ba dang / rnam par g.yeng ba kun du mi spyod pa dang / 'chal ba'i shes rab spong ba'o/ /bar du dge ba ni sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam
279a1(mdo sde): gtan dang / shes rab kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /tha mar dge ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ba'o/ /gzhan yang thog mar dge ba ni bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis
279a2(mdo sde): sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'o/ /bar du dge ba ni lus dang srog la mi lta bar dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o/ /tha mar dge ba ni skyon med par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa las srung ba'o/ /gzhan yang thog mar dge ba ni sems sa dang mtshungs pa mi
279a3(mdo sde): gtong bas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'o/ /bar du dge ba ni 'jug pa dang ldog pa'i shes pas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'o/ /tha mar dge ba ni dbang thob pas skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ste/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thog mar dge ba dang / bar
279a4(mdo sde): du dge ba dang / tha mar dge ba'o/ /de ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gzhan mu stegs can gyi 'khor de na/ de lta de ltar chos ston te/ gzhan mu stegs can lnga brgya ni chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ /gzhan mu stegs can brgyad
279a5(mdo sde): stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ /de nas sprul pa lnga brgya po de dag gis yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas/ tshig tu yang sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes brjod do/ /de
279a6(mdo sde): dag gi rjes su slob pa'i tshul gyis gzhan mu stegs can gyi 'khor de dag thams cad kyis kyang yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas/ tshig tu'ang sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes brjod do/ /lha rnams kyi dbang po
279a7(mdo sde): brgya byin gyis kyang de dag la khyed 'dis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byos shig ces me tog man dA ra ba dag byin no/ / //bam po bzhi pa ste tha ma/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ smyig ma'i
279b1(mdo sde): ldum bu'i 'khor gyi khyams ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /gzhan mu stegs can gyi 'khor de dag gis kyang me tog man dA ra ba
279b2(mdo sde): de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sprul pa lnga brgya po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
279b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku ste/ bdag cag sangs rgyas la blta ba don du mi gnyer ro/ /bcom ldan 'das chos ni brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi chos nyan pa don du mi gnyer ro/ /bcom ldan 'das bcom
279b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba ste/ bdag cag dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa don du mi gnyer ro/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ni yon tan dang phan yon ma mchis pa ste/ bdag cag yon tan don du mi
279b5(mdo sde): gnyer ro/ /bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni shin tu ma byung ba ste/ bdag cag 'byung ba don du mi gnyer ro/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam par grol ba ni lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang bral ba ste/ bdag cag thob pa don du mi gnyer ro/ /
279b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das yongs su shes pa ni gnyis dang bral ba ste/ bdag cag sdug bsngal yongs su 'tshal ba don du mi gnyer ro/ /bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni shin tu ma byung ba ste/ bdag cag kun 'byung spong ba don du mi gnyer ro/ /bcom
279b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das chos thams cad ni shin tu 'gags pa ste/ bdag cag 'gog pa mngon du bgyi ba don du mi gnyer ro/ /bcom ldan 'das lam ni mchis pa dang / ma mchis pa dang bral ba ste/ bdag cag lam bsgom pa don du mi gnyer ro/ /bcom ldan
280a1(mdo sde): 'das chos thams cad ni gnas na mi gnas pa ste/ bdag cag dran pa nye bar gzhag pa don du mi gnyer ro/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam par grol ba ni bsod nams dang / bsod nams ma lags pa dang / mi g.yo ba'i 'du byed dang bral ba
280a2(mdo sde): ste/ bdag cag yang dag par spong ba don du mi gnyer ro/ /bcom ldan 'das gang nas kyang mchi ba ma mchis pa/ gang du yang mchi ba ma mchis par tshad mar bgyis te/ bdag cag rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa don du mi gnyer ro/ /bcom ldan 'das don ni dbang po
280a3(mdo sde): dang bral ba ste/ bdag cag dbang po don du mi gnyer ro/ /bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni stobs ma mchis shing nyam chung ba ste/ bdag cag stobs don du mi gnyer ro/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di la don dam par na byang chub pa ni gang yang ma mchis te/ bdag
280a4(mdo sde): cag byang chub kyi yan lag don du mi gnyer ro/ /bcom ldan 'das 'gro bas 'jig rten gyi mthar 'gro ba ma mchis te/ bdag cag lam don du mi gnyer ro/ /bcom ldan 'das zhi ba'i dbyings la g.yeng ba ma mchis te/ bdag cag zhi gnas don du mi gnyer ro/ /
280a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyis kyang mi mthong ba ste/ bdag cag lhag mthong don du mi gnyer ro/ /bcom ldan 'das de ltar blang ba dang dor ba shin tu ma mchis te/ bdag cag rtsol ba don du mi gnyer ro/ /bcom ldan 'das chos
280a6(mdo sde): kyi dbyings ni yang dag par sangs ma rgyas pa ste/ bdag cag rnam par grol ba don du mi gnyer ro/ /bcom ldan 'das dge sbyong ni chags pa thams cad dang bral ba ste/ bdag cag dge sbyong don du mi gnyer ro/ /bcom ldan 'das bram ze ni sdig pa thams cad dang bral
280a7(mdo sde): ba ste/ bdag cag bram ze don du mi gnyer ro/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rang bzhin ni tha mi dad pa ste/ bdag cag dge slong gi dngos po don du mi gnyer ro/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar skye mched drug nyid 'gags pa ste/ bdag cag pha rol tu mchi ba don du mi gnyer ro/ /bcom
280b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'di ltar 'jig pa ji tsam chung ngu la yang mi stod pa ste/ bdag cag 'dod pa chung ba ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos gang yang mi tshol ba ste/ bdag cag ni chog shes pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar lus dang / sems kyis
280b2(mdo sde): brjod par mi bgyi ba ste/ bdag cag dben pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar khams gsum du mi gnas pa ste/ bdag cag zag pa med pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gnyis po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ bdag cag ma 'dres
280b3(mdo sde): pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar khams gsum thams cad ni rnal 'byor pa'i dgon pa ste/ bdag cag dgon pa don du mi gnyer ro/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gnyen po ma mchis pas rtsod pa ma mchis pa ste/ bdag cag nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa
280b4(mdo sde): ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bsod snyoms kyi 'du shes spangs pa ste/ bdag cag bsod snyoms pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'khor ba nyid yang dag par na mi mthong ste/ bdag cag 'khor bas mi skrag go/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di
280b5(mdo sde): ltar rtog par mi bgyid/ rnam par rtog par mi bgyid de/ bdag cag 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug spong bar mi bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos rnams kyi rang bzhin nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa ste/ bdag cag nyon mongs pa spong ba la mi brtson
280b6(mdo sde): no/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rang gi lus ni lus ma lags pa ste/ bdag cag rang gi lus las mi g.yo bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin nyid mi bskyod pa'i mtshan nyid de/ bdag cag lta bas bgyis pa mi bskyong bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
280b7(mdo sde): 'di ltar rnam par grol ba ni rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / bdag dang / gtsang ba'i ngo bo nyid de/ bdag cag phyin ci log spong bar mi bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar tshu rol nas pha rol rjes su mi mthong bas bdag cag chu bo las rgal bar mi bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di
281a1(mdo sde): ltar rnam par grol ba ni sgrib pa ma mchis shing rnam par ma brtags pa ste/ bdag cag sgrib pa rnams spong bar mi bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' ni kun nas ldang ba ma mchis pa ste/ bdag cag kun nas ldang ba rnam par
281a2(mdo sde): gnon par mi bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar dge sbyong ni nongs pa ma mchis pa ste/ bdag cag 'gyod pa bsal bar mi bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar thog ma nas mos shing dad pa ste/ bdag cag the tsom sel bar mi bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das
281a3(mdo sde): 'di ltar mos pas rnam par grol ba rtogs pa ste/ bdag cag nem nur sel bar mi bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos thams cad ni shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ste/ bdag cag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa don du mi gnyer ro/ /bstan pa 'di
281a4(mdo sde): bshad pa'i tshe dge slong nyis brgya ni nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /dge slong bsam gtan bzhi thob pa srid pa tha ma pa/ ma thob par thob pa'i nga rgyal can nyis brgya ni stan las langs te/ kye ma'o 'di dag ni 'jig rten thams cad dang
281a5(mdo sde): 'gal bar chos 'chad de/ sngon bdag cag gis rjes su 'thun par chos 'chad par thos na/ da ltar ni chos ma yin pa/ 'dul ba ma yin pa/ ston pa'i bstan pa ma yin pa 'chad do zhes tshig de skad smras te dong ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bos 'jam dpal gzhon nur
281a6(mdo sde): gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal dge slong nyis brgya po 'di dag stan las langs te/ chos bshad pa 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal ba yin no zhes tshig de skad smras te dong ngo / /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa gang po rnam grangs gang gis chos bshad
281a7(mdo sde): pa 'di 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba yod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa gang po 'jig rten ni phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la mngon par zhen pa ste/ 'khor ba spangs pas mya ngan las 'das pa tshol zhing 'khor ba rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs pa nyid mya ngan
281b1(mdo sde): las 'das pa yin par de ltar ni mi shes so/ /'di la gang 'khor ba'am/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni gang yang med de/ gang de lta bu'i bzod pa de ni mi 'gal ba'o/ /bden pa bzhi rnam par gzhag pa bstan pa la mngon par zhen pa de ni 'gal ba'i gnas nyid do/ /don dam pa'i bden pa
281b2(mdo sde): la ni bden pa bzhi rnam par gzhag pa'ang med de/ de ni mi 'gal ba'o/ /lam gyi rgyu 'thun pa dang / 'bras bu thob ces bya ba de ni gnyis te/ gnyis gang yin pa de ni 'gal ba'o/ /lam mnyam pa nyid kyis chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid 'di ni gnyis su med pa ste/ gnyis su
281b3(mdo sde): med pa gang yin pa de ni mi 'gal ba'o/ /ji srid du ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la mngon par brtson pa de srid du mngon pa'i nga rgyal lo/ /ji srid du mngon pa'i nga rgyal ba de srid du 'gal ba'o/ /gang yang chad par mi byed/ lhag par mi byed/ mnyam pa nyid dang mnyam
281b4(mdo sde): par mi byed/ mi mnyam pa nyid dang mi mnyam par mi byed cing / byed pa ma yin pa/ rnam par byed pa ma yin pa de ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa ste/ gang lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa de ni mi 'gal ba'o/ /gang mi 'gal ba de ni gnyis su med pa ste/ de la dgongs nas bcom ldan
281b5(mdo sde): 'das kyis kyang nga ni 'jig rten dang lhan cig tu mi rtsod do/ /'jig rten ni nga dang lhan cig tu rtsod par byed do zhes de skad ces gsungs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni rtsod pa'i rtsa ba bcad do/ /rtsod pa'i rtsa ba de bzhin gshegs pas bcad pa gang zhe na/
281b6(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ 'di ni bden pa'o/ /'di ni pa'o zhes bya'o/ /de la bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bram ze bden pa zhes bya ba'i tshig kyang ci/ ci'i phyir na pa zhes kyang brjod/ gang la mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa med na/ de la su
281b7(mdo sde): zhig rtsod pa sbyor bar byed ces gsungs so/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong de dag lam gang nas dong ba de thams cad mes yongs su gang bar byin gyis brlabs nas/ de dag phyogs gang dang gang du dong ba de dang de dag thams cad mes yongs
282a1(mdo sde): su gang bar mthong ste/ me'i phung po de las rgal bar ma nus so/ /de dag rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis steng gi bar snang la dong ba dang / lcags kyi dra bas nam mkha'i dkyil thams cad yog par mthong ngo / /'og tu bltas na yang chu'i phung po chen po
282a2(mdo sde): mthong ste/ de dag phyogs bslad cing spu'i khung bu zing zhes byed par gyur nas/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi lam du bltas na me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar pos yog cing / lam de nas skye bo'i tshogs mang po dag bcom ldan 'das las
282a3(mdo sde): chos mnyan pa'i phyir dong ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas de nas de dag kyang phyir log ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba dang / smyig ma'i ldum bu'i 'khor gyi khyams ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags pa dang / bcom
282a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang / de dag la kho bos 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag gar dong dong / gang nas 'ongs/
282a5(mdo sde): de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po kho bo cag ni dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ bsam gtan thob pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol tu son pa ste/ kho bo cag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di las mi 'thun pa'i chos bshad pa thos nas stan las langs te dong na/ kho bo
282a6(mdo sde): cag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad mes yongs su gang bar mthong ste/ me'i phung po de las rgal bar ma nus so/ /kho bos bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa'i sa de gang lags/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis kho bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
282a7(mdo sde): to/ /gang po gang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi me la spyod pas me'i phung po las 'da' ba ni gnas ma yin no/ /lta ba'i dra bas bsgribs pas lcags kyi dra ba bcad pa dang / sred pa'i chur zhugs pas chu'i phung po las rgal ba ni gnas ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
282b1(mdo sde): na/ gang po 'di ltar dge slong 'di dag 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi me la spyod de/ de dag me'i phung po chen po las 'da' bar mi nus so/ /de dag lta ba'i dra bas bsgribs te/ lcags kyi dra ba gcad par mi nus so/ /de dag sred pa'i chu bor zhugs te/ chu'i phung
282b2(mdo sde): po las rgal bar mi nus so/ /gang po 'di lta ste dper na me'i phung po gang yin pa dang / lcags kyi dra ba gang yin pa dang / chu'i phung po gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ gang du yang ma song ste/ gzhan du na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin
282b3(mdo sde): gyi rlabs kyis snang ngo / /gang po de bzhin du 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gang yin pa dang / lta bar byas pa gang yin pa dang / srid pa'i sred pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ gang du yang ma song ste/ gzhan du na phyin ci log sngon du 'gro ba'i
282b4(mdo sde): rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa las bdag po med pa/ bdag gi med pa/ yongs su gzung ba med pa'i bdag dang gzhan du sgro 'dogs par 'byung ngo / /de la rnal 'byor pa rnal 'byor spyod pas rnam par g.yengs pa'i sems rtse gcig tu byed do/ /
282b5(mdo sde): sems rtse gcig pas zhi gnas sgrub par byed do/ /zhi gnas kyi tshogs kyis bsam gtan skyed par byed do/ /bsam gtan thob pas kyang rlom sems su mi byed/ mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /bsam gtan las su rung bar byas pa'i sems kyis kyang chos rnams la
282b6(mdo sde): rnam par lta ste/ chos gang gi rgyu dang / rkyen du 'gyur zhes de so sor rtog pa na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming
282b7(mdo sde): dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug / skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags
283a1(mdo sde): 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/ de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni log par bsgrub pa'i 'du byed kyi lam zhes bya'o/ /ma rig pa 'gags pas
283a2(mdo sde): 'du byed rnams 'gag / 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag /rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag /ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag /skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag /reg pa 'gags pas
283a3(mdo sde): tshor ba 'gag / tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag /sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag /len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag /srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag /skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba
